Theory Library_Additions

section â€¹Library additionsâ€º

theory Library_Additions
  imports "ZFC_in_HOL.Ordinal_Exp" "HOL-Library.Ramsey" "Nash_Williams.Nash_Williams"

begin

lemma finite_enumerate_Diff_singleton:
  fixes S :: "'a::wellorder set"
  assumes "finite S" and i: "i < card S" "enumerate S i < x"
  shows "enumerate (S - {x}) i = enumerate S i"
  using i
proof (induction i)
  case 0
  have "(LEAST i. i âˆˆ S âˆ§ iâ‰ x) = (LEAST i. i âˆˆ S)"
  proof (rule Least_equality)
    have "âˆƒt. t âˆˆ S âˆ§ tâ‰ x"
      using 0 â€¹finite Sâ€º finite_enumerate_in_set by blast
    then show "(LEAST i. i âˆˆ S) âˆˆ S âˆ§ (LEAST i. i âˆˆ S) â‰  x"
      by (metis "0.prems"(2) LeastI enumerate_0 not_less_Least)
  qed (simp add: Least_le)
  then show ?case
    by (auto simp: enumerate_0)
next
  case (Suc i)
  then have x: "enumerate S i < x"
    by (meson enumerate_step finite_enumerate_step less_trans)
  have cardSx: "Suc i < card (S - {x})" and "i < card S"
    using Suc â€¹finite Sâ€º card_Diff_singleton_if finite_enumerate_Ex by fastforce+
  have "(LEAST s. s âˆˆ S âˆ§ sâ‰ x âˆ§ enumerate (S - {x}) i < s) = (LEAST s. s âˆˆ S âˆ§ enumerate S i < s)"
       (is "_ = ?r")
  proof (intro Least_equality conjI)
    show "?r âˆˆ S"
      by (metis (lifting) LeastI Suc.prems(1) assms(1) finite_enumerate_in_set finite_enumerate_step)
    show "?r â‰  x"
      using Suc.prems not_less_Least [of _ "Î»t. t âˆˆ S âˆ§ enumerate S i < t"] 
       â€¹finite Sâ€º finite_enumerate_in_set finite_enumerate_step by blast
    show "enumerate (S - {x}) i < ?r"
      by (metis (full_types) Suc.IH Suc.prems(1) â€¹i < card Sâ€º enumerate_Suc'' enumerate_step finite_enumerate_Suc'' finite_enumerate_step x)
    show "â‹€y. y âˆˆ S âˆ§ y â‰  x âˆ§ enumerate (S - {x}) i < y âŸ¹ ?r â‰¤ y"
      by (simp add: Least_le Suc.IH â€¹i < card Sâ€º x)
  qed
  then show ?case
    using Suc assms by (simp add: finite_enumerate_Suc'' cardSx)
qed

lemma hd_lex: "âŸ¦hd ms < hd ns; length ms = length ns; ns â‰  []âŸ§ âŸ¹ (ms, ns) âˆˆ lex less_than"
  by (metis hd_Cons_tl length_0_conv less_than_iff lexord_cons_cons lexord_lex)

lemma sorted_hd_le:
  assumes "sorted xs" "x âˆˆ list.set xs"
  shows "hd xs â‰¤ x"
  using assms by (induction xs) (auto simp: less_imp_le)

lemma sorted_le_last:
  assumes "sorted xs" "x âˆˆ list.set xs"
  shows "x â‰¤ last xs"
  using assms by (induction xs) (auto simp: less_imp_le)

lemma hd_list_of:
  assumes "finite A" "A â‰  {}"
  shows "hd (sorted_list_of_set A) = Min A" 
proof (rule antisym)
  have "Min A âˆˆ A"
    by (simp add: assms)
  then show "hd (sorted_list_of_set A) â‰¤ Min A"
    by (simp add: sorted_hd_le â€¹finite Aâ€º)
next
  show "Min A â‰¤ hd (sorted_list_of_set A)"
    by (metis Min_le assms hd_in_set set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
qed

lemma sorted_hd_le_last:
  assumes "sorted xs" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "hd xs â‰¤ last xs"
  using assms by (simp add: sorted_hd_le)

lemma sorted_list_of_set_set_of [simp]: "strict_sorted l âŸ¹ sorted_list_of_set (list.set l) = l"
  by (simp add: strict_sorted_equal)

lemma range_strict_mono_ext:
  fixes f::"nat â‡’ 'a::linorder"
  assumes eq: "range f = range g"
      and sm: "strict_mono f" "strict_mono g"
    shows "f = g"
proof
  fix n
  show "f n = g n"
  proof (induction n rule: less_induct)
    case (less n)
    obtain x y where xy: "f n = g y" "f x = g n"
      by (metis eq imageE rangeI)
    then have "n = y"
      by (metis (no_types) less.IH neq_iff sm strict_mono_less xy)
    then show ?case using xy by auto
  qed
qed

subsection â€¹Other materialâ€º

definition strict_mono_sets :: "['a::order set, 'a::order â‡’ 'b::order set] â‡’ bool" where
  "strict_mono_sets A f â‰¡ âˆ€xâˆˆA. âˆ€yâˆˆA. x < y âŸ¶ less_sets (f x) (f y)"

lemma strict_mono_setsD:
  assumes "strict_mono_sets A f" "x < y" "x âˆˆ A" "y âˆˆ A"
  shows "less_sets (f x) (f y)"
  using assms by (auto simp: strict_mono_sets_def)

lemma strict_mono_on_o: "âŸ¦strict_mono_on r A; strict_mono_on s B; s ` B âŠ† AâŸ§ âŸ¹ strict_mono_on (r âˆ˜ s) B"
  by (auto simp: image_subset_iff strict_mono_on_def)

lemma strict_mono_sets_imp_disjoint:
  fixes A :: "'a::linorder set"
  assumes "strict_mono_sets A f"
  shows "pairwise (Î»x y. disjnt (f x) (f y)) A"
  using assms unfolding strict_mono_sets_def pairwise_def
  by (meson antisym_conv3 disjnt_sym less_sets_imp_disjnt)

lemma strict_mono_sets_subset:
  assumes "strict_mono_sets B f" "A âŠ† B"
  shows "strict_mono_sets A f"
  using assms by (auto simp: strict_mono_sets_def)

lemma strict_mono_less_sets_Min:
  assumes "strict_mono_sets I f" "finite I" "I â‰  {}"
  shows "less_sets (f (Min I)) (â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I})))"
  using assms by (simp add: strict_mono_sets_def less_sets_UN2 dual_order.strict_iff_order)

lemma pair_less_iff1 [simp]: "((x,y), (x,z)) âˆˆ pair_less âŸ· y<z"
  by (simp add: pair_less_def)

lemma infinite_finite_Inter:
  assumes "finite ğ’œ" "ğ’œâ‰ {}" "â‹€A. A âˆˆ ğ’œ âŸ¹ infinite A"
    and "â‹€A B. âŸ¦A âˆˆ ğ’œ; B âˆˆ ğ’œâŸ§ âŸ¹ A âˆ© B âˆˆ ğ’œ"
  shows "infinite (â‹‚ğ’œ)"
  by (simp add: assms finite_Inf_in)

lemma atLeast_less_sets: "âŸ¦less_sets A {x}; B âŠ† {x..}âŸ§ âŸ¹ less_sets A B"
  by (force simp: less_sets_def subset_iff)



subsection â€¹The list-of functionâ€º

lemma sorted_list_of_set_insert_cons:
  assumes "finite A" "less_sets {a} A"
  shows "sorted_list_of_set (insert a A) = a # sorted_list_of_set A"
proof -
  have "strict_sorted (a # sorted_list_of_set A)"
    using assms less_setsD by auto
  moreover have "list.set (a # sorted_list_of_set A) = insert a A"
    using assms by force
  moreover have "length (a # sorted_list_of_set A) = card (insert a A)"
    using assms card_insert_if less_setsD by fastforce
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (metis â€¹finite Aâ€º finite_insert sorted_list_of_set_unique)
qed

lemma sorted_list_of_set_Un:
  assumes AB: "less_sets A B" and fin: "finite A" "finite B"
  shows "sorted_list_of_set (A âˆª B) = sorted_list_of_set A @ sorted_list_of_set B"
proof -
  have "strict_sorted (sorted_list_of_set A @ sorted_list_of_set B)"
    using AB unfolding less_sets_def
    by (metis fin set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_list_of_set strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
  moreover have "card A + card B = card (A âˆª B)"
    using less_sets_imp_disjnt [OF AB]
    by (simp add: assms card_Un_disjoint disjnt_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (simp add: assms strict_sorted_equal)
qed

lemma sorted_list_of_set_UN_lessThan:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes sm: "strict_mono_sets {..<k} A" and "â‹€i. i < k âŸ¹ finite (A i)"
  shows "sorted_list_of_set (â‹ƒi<k. A i) = concat (map (sorted_list_of_set âˆ˜ A) (sorted_list_of_set {..<k}))"
  using assms
proof (induction k)
  case 0
  then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Suc k)
  have ls: "less_sets (â‹ƒ (A ` {..<k})) (A k)"
    using sm Suc.prems(1) strict_mono_setsD by (force simp: less_sets_UN1)
  have "sorted_list_of_set (â‹ƒ (A ` {..<Suc k})) = sorted_list_of_set (â‹ƒ (A ` {..<k}) âˆª A k)"
    by (simp add: Un_commute lessThan_Suc)
  also have "â€¦ = sorted_list_of_set (â‹ƒ (A ` {..<k})) @ sorted_list_of_set (A k)"
    by (rule sorted_list_of_set_Un) (auto simp: Suc.prems ls)
  also have "â€¦ = concat (map (sorted_list_of_set âˆ˜ A) (sorted_list_of_set {..<k})) @ sorted_list_of_set (A k)"
    using Suc strict_mono_sets_def by fastforce
  also have "â€¦ = concat (map (sorted_list_of_set âˆ˜ A) (sorted_list_of_set {..<Suc k}))"
    using strict_mono_sets_def by fastforce
  finally show ?case .
qed

lemma sorted_list_of_set_UN_atMost:
  fixes k::nat
  assumes "strict_mono_sets {..k} A" and "â‹€i. i â‰¤ k âŸ¹ finite (A i)"
  shows "sorted_list_of_set (â‹ƒiâ‰¤k. A i) = concat (map (sorted_list_of_set âˆ˜ A) (sorted_list_of_set {..k}))"
  by (metis assms lessThan_Suc_atMost less_Suc_eq_le sorted_list_of_set_UN_lessThan)

subsection â€¹Monotonic enumeration of a countably infinite setâ€º

abbreviation "enum â‰¡ enumerate"

text â€¹Could be generalised to infinite countable sets of any typeâ€º
lemma nat_infinite_iff:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  shows "infinite N âŸ· (âˆƒf::natâ‡’nat. N = range f âˆ§ strict_mono f)"
proof safe
  assume "infinite N"
  then show "âˆƒf. N = range (f::nat â‡’ nat) âˆ§ strict_mono f"
    by (metis bij_betw_imp_surj_on bij_enumerate enumerate_mono strict_mono_def)
next
  fix f :: "nat â‡’ nat"
  assume "strict_mono f" and "N = range f" and "finite (range f)"
  then show False
    using range_inj_infinite strict_mono_imp_inj_on by blast
qed

lemma enum_works:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "infinite N"
  shows "N = range (enum N) âˆ§ strict_mono (enum N)"
  by (metis assms bij_betw_imp_surj_on bij_enumerate enumerate_mono strict_monoI)

lemma range_enum: "range (enum N) = N" and strict_mono_enum: "strict_mono (enum N)"
  if "infinite N" for N :: "nat set"
  using enum_works [OF that] by auto

lemma enum_0_eq_Inf:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "infinite N"
  shows "enum N 0 = Inf N"
proof -
  have "enum N 0 âˆˆ N"
    using assms range_enum by auto
  moreover have "â‹€x. x âˆˆ N âŸ¹ enum N 0 â‰¤ x"
    by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) assms imageE le0 less_mono_imp_le_mono range_enum strict_monoD strict_mono_enum)
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (metis cInf_eq_minimum)
qed

lemma enum_works_finite:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "finite N"
  shows "N = enum N ` {..<card N} âˆ§ strict_mono_on (enum N) {..<card N}"
  using assms
  by (metis bij_betw_imp_surj_on finite_bij_enumerate finite_enumerate_mono lessThan_iff strict_mono_onI)

lemma enum_obtain_index_finite:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "x âˆˆ N" "finite N" 
  obtains i where "i < card N" "x = enum N i"
  by (metis â€¹x âˆˆ Nâ€º â€¹finite Nâ€º enum_works_finite imageE lessThan_iff)

lemma enum_0_eq_Inf_finite:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "finite N" "N â‰  {}"
  shows "enum N 0 = Inf N"
proof -
  have "enum N 0 âˆˆ N"
    by (metis Nat.neq0_conv assms empty_is_image enum_works_finite image_eqI lessThan_empty_iff lessThan_iff)
  moreover have "enum N 0 â‰¤ x" if "x âˆˆ N" for x
  proof -
    obtain i where "i < card N" "x = enum N i"
      by (metis â€¹x âˆˆ Nâ€º â€¹finite Nâ€º enum_obtain_index_finite)
    with assms show ?thesis
      by (metis Nat.neq0_conv finite_enumerate_mono less_or_eq_imp_le)
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (metis cInf_eq_minimum)
qed

lemma greaterThan_less_enum:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "N âŠ† {x<..}" "infinite N"
  shows "x < enum N i"
  using assms range_enum by fastforce

lemma atLeast_le_enum:
  fixes N :: "nat set"
  assumes "N âŠ† {x..}" "infinite N"
  shows "x â‰¤ enum N i"
  using assms range_enum by fastforce

lemma less_sets_empty1 [simp]: "less_sets {} A" and less_sets_empty2 [simp]: "less_sets A {}"
  by (simp_all add: less_sets_def)

lemma less_sets_singleton1 [simp]: "less_sets {a} A âŸ· (âˆ€xâˆˆA. a < x)" 
  and less_sets_singleton2 [simp]: "less_sets A {a} âŸ· (âˆ€xâˆˆA. x < a)"
  by (simp_all add: less_sets_def)

lemma less_sets_atMost [simp]: "less_sets {..a} A âŸ· (âˆ€xâˆˆA. a < x)" 
  and less_sets_alLeast [simp]: "less_sets A {a..} âŸ· (âˆ€xâˆˆA. x < a)"
  by (auto simp: less_sets_def)

lemma less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets:
  assumes "â‹€i. less_sets (A i) (A (Suc i))" "â‹€i. i>0 âŸ¹ A i â‰  {}"
  shows "strict_mono_sets UNIV A"
proof (clarsimp simp: strict_mono_sets_def)
  fix i j::nat
  assume "i < j"
  then show "less_sets (A i) (A j)"
  proof (induction "j-i" arbitrary: i j)
    case (Suc x)
    then show ?case
      by (metis Suc_diff_Suc Suc_inject Suc_mono assms less_Suc_eq less_sets_trans zero_less_Suc)
  qed auto
qed

lemma less_sets_Suc_Max:  
  assumes "finite A"
  shows "less_sets A {Suc (Max A)..}"
proof (cases "A = {}")
  case False
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: assms less_Suc_eq_le)
qed auto

lemma infinite_nat_greaterThan:
  fixes m::nat
  assumes "infinite N"
  shows "infinite (N âˆ© {m<..})"
proof -
  have "N âŠ† -{m<..} âˆª (N âˆ© {m<..})"
    by blast
  moreover have "finite (-{m<..})"
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using assms finite_subset by blast
qed

end

Theory Partitions

section â€¹Ordinal Partitionsâ€º

text â€¹Material from Jean A. Larson,
     A short proof of a partition theorem for the ordinal $\omega^\omega$.
     \emph{Annals of Mathematical Logic}, 6:129â€“-145, 1973.
Also from ``Partition Relations'' by A. Hajnal and J. A. Larson,
in \emph{Handbook of Set Theory}, edited by Matthew Foreman and Akihiro Kanamori
(Springer, 2010).â€º

theory Partitions
  imports Library_Additions "ZFC_in_HOL.ZFC_Typeclasses" "ZFC_in_HOL.Cantor_NF"

begin

abbreviation tp :: "V set â‡’ V"
  where "tp A â‰¡ ordertype A VWF"

subsection â€¹Ordinal Partitions: Definitionsâ€º

definition partn_lst :: "[('a Ã— 'a) set, 'a set, V list, nat] â‡’ bool"
  where "partn_lst r B Î± n â‰¡ âˆ€f âˆˆ nsets B n  â†’  {..<length Î±}.
              âˆƒi < length Î±. âˆƒH. H âŠ† B âˆ§ ordertype H r = (Î±!i) âˆ§ f ` (nsets H n) âŠ† {i}"

abbreviation partn_lst_VWF :: "V â‡’ V list â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
  where "partn_lst_VWF Î² â‰¡ partn_lst VWF (elts Î²)"

lemma partn_lst_E:
  assumes "partn_lst r B Î± n" "f âˆˆ nsets B n â†’  {..<l}" "l = length Î±"
  obtains i H where "i < l" "H âŠ† B"
                     "ordertype H r = Î±!i" "f ` (nsets H n) âŠ† {i}"
  using assms by (auto simp: partn_lst_def)

lemma partn_lst_VWF_nontriv:
  assumes "partn_lst_VWF Î² Î± n" "l = length Î±" "Ord Î²" "l > 0"
  obtains i where "i < l" "Î±!i â‰¤ Î²"
proof -
  have "{..<l} â‰  {}"
    by (simp add: â€¹l > 0â€º lessThan_empty_iff)
  then obtain f where  "f âˆˆ nsets (elts Î²) n  â†’  {..<l}"
    by (meson Pi_eq_empty equals0I)
  then obtain i H where "i < l" "H âŠ† elts Î²" and eq: "tp H = Î±!i"
    using assms by (metis partn_lst_E)
  then have "Î±!i â‰¤ Î²"
    by (metis â€¹H âŠ† elts Î²â€º â€¹Ord Î²â€º eq ordertype_le_Ord)
  then show thesis
    using â€¹i < lâ€º that by auto
qed

lemma partn_lst_triv0:
  assumes "Î±!i = 0" "i < length Î±" "n â‰  0"
  shows "partn_lst r B Î± n"
  by (metis partn_lst_def assms bot_least image_empty nsets_empty_iff ordertype_empty)

lemma partn_lst_triv1:
  assumes "Î±!i â‰¤ 1" "i < length Î±" "n > 1" "B â‰  {}" "wf r"  
  shows "partn_lst r B Î± n"
  unfolding partn_lst_def
proof clarsimp
  obtain Î³ where "Î³ âˆˆ B" "Î± â‰  []"
    using assms mem_0_Ord by fastforce
  have 01: "Î±!i = 0 âˆ¨ Î±!i = 1"
    using assms by (fastforce simp: one_V_def)
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ [B]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
  with assms have "ordertype {Î³} r = 1 âˆ§ f ` [{Î³}]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
                  "ordertype {} r = 0 âˆ§ f ` [{}]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
    by (auto simp: one_V_def ordertype_insert nsets_eq_empty)
  with assms 01 show "âˆƒi<length Î±. âˆƒHâŠ†B. ordertype H r = Î± ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
    using â€¹Î³ âˆˆ Bâ€º by auto
qed

lemma partn_lst_two_swap:
  assumes "partn_lst r B [x,y] n" shows "partn_lst r B [y,x] n"
proof -
  { fix f :: "'a set â‡’ nat"
    assume f: "f âˆˆ [B]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<2}"
    then have f': "(Î»i. 1 - i) âˆ˜ f âˆˆ [B]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<2}"
      by (auto simp: Pi_def)
    obtain i H where "i<2" "H âŠ† B" "ordertype H r = ([x,y]!i)" "((Î»i. 1 - i) âˆ˜ f) ` (nsets H n) âŠ† {i}"
      by (auto intro: partn_lst_E [OF assms f'])
    moreover have "f x = Suc 0" if "Suc 0 â‰¤ f x" "xâˆˆ[H]â‡—nâ‡–" for x
      using f that â€¹H âŠ† Bâ€º nsets_mono  by (fastforce simp: Pi_iff)
    ultimately have "ordertype H r = [y,x] ! (1-i) âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {1-i}"
      by (force simp: eval_nat_numeral less_Suc_eq)
    then have "âˆƒi H. i<2 âˆ§ HâŠ†B âˆ§ ordertype H r = [y,x] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
      by (metis Suc_1 â€¹H âŠ† Bâ€º diff_less_Suc) }
  then show ?thesis
    by (auto simp: partn_lst_def eval_nat_numeral)
qed

lemma partn_lst_greater_resource:
  assumes M: "partn_lst r B Î± n" and "B âŠ† C"
  shows "partn_lst r C Î± n"
proof (clarsimp simp: partn_lst_def)
  fix f
  assume "f âˆˆ [C]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
  then have "f âˆˆ [B]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
    by (metis â€¹B âŠ† Câ€º part_fn_def part_fn_subset)
  then obtain i H where "i < length Î±"
                   and "H âŠ† B" "ordertype H r = (Î±!i)"
                   and "f ` nsets H n âŠ† {i}"
    using M partn_lst_def by metis
  then show "âˆƒi<length Î±. âˆƒHâŠ†C. ordertype H r = Î± ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
    using â€¹B âŠ† Câ€º by blast
qed


lemma partn_lst_less:
  assumes M: "partn_lst r B Î± n" and eq: "length Î±' = length Î±" and "List.set Î±' âŠ† ON"
    and le: "â‹€i. i < length Î± âŸ¹ Î±'!i â‰¤ Î±!i "
    and r: "wf r" "trans r" "total_on B r" and "small B"
  shows "partn_lst r B Î±' n"
proof (clarsimp simp: partn_lst_def)
  fix f
  assume "f âˆˆ [B]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±'}"
  then obtain i H where "i < length Î±"
                   and "H âŠ† B" "small H" and H: "ordertype H r = (Î±!i)"
                   and fi: "f ` nsets H n âŠ† {i}"
    using assms by (auto simp: partn_lst_def smaller_than_small)
  then have bij: "bij_betw (ordermap H r) H (elts (Î±!i))"
    using ordermap_bij [of r H]
    by (smt assms(8) in_mono r(1) r(3) smaller_than_small total_on_def)
  define H' where "H' = inv_into H (ordermap H r) ` (elts (Î±'!i))"
  have "H' âŠ† H"
    using bij â€¹i < length Î±â€º bij_betw_imp_surj_on le
    by (force simp: H'_def image_subset_iff intro: inv_into_into)
  moreover have ot: "ordertype H' r = (Î±'!i)"
  proof (subst ordertype_eq_iff)
    show "Ord (Î±' ! i)"
      using assms by (simp add: â€¹i < length Î±â€º subset_eq)
    show "small H'"
      by (simp add: H'_def)
    show "âˆƒf. bij_betw f H' (elts (Î±' ! i)) âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆH'. âˆ€yâˆˆH'. (f x < f y) = ((x, y) âˆˆ r))"
    proof (intro exI conjI ballI)
      show "bij_betw (ordermap H r) H' (elts (Î±' ! i))"
        using â€¹H' âŠ† Hâ€º
        by (metis H'_def â€¹i < length Î±â€º bij bij_betw_inv_into_RIGHT bij_betw_subset le less_eq_V_def)
      show "(ordermap H r x < ordermap H r y) = ((x, y) âˆˆ r)"
        if "x âˆˆ H'" "y âˆˆ H'" for x y
      proof (intro iffI ordermap_mono_less)
        assume "ordermap H r x < ordermap H r y"
        then show "(x, y) âˆˆ r"
          by (metis â€¹H âŠ† Bâ€º assms(8) calculation in_mono leD ordermap_mono_le r smaller_than_small that total_on_def)
      qed (use assms that â€¹H' âŠ† Hâ€º â€¹small Hâ€º in auto)
    qed
    show "total_on H' r"
      using r by (meson â€¹H âŠ† Bâ€º â€¹H' âŠ† Hâ€º subsetD total_on_def)
  qed (use r in auto)
  ultimately show "âˆƒi<length Î±'. âˆƒHâŠ†B. ordertype H r = Î±' ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
    using â€¹H âŠ† Bâ€º â€¹i < length Î±â€º fi assms
    by (metis image_mono nsets_mono subset_trans)
qed


text â€¹Holds because no $n$-sets exist!â€º
lemma partn_lst_VWF_degenerate:
  assumes "k < n"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF Ï‰ (ord_of_nat k # Î±s) n"
proof (clarsimp simp: partn_lst_def)
  fix f :: "V set â‡’ nat"
  have "[elts (ord_of_nat k)]â‡—nâ‡– = {}"
    by (simp add: nsets_eq_empty assms finite_Ord_omega)
  then have "f ` [elts (ord_of_nat k)]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {0}"
    by auto
  then show "âˆƒi < Suc (length Î±s). âˆƒHâŠ†elts Ï‰. tp H = (ord_of_nat k # Î±s) ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
    using assms ordertype_eq_Ord [of "ord_of_nat k"] elts_ord_of_nat less_Suc_eq_0_disj
    by fastforce
qed

lemma partn_lst_VWF_Ï‰_2:
  assumes "Ord Î±"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰ â†‘ (1+Î±)) [2, Ï‰ â†‘ (1+Î±)] 2" (is  "partn_lst_VWF ?Î² _ _")
proof (clarsimp simp: partn_lst_def)
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ [elts ?Î²]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
  show "âˆƒi<Suc (Suc 0). âˆƒHâŠ†elts ?Î². tp H = [2, ?Î²] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
  proof (cases "âˆƒx âˆˆ elts ?Î². âˆƒy âˆˆ elts ?Î². x â‰  y âˆ§ f{x,y} = 0")
    case True
    then obtain x y where "x âˆˆ elts ?Î²" "y âˆˆ elts ?Î²" "x â‰  y" "f {x, y} = 0"
      by auto
    then have "{x,y} âŠ† elts ?Î²" "tp {x,y} = 2"
      "f ` [{x, y}]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
      by auto (simp add: eval_nat_numeral ordertype_VWF_finite_nat)
    with â€¹x â‰  yâ€º show ?thesis
      by (metis nth_Cons_0 zero_less_Suc)
  next
    case False
    with f have "âˆ€xâˆˆelts ?Î². âˆ€yâˆˆelts ?Î². x â‰  y âŸ¶ f {x, y} = 1"
      unfolding Pi_iff using lessThan_Suc by force
    then have "tp (elts ?Î²) = ?Î²" "f ` [elts ?Î²]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {Suc 0}"
      by (auto simp: assms nsets_2_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      by (metis lessI nth_Cons_0 nth_Cons_Suc subsetI)
  qed
qed


subsection â€¹Relating partition properties on @{term VWF} to the general caseâ€º

text â€¹Two very similar proofs here!â€º

lemma partn_lst_imp_partn_lst_VWF_eq:
  assumes part: "partn_lst r U Î± n" and Î²: "ordertype U r = Î²" "small U" 
    and r: "wf r" "trans r" "total_on U r"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF Î² Î± n"
  unfolding partn_lst_def
proof clarsimp
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ [elts Î²]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
  define cv where "cv â‰¡ Î»X. ordermap U r ` X"
  have bij: "bij_betw (ordermap U r) U (elts Î²)"
    using ordermap_bij [of "r" U] assms by blast 
  then have bij_cv: "bij_betw cv ([U]â‡—nâ‡–) ([elts Î²]â‡—nâ‡–)"
    using bij_betw_nsets cv_def by blast
  then have func: "f âˆ˜ cv âˆˆ [U]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}" and "inj_on (ordermap U r) U"
    using bij bij_betw_def bij_betw_apply f by fastforce+
  then have cv_part: "âŸ¦âˆ€xâˆˆ[X]â‡—nâ‡–. f (cv x) = i; X âŠ† U; a âˆˆ [cv X]â‡—nâ‡–âŸ§ âŸ¹ f a = i" for a X i n
    by (force simp: cv_def nsets_def subset_image_iff inj_on_subset finite_image_iff card_image)
  have ot_eq [simp]: "tp (cv X) = ordertype X r" if "X âŠ† U" for X
    unfolding cv_def
  proof (rule ordertype_inc_eq)
    fix u v
    assume "u âˆˆ X" "v âˆˆ X" and "(u,v) âˆˆ r"
    with that have "ordermap U r u < ordermap U r v"
      by (simp add: assms ordermap_mono_less subset_eq)
    then show "(ordermap U r u, ordermap U r v) âˆˆ VWF"
      by (simp add: r)
  next
    show "total_on X r"
      using that r by (auto simp: total_on_def)
    show "small X"
      by (meson â€¹small Uâ€º smaller_than_small that)
  qed (use assms in auto)
  obtain X i where "X âŠ† U" and X: "ordertype X r = Î±!i" "(f âˆ˜ cv) ` [X]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}" 
    and "i < length Î±"
    using part func by (auto simp: partn_lst_def)
  show "âˆƒi < length Î±. âˆƒHâŠ†elts Î². tp H = Î±!i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
  proof (intro exI conjI)
    show "i < length Î±"
      by (simp add: â€¹i < length Î±â€º)
    show "cv X âŠ† elts Î²"
      using â€¹X âŠ† Uâ€º bij bij_betw_imp_surj_on cv_def by blast
    show "tp (cv X) = Î± ! i"
      by (simp add: X(1) â€¹X âŠ† Uâ€º)
    show "f ` [cv X]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
      using X â€¹X âŠ† Uâ€º cv_part unfolding image_subset_iff cv_def
      by (metis comp_apply insertCI singletonD)
  qed
qed

lemma partn_lst_imp_partn_lst_VWF:
  assumes part: "partn_lst r U Î± n" and Î²: "ordertype U r â‰¤ Î²" "small U" 
    and r: "wf r" "trans r" "total_on U r"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF Î² Î± n"
  by (metis assms less_eq_V_def partn_lst_imp_partn_lst_VWF_eq partn_lst_greater_resource)

lemma partn_lst_VWF_imp_partn_lst_eq:
  assumes part: "partn_lst_VWF Î² Î± n" and Î²: "ordertype U r = Î²" "small U" 
    and r: "wf r" "trans r" "total_on U r"
  shows "partn_lst r U Î± n"
  unfolding partn_lst_def
proof clarsimp
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ [U]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
  define cv where "cv â‰¡ Î»X. inv_into U (ordermap U r) ` X"
  have bij: "bij_betw (ordermap U r) U (elts Î²)"
    using ordermap_bij [of "r" U] assms by blast 
  then have bij_cv: "bij_betw cv ([elts Î²]â‡—nâ‡–) ([U]â‡—nâ‡–)"
    using bij_betw_nsets bij_betw_inv_into unfolding cv_def by blast
  then have func: "f âˆ˜ cv âˆˆ [elts Î²]â‡—nâ‡– â†’ {..<length Î±}"
    using bij_betw_apply f by fastforce
  have "inj_on (ordermap U r) U"
    using bij bij_betw_def by blast
  then have cv_part: "âŸ¦âˆ€xâˆˆ[X]â‡—nâ‡–. f (cv x) = i; X âŠ† elts Î²; a âˆˆ [cv X]â‡—nâ‡–âŸ§ âŸ¹ f a = i" for a X i n
    apply ( simp add: cv_def nsets_def subset_image_iff inj_on_subset finite_image_iff card_image)
    by (metis bij bij_betw_def card_image inj_on_finite inj_on_inv_into subset_eq)
  have ot_eq [simp]: "ordertype (cv X) r = tp X" if "X âŠ† elts Î²" for X
    unfolding cv_def
  proof (rule ordertype_inc_eq)
    show "small X"
      using down that by auto
    show "(inv_into U (ordermap U r) x, inv_into U (ordermap U r) y) âˆˆ r"
      if "x âˆˆ X" "y âˆˆ X" and "(x,y) âˆˆ VWF" for x y
    proof -
      have xy: "x âˆˆ ordermap U r ` U" "y âˆˆ ordermap U r ` U"
        using â€¹X âŠ† elts Î²â€º â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º â€¹y âˆˆ Xâ€º bij bij_betw_imp_surj_on by blast+
      then have eq: "ordermap U r (inv_into U (ordermap U r) x) = x" "ordermap U r (inv_into U (ordermap U r) y) = y"
        by (meson f_inv_into_f)+
      then have "y âˆ‰ elts x"
        by (metis (no_types) VWF_non_refl mem_imp_VWF that(3) trans_VWF trans_def)
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis (no_types) VWF_non_refl xy eq assms(3) inv_into_into ordermap_mono r(1) r(3) that(3) total_on_def)
    qed
  qed (use r in auto)
  obtain X i where "X âŠ† elts Î²" and X: "tp X = Î±!i" "(f âˆ˜ cv) ` [X]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}" 
    and "i < length Î±"
    using part func by (auto simp: partn_lst_def)
  show "âˆƒi < length Î±. âˆƒHâŠ†U. ordertype H r = Î±!i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
  proof (intro exI conjI)
    show "i < length Î±"
      by (simp add: â€¹i < length Î±â€º)
    show "cv X âŠ† U"
      using â€¹X âŠ† elts Î²â€º bij bij_betw_imp_surj_on bij_betw_inv_into cv_def by blast
    show "ordertype (cv X) r = Î± ! i"
      by (simp add: X(1) â€¹X âŠ† elts Î²â€º)
    show "f ` [cv X]â‡—nâ‡– âŠ† {i}"
      using X â€¹X âŠ† elts Î²â€º cv_part unfolding image_subset_iff cv_def
      by (metis comp_apply insertCI singletonD)
  qed
qed

corollary partn_lst_VWF_imp_partn_lst:
  assumes "partn_lst_VWF Î² Î± n" and Î²: "ordertype U r â‰¥ Î²" "small U" 
          "wf r" "trans r" "total_on U r"
  shows "partn_lst r U Î± n"
  by (metis assms less_eq_V_def partn_lst_VWF_imp_partn_lst_eq partn_lst_greater_resource)

subsection â€¹Simple consequences of the definitionsâ€º

text â€¹A restatement of the infinite Ramsey theorem using partition notationâ€º
lemma Ramsey_partn: "partn_lst_VWF Ï‰ [Ï‰,Ï‰] 2"
proof (clarsimp simp: partn_lst_def)
  fix f
  assume "f âˆˆ [elts Ï‰]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
  then have *: "âˆ€xâˆˆelts Ï‰. âˆ€yâˆˆelts Ï‰. x â‰  y âŸ¶ f {x, y} < 2"
    by (auto simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral)
  obtain H i where H: "H âŠ† elts Ï‰" and "infinite H"
    and t: "i < Suc (Suc 0)"
    and teq: "âˆ€xâˆˆH. âˆ€yâˆˆH. x â‰  y âŸ¶ f {x, y} = i"
    using Ramsey2 [OF infinite_Ï‰ *] by (auto simp: eval_nat_numeral)
  then have "tp H = [Ï‰, Ï‰] ! i"
    using less_2_cases eval_nat_numeral ordertype_infinite_Ï‰ by force
  moreover have "f ` {N. N âŠ† H âˆ§ finite N âˆ§ card N = 2} âŠ† {i}"
    by (force simp: teq card_2_iff)
  ultimately have "f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
    by (metis (no_types) nsets_def numeral_2_eq_2)
  then show "âˆƒi<Suc (Suc 0). âˆƒHâŠ†elts Ï‰. tp H = [Ï‰,Ï‰] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
    using H â€¹tp H = [Ï‰, Ï‰] ! iâ€º t by blast
qed

text â€¹This is the counterexample sketched in Hajnal and Larson, section 9.1.â€º
proposition omega_basic_counterexample:
  assumes "Ord Î±"
  shows "Â¬ partn_lst_VWF Î± [succ (vcard Î±), Ï‰] 2"
proof -
  obtain Ï€ where funÏ€: "Ï€ âˆˆ elts Î± â†’ elts (vcard Î±)" and injÏ€: "inj_on Ï€ (elts Î±)"
    using inj_into_vcard by auto
  have OrdÏ€: "Ord (Ï€ x)" if "x âˆˆ elts Î±" for x
    using Ord_in_Ord funÏ€ that by fastforce
  define f where "f A â‰¡ @i::nat. âˆƒx y. A = {x,y} âˆ§ x < y âˆ§ (Ï€ x < Ï€ y âˆ§ i=0 âˆ¨ Ï€ y < Ï€ x âˆ§ i=1)" for A
  have f_Pi: "f âˆˆ [elts Î±]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
  proof
    fix A
    assume "A âˆˆ [elts Î±]â‡—2â‡–"
    then obtain x y where xy: "x âˆˆ elts Î±" "y âˆˆ elts Î±" "x < y" and A: "A = {x,y}"
      apply (clarsimp simp: nsets_2_eq)
      by (metis Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear_lt assms insert_commute)
    consider "Ï€ x < Ï€ y" | "Ï€ y < Ï€ x"
      by (metis OrdÏ€ Ord_linear_lt injÏ€ inj_onD less_imp_not_eq2 xy)
    then show "f A âˆˆ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
      by (metis A One_nat_def lessI lessThan_iff zero_less_Suc â€¹x < yâ€º A exE_some [OF _ f_def])
  qed
  have fiff: "Ï€ x < Ï€ y âˆ§ i=0 âˆ¨ Ï€ y < Ï€ x âˆ§ i=1"
    if f: "f {x,y} = i" and xy: "x âˆˆ elts Î±" "y âˆˆ elts Î±" "x<y" for x y i
  proof -
    consider "Ï€ x < Ï€ y" | "Ï€ y < Ï€ x"
      using xy by (metis OrdÏ€ Ord_linear_lt injÏ€ inj_onD less_V_def)
    then show ?thesis
    proof cases
      case 1
      then have "f{x,y} = 0"
        using â€¹x<yâ€º by (force simp: f_def Set.doubleton_eq_iff)
    then show ?thesis
      using "1" f by auto
    next
      case 2
      then have "f{x,y} = 1"
      using â€¹x<yâ€º by (force simp: f_def Set.doubleton_eq_iff)
    then show ?thesis
      using "2" f by auto
    qed
  qed
  have False
    if eq: "tp H = succ (vcard Î±)" and H: "H âŠ† elts Î±"
    and 0: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [H]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ f A = 0" for H
  proof -
    have [simp]: "small H"
      using H down by auto
    have OH: "Ord x" if "x âˆˆ H" for x
      using H Ord_in_Ord â€¹Ord Î±â€º that by blast
    have Ï€: "Ï€ x < Ï€ y" if "xâˆˆH" "yâˆˆH" "x<y" for x y
      using 0 [of "{x,y}"] that H fiff by (fastforce simp: nsets_2_eq)
    have sub_vcard: "Ï€ ` H âŠ† elts (vcard Î±)"
      using H funÏ€ by auto
    have "tp H = tp (Ï€ ` H)"
    proof (rule ordertype_VWF_inc_eq [symmetric])
      show "Ï€ ` H âŠ† ON"
      using H OrdÏ€ by blast
    qed (auto simp: Ï€ OH subsetI)
    also have "â€¦ â‰¤ vcard Î±"
      by (simp add: H sub_vcard assms ordertype_le_Ord)
    finally show False
      by (simp add: eq succ_le_iff)
  qed
  moreover have False
    if eq: "tp H = Ï‰" and H: "H âŠ† elts Î±"
      and 1: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [H]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ f A = Suc 0" for H
  proof -
    have [simp]: "small H"
      using H down by auto
    define Î· where "Î· â‰¡ inv_into H (ordermap H VWF) âˆ˜ ord_of_nat"
    have bij: "bij_betw (ordermap H VWF) H (elts Ï‰)"
      by (metis ordermap_bij â€¹small Hâ€º eq total_on_VWF wf_VWF)
    then have "bij_betw (inv_into H (ordermap H VWF)) (elts Ï‰) H"
      by (simp add: bij_betw_inv_into)
    then have Î·: "bij_betw Î· UNIV H"
      unfolding Î·_def
      by (metis Ï‰_def bij_betw_comp_iff2 bij_betw_def elts_of_set inf inj_ord_of_nat order_refl)
    have OrdÎ·: "Ord (Î· k)" for k
      by (meson H Ord_in_Ord UNIV_I Î· assms bij_betw_apply subsetD)
    obtain k where k: "((Ï€ âˆ˜ Î·)(Suc k), (Ï€ âˆ˜ Î·) k) âˆ‰ VWF"
      using wf_VWF wf_iff_no_infinite_down_chain by blast
    have Ï€: "Ï€ y < Ï€ x" if "xâˆˆH" "yâˆˆH" "x<y" for x y
      using 1 [of "{x,y}"] that H fiff by (fastforce simp: nsets_2_eq)
    have False if "Î· (Suc k) â‰¤ Î· k"
    proof -
      have "(Î· (Suc k), Î· k) âˆˆ VWF âˆ¨ Î· (Suc k) = Î· k"
        using that OrdÎ· Ord_mem_iff_lt by auto
      then have "ordermap H VWF (Î· (Suc k)) â‰¤ ordermap H VWF (Î· k)"
        by (metis Î· â€¹small Hâ€º bij_betw_imp_surj_on ordermap_mono_le rangeI trans_VWF wf_VWF)
      moreover have "ordermap H VWF (Î· (Suc k)) = succ (ord_of_nat k)"
        unfolding Î·_def using bij bij_betw_inv_into_right by force
      moreover have "ordermap H VWF (Î· k) = ord_of_nat k"
        apply (simp add: Î·_def)
        by (meson bij bij_betw_inv_into_right ord_of_nat_Ï‰)
      ultimately have "succ (ord_of_nat k) â‰¤ ord_of_nat k"
        by simp
      then show False
        by (simp add: less_eq_V_def)
    qed
    then have "Î· k < Î· (Suc k)"
      by (metis OrdÎ· Ord_linear_lt dual_order.strict_implies_order eq_refl)
    then have "(Ï€ âˆ˜ Î·)(Suc k) < (Ï€ âˆ˜ Î·)k"
      using Ï€ Î· bij_betw_apply by force
    then show False
      using k
      apply (simp add: subset_iff)
      by (metis H OrdÏ€ UNIV_I VWF_iff_Ord_less Î· bij_betw_imp_surj_on image_subset_iff)
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: partn_lst_def image_subset_iff)
    by (metis f_Pi less_2_cases nth_Cons_0 nth_Cons_Suc numeral_2_eq_2)
qed

subsection â€¹Specker's theoremâ€º

definition form_split :: "[nat,nat,nat,nat,nat] â‡’ bool" where
  "form_split a b c d i â‰¡ a â‰¤ c âˆ§ (i=0 âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ¨
                                    i=1 âˆ§ a<c âˆ§ c<b âˆ§ b<d âˆ¨
                                    i=2 âˆ§ a<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ§ d<b âˆ¨
                                    i=3 âˆ§ a=c âˆ§ bâ‰ d)"

definition form :: "[(nat*nat)set, nat] â‡’ bool" where
  "form u i â‰¡ âˆƒa b c d. u = {(a,b),(c,d)} âˆ§ form_split a b c d i"

definition scheme :: "[(nat*nat)set] â‡’ nat set" where
  "scheme u â‰¡ fst ` u âˆª snd ` u"

definition UU :: "(nat*nat) set"
  where "UU â‰¡ {(a,b). a < b}"

lemma ordertype_UNIV_Ï‰2: "ordertype UNIV pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2"
  using ordertype_Times [of concl: UNIV UNIV less_than less_than]
  by (simp add: total_less_than pair_less_def ordertype_nat_Ï‰ numeral_2_eq_2)

lemma ordertype_UU_ge_Ï‰2:  "ordertype UNIV pair_less â‰¤ ordertype UU pair_less"
proof (rule ordertype_inc_le)
  define Ï€ where "Ï€ â‰¡ Î»(m,n). (m, Suc (m+n))"
  show "(Ï€ (x::nat Ã— nat), Ï€ y) âˆˆ pair_less" if "(x, y) âˆˆ pair_less" for x y
    using that by (auto simp: Ï€_def pair_less_def split: prod.split)
  show "range Ï€ âŠ† UU"
    by (auto simp: Ï€_def UU_def)
qed auto

lemma ordertype_UU_Ï‰2: "ordertype UU pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2"
  by (metis eq_iff ordertype_UNIV_Ï‰2 ordertype_UU_ge_Ï‰2 ordertype_mono small top_greatest trans_pair_less wf_pair_less)


text â€¹Lemma 2.3 of Jean A. Larson,
     A short proof of a partition theorem for the ordinal $\omega^\omega$.
     \emph{Annals of Mathematical Logic}, 6:129â€“-145, 1973.â€º
lemma lemma_2_3:
  fixes f :: "(nat Ã— nat) set â‡’ nat"
  assumes "f âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
  obtains N js where "infinite N" and "â‹€k u. âŸ¦k < 4; u âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–; form u k; scheme u âŠ† NâŸ§ âŸ¹ f u = js!k"
proof -
  have f_less2: "f {p,q} < Suc (Suc 0)" if "p â‰  q" "p âˆˆ UU" "q âˆˆ UU" for p q
  proof -
    have "{p,q} âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–"
      using that by (simp add: nsets_def)
    then show ?thesis
      using assms by (simp add: Pi_iff)
  qed
  define f0 where "f0 â‰¡ (Î»A::nat set. THE x. âˆƒa b c d. A = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ§ x = f {(a,b),(c,d)})"
  have f0: "f0 {a,b,c,d} = f {(a,b),(c,d)}" if "a<b" "b<c" "c<d" for a b c d
    unfolding f0_def
    apply (rule theI2 [where a = "f {(a,b), (c,d)}"])
    using that by (force simp: insert_eq_iff split: if_split_asm)+
  have "f0 X < Suc (Suc 0)"
    if "finite X" and "card X = 4" for X
  proof -
    have "X âˆˆ [X]â‡—4â‡–"
      using that by (auto simp: nsets_def)
    then obtain a b c d where "X = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d"
      by (auto simp: ordered_nsets_4_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      using f0 f_less2 by (auto simp: UU_def)
  qed
  then have "âˆƒN t. infinite N âˆ§ t < Suc (Suc 0)
            âˆ§ (âˆ€X. X âŠ† N âˆ§ finite X âˆ§ card X = 4 âŸ¶ f0 X = t)"
    using Ramsey [of UNIV 4 f0 2] by (simp add: eval_nat_numeral)
  then obtain N0 j0 where "infinite N0" and j0: "j0 < Suc (Suc 0)" and N0: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [N0]â‡—4â‡– âŸ¹ f0 A = j0"
    by (auto simp: nsets_def)

  define f1 where "f1 â‰¡ (Î»A::nat set. THE x. âˆƒa b c d. A = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ§ x = f {(a,c),(b,d)})"
  have f1: "f1 {a,b,c,d} = f {(a,c),(b,d)}" if "a<b" "b<c" "c<d" for a b c d
    unfolding f1_def
    apply (rule theI2 [where a = "f {(a,c), (b,d)}"])
    using that by (force simp: insert_eq_iff split: if_split_asm)+
  have "f1 X < Suc (Suc 0)"
    if "finite X" and "card X = 4" for X
  proof -
    have "X âˆˆ [X]â‡—4â‡–"
      using that by (auto simp: nsets_def)
    then obtain a b c d where "X = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d"
      by (auto simp: ordered_nsets_4_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      using f1 f_less2 by (auto simp: UU_def)
  qed
  then have "âˆƒN t. N âŠ† N0 âˆ§ infinite N âˆ§ t < Suc (Suc 0)
            âˆ§ (âˆ€X. X âŠ† N âˆ§ finite X âˆ§ card X = 4 âŸ¶ f1 X = t)"
    using â€¹infinite N0â€º Ramsey [of N0 4 f1 2] by (simp add: eval_nat_numeral)
  then obtain N1 j1 where "N1 âŠ† N0" "infinite N1" and j1: "j1 < Suc (Suc 0)" and N1: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [N1]â‡—4â‡– âŸ¹ f1 A = j1"
    by (auto simp: nsets_def)

  define f2 where "f2 â‰¡ (Î»A::nat set. THE x. âˆƒa b c d. A = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ§ x = f {(a,d),(b,c)})"
  have f2: "f2 {a,b,c,d} = f {(a,d),(b,c)}" if "a<b" "b<c" "c<d" for a b c d
    unfolding f2_def
    apply (rule theI2 [where a = "f {(a,d), (b,c)}"])
    using that by (force simp: insert_eq_iff split: if_split_asm)+
  have "f2 X < Suc (Suc 0)"
    if "finite X" and "card X = 4" for X
  proof -
    have "X âˆˆ [X]â‡—4â‡–"
      using that by (auto simp: nsets_def)
    then obtain a b c d where "X = {a,b,c,d} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d"
      by (auto simp: ordered_nsets_4_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      using f2 f_less2 by (auto simp: UU_def)
  qed
  then have "âˆƒN t. N âŠ† N1 âˆ§ infinite N âˆ§ t < Suc (Suc 0)
            âˆ§ (âˆ€X. X âŠ† N âˆ§ finite X âˆ§ card X = 4 âŸ¶ f2 X = t)"
    using â€¹infinite N1â€º Ramsey [of N1 4 f2 2] by (simp add: eval_nat_numeral)
  then obtain N2 j2 where "N2 âŠ† N1" "infinite N2" and j2: "j2 < Suc (Suc 0)" and N2: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [N2]â‡—4â‡– âŸ¹ f2 A = j2"
    by (auto simp: nsets_def)

  define f3 where "f3 â‰¡ (Î»A::nat set. THE x. âˆƒa b c. A = {a,b,c} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ x = f {(a,b),(a,c)})"
  have f3: "f3 {a,b,c} = f {(a,b),(a,c)}" if "a<b" "b<c" for a b c
    unfolding f3_def
    apply (rule theI2 [where a = "f {(a,b), (a,c)}"])
    using that by (force simp: insert_eq_iff split: if_split_asm)+
  have f3': "f3 {a,b,c} = f {(a,b),(a,c)}" if "a<c" "c<b" for a b c
    using f3 [of a c b] that
    by (simp add: insert_commute)
  have "f3 X < Suc (Suc 0)"
    if "finite X" and "card X = 3" for X
  proof -
    have "X âˆˆ [X]â‡—3â‡–"
      using that by (auto simp: nsets_def)
    then obtain a b c where "X = {a,b,c} âˆ§ a<b âˆ§ b<c"
      by (auto simp: ordered_nsets_3_eq)
    then show ?thesis
      using f3 f_less2 by (auto simp: UU_def)
  qed
  then have "âˆƒN t. N âŠ† N2 âˆ§ infinite N âˆ§ t < Suc (Suc 0)
            âˆ§ (âˆ€X. X âŠ† N âˆ§ finite X âˆ§ card X = 3 âŸ¶ f3 X = t)"
    using â€¹infinite N2â€º Ramsey [of N2 3 f3 2] by (simp add: eval_nat_numeral)
  then obtain N3 j3 where "N3 âŠ† N2" "infinite N3" and j3: "j3 < Suc (Suc 0)" and N3: "â‹€A. A âˆˆ [N3]â‡—3â‡– âŸ¹ f3 A = j3"
    by (auto simp: nsets_def)

  show thesis
  proof
    fix k u
    assume "k < 4"
      and u: "form u k" "scheme u âŠ† N3"
      and UU: "u âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–"
    then consider (0) "k=0" | (1) "k=1" | (2) "k=2" | (3) "k=3"
      by linarith
    then show "f u = [j0,j1,j2,j3] ! k"
    proof cases
      case 0
      have "N3 âŠ† N0"
        using â€¹N1 âŠ† N0â€º â€¹N2 âŠ† N1â€º â€¹N3 âŠ† N2â€º by auto
      then show ?thesis
        using u 0
        apply (auto simp: form_def form_split_def scheme_def simp flip: f0)
        apply (force simp: nsets_def intro: N0)
        done
    next
      case 1
      have "N3 âŠ† N1"
        using â€¹N2 âŠ† N1â€º â€¹N3 âŠ† N2â€º by auto
      then show ?thesis
        using u 1
        apply (auto simp: form_def form_split_def scheme_def simp flip: f1)
        apply (force simp: nsets_def intro: N1)
        done
    next
      case 2
      then show ?thesis
        using u â€¹N3 âŠ† N2â€º
        apply (auto simp: form_def form_split_def scheme_def nsets_def simp flip: f2)
        apply (force simp: nsets_def intro: N2)
        done
    next
      case 3
      { fix a b d
        assume "{(a, b), (a, d)} âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–"
          and *: "a âˆˆ N3" "b âˆˆ N3" "d âˆˆ N3" "b â‰  d"
        then have "a<b" "a<d"
          by (auto simp: UU_def nsets_def)
        then have "f {(a, b), (a, d)} = j3"
          using *
          apply (auto simp: neq_iff simp flip: f3 f3')
           apply (force simp: nsets_def intro: N3)+
          done
      }
      then show ?thesis
        using u UU 3
        by (auto simp: form_def form_split_def scheme_def)
    qed
  qed (rule â€¹infinite N3â€º)
qed


text â€¹Lemma 2.4 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
lemma lemma_2_4:
  assumes "infinite N" "k < 4"
  obtains M where "M âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ form u k" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ scheme u âŠ† N"
proof -
  obtain f:: "nat â‡’ nat" where "bij_betw f UNIV N" "strict_mono f"
    using assms by (meson bij_enumerate enumerate_mono strict_monoI)
  then have iff[simp]: "f x = f y âŸ· x=y" "f x < f y âŸ· x<y" for x y
    by (simp_all add: strict_mono_eq strict_mono_less)
  have [simp]: "f x âˆˆ N" for x
    using bij_betw_apply [OF â€¹bij_betw f UNIV Nâ€º] by blast
  define M0 where "M0 = (Î»i. (f(2*i), f(Suc(2*i)))) ` {..<m}"
  define M1 where "M1 = (Î»i. (f i, f(m+i))) ` {..<m}"
  define M2 where "M2 = (Î»i. (f i, f(2*m-i))) ` {..<m}"
  define M3 where "M3 = (Î»i. (f 0, f (Suc i))) ` {..<m}"
  consider (0) "k=0" | (1) "k=1" | (2) "k=2" | (3) "k=3"
    using assms by linarith
  then show thesis
  proof cases
    case 0
    show ?thesis
    proof
      have "inj_on (Î»i. (f (2 * i), f (Suc (2 * i)))) {..<m}"
        by (auto simp: inj_on_def)
      then show "M0 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–"
        by (simp add: M0_def nsets_def card_image UU_def image_subset_iff)
    next
      fix u
      assume u: "(u::(nat Ã— nat) set) âˆˆ [M0]â‡—2â‡–"
      then obtain x y where "u = {x,y}" "x â‰  y" "x âˆˆ M0" "y âˆˆ M0"
        by (auto simp: nsets_2_eq)
      then obtain i j where "i<j" "j<m" and ueq: "u = {(f(2*i), f(Suc(2*i))), (f(2*j), f(Suc(2*j)))}"
        apply (clarsimp simp: M0_def)
        apply (metis (full_types) insert_commute less_linear)+
        done
      moreover have "f (2 * i) â‰¤ f (2 * j)"
        by (simp add: â€¹i<jâ€º less_imp_le_nat)
      ultimately show "form u k"
        apply (simp add: 0 form_def form_split_def nsets_def)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (2 * i)" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (Suc (2 * i))" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (2 * j)" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (Suc (2 * j))" in exI)
        apply auto
        done
      show "scheme u âŠ† N"
        using ueq by (auto simp: scheme_def)
    qed
  next
    case 1
    show ?thesis
    proof
      have "inj_on (Î»i. (f i, f(m+i))) {..<m}"
        by (auto simp: inj_on_def)
      then show "M1 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–"
        by (simp add: M1_def nsets_def card_image UU_def image_subset_iff)
    next
      fix u
      assume u: "(u::(nat Ã— nat) set) âˆˆ [M1]â‡—2â‡–"
      then obtain x y where "u = {x,y}" "x â‰  y" "x âˆˆ M1" "y âˆˆ M1"
        by (auto simp: nsets_2_eq)
      then obtain i j where "i<j" "j<m" and ueq: "u = {(f i, f(m+i)), (f j, f(m+j))}"
        apply (auto simp: M1_def)
        apply (metis (full_types) insert_commute less_linear)+
        done
      then show "form u k"
        apply (simp add: 1 form_def form_split_def nsets_def)
        by (metis iff(2) nat_add_left_cancel_less nat_less_le trans_less_add1)
      show "scheme u âŠ† N"
        using ueq by (auto simp: scheme_def)
    qed
  next
    case 2
    show ?thesis
    proof
      have "inj_on (Î»i. (f i, f(2*m-i))) {..<m}"
        by (auto simp: inj_on_def)
      then show "M2 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–"
        by (auto simp: M2_def nsets_def card_image UU_def image_subset_iff)
    next
      fix u
      assume u: "(u::(nat Ã— nat) set) âˆˆ [M2]â‡—2â‡–"
      then obtain x y where "u = {x,y}" "x â‰  y" "x âˆˆ M2" "y âˆˆ M2"
        by (auto simp: nsets_2_eq)
      then obtain i j where "i<j" "j<m" and ueq: "u = {(f i, f(2*m-i)), (f j, f(2*m-j))}"
        apply (auto simp: M2_def)
        apply (metis (full_types) insert_commute less_linear)+
        done
      then show "form u k"
        apply (simp add: 2 form_def form_split_def nsets_def)
        apply (rule_tac x="f i" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (2 * m - i)" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f j" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="f (2 * m - j)" in exI)
        apply (auto simp: less_imp_le_nat)
        done
      show "scheme u âŠ† N"
        using ueq by (auto simp: scheme_def)
    qed
  next
    case 3
    show ?thesis
    proof
      have "inj_on (Î»i. (f 0, f (Suc i))) {..<m}"
        by (auto simp: inj_on_def)
      then show "M3 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–"
        by (auto simp: M3_def nsets_def card_image UU_def image_subset_iff)
    next
      fix u
      assume u: "(u::(nat Ã— nat) set) âˆˆ [M3]â‡—2â‡–"
      then obtain x y where "u = {x,y}" "x â‰  y" "x âˆˆ M3" "y âˆˆ M3"
        by (auto simp: nsets_2_eq)
      then obtain i j where "i<j" "j<m" and ueq: "u = {(f 0, f(Suc i)), (f 0, f(Suc j))}"
        apply (auto simp: M3_def)
        apply (metis (full_types) insert_commute less_linear)+
        done
      then show "form u k"
        by (fastforce simp: 3 form_def form_split_def nsets_def)
      show "scheme u âŠ† N"
        using ueq by (auto simp: scheme_def)
    qed
  qed
qed


text â€¹Lemma 2.5 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
lemma lemma_2_5:
  assumes "infinite N"
  obtains X where "X âŠ† UU" "ordertype X pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2"
            "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ (âˆƒk<4. form u k) âˆ§ scheme u âŠ† N"
proof -
  obtain C
    where dis: "pairwise (Î»i j. disjnt (C i) (C j)) UNIV"
      and N: "(â‹ƒi. C i) âŠ† N" and infC: "â‹€i::nat. infinite (C i)"
    using assms infinite_infinite_partition by blast
  then have "âˆƒÏ†::nat â‡’ nat. inj Ï† âˆ§ range Ï† = C i âˆ§ strict_mono Ï†" for i
    by (metis bij_betw_imp_inj_on bij_betw_imp_surj_on bij_enumerate enumerate_mono infC strict_mono_def)
  then obtain Ï†:: "[nat,nat] â‡’ nat"
      where Ï†: "â‹€i. inj (Ï† i) âˆ§ range (Ï† i) = C i âˆ§ strict_mono (Ï† i)"
    by metis
  then have Ï€_in_C [simp]: "Ï† i j âˆˆ C i' âŸ· i'=i" for i i' j
    using dis by (fastforce simp: pairwise_def disjnt_def)
  have less_iff [simp]: "Ï† i j' < Ï† i j âŸ· j' < j" for i j' j
    by (simp add: Ï† strict_mono_less)
  let ?a = "Ï† 0"
  define X where "X â‰¡ {(?a i, b) | i b. ?a i < b âˆ§ b âˆˆ C (Suc i)}"
  show thesis
  proof
    show "X âŠ† UU"
      by (auto simp: X_def UU_def)
    show "ordertype X pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2"
    proof (rule antisym)
      have "ordertype X pair_less â‰¤ ordertype UU pair_less"
        by (simp add: â€¹X âŠ† UUâ€º ordertype_mono)
      then show "ordertype X pair_less â‰¤ Ï‰â†‘2"
        using ordertype_UU_Ï‰2 by auto
      define Ï€ where "Ï€ â‰¡ Î»(i,j::nat). (?a i, Ï† (Suc i) (?a j))"
      have "â‹€i j. i < j âŸ¹ Ï† 0 i < Ï† (Suc i) (Ï† 0 j)"
        by (meson Ï† le_less_trans less_iff strict_mono_imp_increasing)
      then have subX: "Ï€ ` UU âŠ† X"
        by (auto simp: UU_def Ï€_def X_def)
      then have "ordertype (Ï€ ` UU) pair_less â‰¤ ordertype X pair_less"
        by (simp add: ordertype_mono)
      moreover have "ordertype (Ï€ ` UU) pair_less = ordertype UU pair_less"
      proof (rule ordertype_inc_eq)
        show "(Ï€ x, Ï€ y) âˆˆ pair_less"
          if "x âˆˆ UU" "y âˆˆ UU" and "(x, y) âˆˆ pair_less" for x y
          using that by (auto simp: UU_def Ï€_def pair_less_def)
      qed auto
      ultimately show "Ï‰â†‘2 â‰¤ ordertype X pair_less"
        using ordertype_UU_Ï‰2 by simp
    qed
  next
    fix U
    assume "U âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡–"
    then obtain a b c d where Ueq: "U = {(a,b),(c,d)}" and ne: "(a,b) â‰  (c,d)" and inX: "(a,b) âˆˆ X" "(c,d) âˆˆ X" and "a â‰¤ c"
      apply (auto simp: nsets_def subset_iff eval_nat_numeral card_Suc_eq Set.doubleton_eq_iff)
       apply (metis  nat_le_linear)+
      done
    show "(âˆƒk<4. form U k) âˆ§ scheme U âŠ† N"
    proof
      show "scheme U âŠ† N"
        using inX N Ï† by (fastforce simp: scheme_def Ueq X_def)
    next
      consider "a < c" | "a = c âˆ§ b â‰  d"
        using â€¹a â‰¤ câ€º ne nat_less_le by blast
      then show "âˆƒk<4. form U k"
      proof cases
        case 1
        have *: "a < b"  "b â‰  c" "c < d"
          using inX by (auto simp: X_def)
        moreover have "âŸ¦a < c; c < b; Â¬ d < bâŸ§ âŸ¹ b < d"
          using inX apply (clarsimp simp: X_def not_less)
          by (metis Ï† Ï€_in_C imageE nat.inject nat_less_le)
        ultimately consider (k0) "a<b âˆ§ b<c âˆ§ c<d" | (k1) "a<c âˆ§ c<b âˆ§ b<d" | (k2) "a<c âˆ§ c<d âˆ§ d<b"
          using 1 less_linear by blast
        then show ?thesis
        proof cases
          case k0
          then have "form U 0"
            unfolding form_def form_split_def using Ueq â€¹a â‰¤ câ€º by blast
          then show ?thesis by force
        next
          case k1
          then have "form U 1"
            unfolding form_def form_split_def using Ueq â€¹a â‰¤ câ€º by blast
          then show ?thesis by force
        next
          case k2
          then have "form U 2"
            unfolding form_def form_split_def using Ueq â€¹a â‰¤ câ€º by blast
          then show ?thesis by force
        qed
      next
        case 2
        then have "form_split a b c d 3"
          by (auto simp: form_split_def)
        then show ?thesis
          using Ueq form_def leI by force
      qed
    qed
  qed
qed

text â€¹Theorem 2.1 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
lemma Specker_aux:
  assumes "Î± âˆˆ elts Ï‰"
  shows "partn_lst pair_less UU [Ï‰â†‘2,Î±] 2"
  unfolding partn_lst_def
proof clarsimp
  fix f
  assume f: "f âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
  let ?P0 = "âˆƒX âŠ† UU. ordertype X pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2 âˆ§ f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
  let ?P1 = "âˆƒM âŠ† UU. ordertype M pair_less = Î± âˆ§ f ` [M]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
  have â€ : "?P0 âˆ¨ ?P1"
  proof (rule disjCI)
    assume "Â¬ ?P1"
    then have not1: "â‹€M. âŸ¦M âŠ† UU; ordertype M pair_less = Î±âŸ§ âŸ¹ âˆƒxâˆˆ[M]â‡—2â‡–. f x â‰  Suc 0" 
      by auto
    obtain m where m: "Î± = ord_of_nat m"
      using assms elts_Ï‰ by auto
    then have f_eq_0: "M âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡– âŸ¹ âˆƒxâˆˆ[M]â‡—2â‡–. f x = 0" for M
      using not1 [of M] finite_ordertype_eq_card [of M pair_less m] f
      apply (clarsimp simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral Pi_def)
      by (meson less_Suc0 not_less_less_Suc_eq subset_trans)
    obtain N js where "infinite N" and N: "â‹€k u. âŸ¦k < 4; u âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–; form u k; scheme u âŠ† NâŸ§ âŸ¹ f u = js!k"
      using f lemma_2_3 by blast
    obtain M0 where M0: "M0 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M0]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ form u 0" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M0]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ scheme u âŠ† N"
      by (rule lemma_2_4 [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º]) auto
    obtain M1 where M1: "M1 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M1]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ form u 1" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M1]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ scheme u âŠ† N"
      by (rule lemma_2_4 [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º]) auto
    obtain M2 where M2: "M2 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M2]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ form u 2" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M2]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ scheme u âŠ† N"
      by (rule lemma_2_4 [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º]) auto
    obtain M3 where M3: "M3 âˆˆ [UU]â‡—mâ‡–" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M3]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ form u 3" "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M3]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ scheme u âŠ† N"
      by (rule lemma_2_4 [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º]) auto
    have "js!0 = 0"
      using N [of 0 ] M0 f_eq_0 [of M0] by (force simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral)
    moreover have "js!1 = 0"
      using N [of 1] M1 f_eq_0 [of M1] by (force simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral)
    moreover have "js!2 = 0"
      using N [of 2 ] M2 f_eq_0 [of M2] by (force simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral)
    moreover have "js!3 = 0"
      using N [of 3 ] M3 f_eq_0 [of M3] by (force simp: nsets_def eval_nat_numeral)
    ultimately have js0: "js!k = 0" if "k < 4" for k
      using that by (auto simp: eval_nat_numeral less_Suc_eq)
    obtain X where "X âŠ† UU" and otX: "ordertype X pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2"
      and X: "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ (âˆƒk<4. form u k) âˆ§ scheme u âŠ† N"
      using â€¹infinite Nâ€º lemma_2_5 by auto
    moreover have "f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
    proof (clarsimp simp: image_subset_iff)
      fix u
      assume u: "u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡–"
      then have u_UU2: "u âˆˆ [UU]â‡—2â‡–"
        using â€¹X âŠ† UUâ€º nsets_mono by blast
      show "f u = 0"
        using X u N [OF _ u_UU2] js0 by auto
    qed
    ultimately show "âˆƒX âŠ† UU. ordertype X pair_less = Ï‰â†‘2 âˆ§ f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
      by blast
  qed
  then show "âˆƒi<Suc (Suc 0). âˆƒHâŠ†UU. ordertype H pair_less = [Ï‰â†‘2, Î±] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
  proof 
    show "?P0 âŸ¹ ?thesis"
      by (metis nth_Cons_0 numeral_2_eq_2 pos2)
    show "?P1 âŸ¹ ?thesis"
      by (metis One_nat_def lessI nth_Cons_0 nth_Cons_Suc)
  qed
qed

theorem Specker: "Î± âˆˆ elts Ï‰ âŸ¹ partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘2) [Ï‰â†‘2,Î±] 2"
  using partn_lst_imp_partn_lst_VWF_eq [OF Specker_aux] ordertype_UU_Ï‰2 wf_pair_less by blast

end

Theory Erdos_Milner

theory Erdos_Milner
  imports Partitions

begin

subsection â€¹ErdÅ‘s-Milner theoremâ€º

text â€¹P. ErdÅ‘s and E. C. Milner, A Theorem in the Partition Calculus.
Canadian Math. Bull. 15:4 (1972), 501-505.
Corrigendum, Canadian Math. Bull. 17:2 (1974), 305.â€º

text â€¹The paper defines strong types as satisfying the criteria below.
      It remarks that ordinals satisfy those criteria. Here is a (too complicated) proof.â€º
proposition strong_ordertype_eq:
  assumes D: "D âŠ† elts Î²" and "Ord Î²"
  obtains L where "â‹ƒ(List.set L) = D" "â‹€X. X âˆˆ List.set L âŸ¹ indecomposable (tp X)"
    and "â‹€M. âŸ¦M âŠ† D; â‹€X. X âˆˆ List.set L âŸ¹ tp (M âˆ© X) â‰¥ tp XâŸ§ âŸ¹ tp M = tp D"
proof -
  define Ï† where "Ï† â‰¡ inv_into D (ordermap D VWF)"
  then have bij_Ï†: "bij_betw Ï† (elts (tp D)) D"
    using D bij_betw_inv_into down ordermap_bij by blast
  have Ï†_cancel_left: "â‹€d. d âˆˆ D âŸ¹ Ï† (ordermap D VWF d) = d"
    by (metis D Ï†_def bij_betw_inv_into_left down_raw ordermap_bij small_iff_range total_on_VWF wf_VWF)
  have Ï†_cancel_right: "â‹€Î³. Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp D) âŸ¹ ordermap D VWF (Ï† Î³) = Î³"
    by (metis Ï†_def f_inv_into_f ordermap_surj subsetD)
  have "small D" "D âŠ† ON"
    using assms down elts_subset_ON [of Î²] by auto
  then have Ï†_less_iff: "â‹€Î³ Î´. âŸ¦Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp D); Î´ âˆˆ elts (tp D)âŸ§ âŸ¹ Ï† Î³ < Ï† Î´ âŸ· Î³ < Î´"
    using ordermap_mono_less [of _ _ VWF D] bij_betw_apply [OF bij_Ï†] VWF_iff_Ord_less Ï†_cancel_right trans_VWF wf_VWF
    by (metis ON_imp_Ord Ord_linear2 less_V_def order.asym)
  obtain Î±s where "List.set Î±s âŠ† ON" and "Ï‰_dec Î±s" and tpD_eq: "tp D = Ï‰_sum Î±s"
    using Ord_ordertype Ï‰_nf_exists by blast                â€• â€¹Cantor normal form of the ordertypeâ€º
  have ord [simp]: "Ord (Î±s ! k)" "Ord (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s))" if "k < length Î±s" for k
    using that â€¹list.set Î±s âŠ† ONâ€º
    by (auto simp: dual_order.trans set_take_subset elim: ON_imp_Ord)
  define E where "E â‰¡ Î»k. lift (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s)) (Ï‰â†‘(Î±s!k))"
  define L where "L â‰¡ map (Î»k. Ï† ` (elts (E k))) [0..<length Î±s]"
  have [simp]: "length L = length Î±s"
    by (simp add: L_def)
  have in_elts_E_less: "x' < x"
    if "x' âˆˆ elts (E k')" "x âˆˆ elts (E k)" "k'<k" "k < length Î±s" for k k' x' x
                                      â€• â€¹The ordinals have been partitioned into disjoint intervalsâ€º
  proof -
    have ordÏ‰: "Ord (Ï‰ â†‘ Î±s ! k')"
      using that by auto
    from that id_take_nth_drop [of k' "take k Î±s"]
    obtain l where "take k Î±s = take k' Î±s @ (Î±s!k') # l"
      by (simp add: min_def)
    then show ?thesis
      using that  by (auto simp: E_def lift_def add.assoc dest!: OrdmemD [OF ordÏ‰] intro: less_le_trans)
  qed
  have elts_E: "elts (E k) âŠ† elts (Ï‰_sum Î±s)"
    if "k < length Î±s" for k
  proof -
    have "Ï‰ â†‘ (Î±s!k) â‰¤ Ï‰_sum (drop k Î±s)"
      by (metis that Cons_nth_drop_Suc Ï‰_sum_Cons add_le_cancel_left0)
    then have "(+) (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s)) ` elts (Ï‰ â†‘ (Î±s!k)) âŠ† elts (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s) + Ï‰_sum (drop k Î±s))"
      by blast
    also have "â€¦ = elts (Ï‰_sum Î±s)"
      using Ï‰_sum_take_drop by auto
    finally show ?thesis
      by (simp add: lift_def E_def)
  qed
  have Ï‰_sum_in_tpD: "Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s) + Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp D)"
    if "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ Î±s!k)" "k < length Î±s" for Î³ k
    using elts_E lift_def that tpD_eq by (auto simp: E_def)
  have Ord_Ï†: "Ord (Ï† (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s) + Î³))"
    if "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ Î±s!k)" "k < length Î±s" for Î³ k
    using Ï‰_sum_in_tpD â€¹D âŠ† ONâ€º bij_Ï† bij_betw_imp_surj_on that by fastforce
  define Ï€ where "Ï€ â‰¡ Î»k. ((Î»y. odiff y (Ï‰_sum (take k Î±s))) âˆ˜ ordermap D VWF)"
      â€• â€¹mapping the segments of @{term D} into some power of @{term Ï‰}â€º
  have bij_Ï€: "bij_betw (Ï€ k) (Ï† ` elts (E k)) (elts (Ï‰ â†‘ (Î±s!k)))"
    if "k < length Î±s" for k
    using that by (auto simp: bij_betw_def Ï€_def E_def inj_on_def lift_def image_comp Ï‰_sum_in_tpD Ï†_cancel_right that)
  have Ï€_iff: "Ï€ k x < Ï€ k y âŸ· (x,y) âˆˆ VWF"
    if "x âˆˆ Ï† ` elts (E k)" "y âˆˆ Ï† ` elts (E k)" "k < length Î±s" for k x y
    using that
    by (auto simp: Ï€_def E_def lift_def Ï‰_sum_in_tpD Ï†_cancel_right Ord_Ï† Ï†_less_iff)
  have tp_E_eq [simp]: "tp (Ï† ` elts (E k)) = Ï‰â†‘(Î±s!k)"
    if k: "k < length Î±s" for k
    using ordertype_eq_iff Ï€_iff bij_Ï€ that
    by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_oexp ord(1) ordertype_VWF_eq_iff replacement small_elts)
  have tp_L_eq [simp]: "tp (L!k) = Ï‰â†‘(Î±s!k)"
    if "k < length Î±s" for k
    by (simp add: L_def that)
  have UL_eq_D: "â‹ƒ (list.set L) = D"
  proof (rule antisym)
    show "â‹ƒ (list.set L) âŠ† D"
      by (force simp: L_def tpD_eq bij_betw_apply [OF bij_Ï†] dest: elts_E)
    show "D âŠ† â‹ƒ (list.set L)"
    proof
      fix Î´
      assume "Î´ âˆˆ D"
      then have "ordermap D VWF Î´ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰_sum Î±s)"
        by (metis â€¹small Dâ€º ordermap_in_ordertype tpD_eq)
      then show "Î´ âˆˆ â‹ƒ (list.set L)"
        using â€¹Î´ âˆˆ Dâ€º Ï†_cancel_left in_elts_Ï‰_sum
        by (fastforce simp: L_def E_def image_iff lift_def)
    qed
  qed
  show thesis
  proof
    show "indecomposable (tp X)" if "X âˆˆ list.set L" for X
      using that by (auto simp: L_def indecomposable_Ï‰_power)
  next
    fix M
    assume "M âŠ† D" and *: "â‹€X. X âˆˆ list.set L âŸ¹ tp X â‰¤ tp (M âˆ© X)"
    show "tp M = tp D"
    proof (rule antisym)
      show "tp M â‰¤ tp D"
        by (simp add: â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º â€¹small Dâ€º ordertype_VWF_mono)
      define Ïƒ where "Ïƒ â‰¡ Î»X. inv_into (M âˆ© X) (ordermap (M âˆ© X) VWF)"
                              â€• â€¹The bijection from an @{term Ï‰}-power into the appropriate segment of @{term M}â€º
      have bij_Ïƒ: "bij_betw (Ïƒ X) (elts (tp (M âˆ© X))) (M âˆ© X)" for X
        unfolding Ïƒ_def
        by (metis (no_types) â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º â€¹small Dâ€º bij_betw_inv_into inf_le1 ordermap_bij subset_iff_less_eq_V total_on_VWF wf_VWF)
      have Ord_Ïƒ: "Ord (Ïƒ X Î±)" if "Î± âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© X))" for Î± X
        using â€¹D âŠ† ONâ€º â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º bij_betw_apply [OF bij_Ïƒ] that by blast
      have Ïƒ_cancel_right: "â‹€Î³ X. Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© X)) âŸ¹ ordermap (M âˆ© X) VWF (Ïƒ X Î³) = Î³"
        by (metis Ïƒ_def f_inv_into_f ordermap_surj subsetD)
      have smM: "small (M âˆ© X)" for X
        by (meson â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º â€¹small Dâ€º inf_le1 subset_iff_less_eq_V)
      then have Ïƒ_less: "â‹€X Î³ Î´. âŸ¦Î³ < Î´; Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© X)); Î´ âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© X))âŸ§
                          âŸ¹ Ïƒ X Î³ < Ïƒ X Î´"
        using ordermap_mono_less bij_betw_apply [OF bij_Ïƒ] VWF_iff_Ord_less Ïƒ_cancel_right trans_VWF wf_VWF
        by (metis Ord_Ïƒ Ord_linear_lt less_imp_not_less ordermap_mono_less)
      have "âˆƒk < length Î±s. Î³ âˆˆ elts (E k)" if Î³: "Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp D)" for Î³
      proof -
        obtain X where "X âˆˆ set L" and X: "Ï† Î³ âˆˆ X"
          by (metis UL_eq_D Î³ Union_iff Ï†_def in_mono inv_into_into ordermap_surj)
        then have "âˆƒk < length Î±s. Î³ âˆˆ elts (E k) âˆ§ X = Ï† ` elts (E k)"
          apply (clarsimp simp: L_def)
          by (metis Î³ Ï†_cancel_right elts_E in_mono tpD_eq)
        then show ?thesis
          by blast
      qed
      then obtain K where K: "â‹€Î³. Î³ âˆˆ elts (tp D) âŸ¹ K Î³ < length Î±s âˆ§ Î³ âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³))"
        by metis  â€• â€¹The index from @{term "tp D"} to the appropriate segment numberâ€º
      define Ïˆ where "Ïˆ â‰¡ Î»d. Ïƒ (L ! K (ordermap D VWF d)) (Ï€ (K (ordermap D VWF d)) d)"
      show "tp D â‰¤ tp M"
      proof (rule ordertype_inc_le)
        show "small D" "small M"
          using â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º â€¹small Dâ€º subset_iff_less_eq_V by auto
      next
        fix d' d
        assume xy: "d' âˆˆ D" "d âˆˆ D" and "(d',d) âˆˆ VWF"
        then have "d' < d"
          using ON_imp_Ord â€¹D âŠ† ONâ€º by auto
        define Î³' where "Î³' â‰¡ ordermap D VWF d'"
        define Î³ where "Î³ â‰¡ ordermap D VWF d"
        have len': "K Î³' < length Î±s" and elts': "Î³' âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³'))"
            and len: "K Î³ < length Î±s" and elts: "Î³ âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³))"
          using K â€¹d' âˆˆ Dâ€º â€¹d âˆˆ Dâ€º by (auto simp: Î³'_def Î³_def â€¹small Dâ€º ordermap_in_ordertype)
        have **: "â‹€X w. âŸ¦X âˆˆ list.set L; w âˆˆ elts (tp X)âŸ§ âŸ¹ w âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© X))"
          using "*" by blast
        have Ord_ÏƒL: "Ord (Ïƒ (L!k) (Ï€ k d))" if "d âˆˆ Ï† ` elts (E k)" "k < length Î±s" for k d
          by (metis "**" Ord_Ïƒ â€¹length L = length Î±sâ€º bij_Ï€ bij_betw_imp_surj_on imageI nth_mem that tp_L_eq)
        have "Î³' < Î³"
          by (metis Î³'_def Î³_def â€¹d' < dâ€º â€¹small Dâ€º Ï†_cancel_left Ï†_less_iff ordermap_in_ordertype xy)
        then have "K Î³' â‰¤ K Î³"
          using elts' elts by (meson in_elts_E_less leI len' less_asym)
        then consider (less) "K Î³' < K Î³" | (equal) "K Î³' = K Î³"
          by linarith
        then have "Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d') < Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d)"
        proof cases
          case less
          obtain â€ : "Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d') âˆˆ M âˆ© L ! K Î³'" "Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d) âˆˆ M âˆ© L ! K Î³"
            using elts' elts len' len
            unfolding Î³'_def Î³_def
            by (metis "**" â€¹length L = length Î±sâ€º Ï†_cancel_left bij_Ï€ bij_Ïƒ bij_betw_imp_surj_on imageI nth_mem tp_L_eq xy)
          then have "ordermap D VWF (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d')) âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³'))" "ordermap D VWF (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d)) âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³))"
            using len' len elts_E tpD_eq
            by (fastforce simp: L_def Î³'_def Î³_def Ï†_cancel_right)+
          then have "ordermap D VWF (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d')) < ordermap D VWF (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d))"
            using in_elts_E_less len less by blast
          moreover have "Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d') âˆˆ D" "Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d) âˆˆ D"
            using â€¹M âŠ† Dâ€º â€  by auto
          ultimately show ?thesis
            by (metis â€¹small Dâ€º Ï†_cancel_left Ï†_less_iff ordermap_in_ordertype)
        next
          case equal
          show ?thesis
            unfolding equal
          proof (rule Ïƒ_less)
            show "Ï€ (K Î³) d' < Ï€ (K Î³) d"
              by (metis equal Î³'_def Î³_def â€¹(d', d) âˆˆ VWFâ€º Ï†_cancel_left Ï€_iff elts elts' imageI len xy)
            have "Ï€ (K Î³) d' âˆˆ elts (tp (L ! K Î³))" "Ï€ (K Î³) d âˆˆ elts (tp (L ! K Î³))"
              using equal Ï†_cancel_left Î³'_def elts' len' Î³_def elts len xy
              by (force intro: bij_betw_apply [OF bij_Ï€])+
            then show "Ï€ (K Î³) d' âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© L ! K Î³))" "Ï€ (K Î³) d âˆˆ elts (tp (M âˆ© L ! K Î³))"
              by (simp_all add: "**" len)
          qed
        qed
        moreover have "Ord (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³') (Ï€ (K Î³') d'))"
          using Ord_ÏƒL Î³'_def Ï†_cancel_left elts' len' xy(1) by fastforce
        moreover have "Ord (Ïƒ (L ! K Î³) (Ï€ (K Î³) d))"
          using Ord_ÏƒL Î³_def Ï†_cancel_left elts len xy by fastforce
        ultimately show "(Ïˆ d', Ïˆ d) âˆˆ VWF"
          by (simp add: Ïˆ_def Î³'_def Î³_def)
      next
        show "Ïˆ ` D âŠ† M"
        proof (clarsimp simp: Ïˆ_def)
          fix d
          assume "d âˆˆ D"
          define Î³ where "Î³ â‰¡ ordermap D VWF d"
          have len: "K Î³ < length Î±s" and elts: "Î³ âˆˆ elts (E (K Î³))"
            using K â€¹d âˆˆ Dâ€º by (auto simp: Î³_def â€¹small Dâ€º ordermap_in_ordertype)
          have "Ï€ (K Î³) d âˆˆ elts (tp (L! (K Î³)))"
            using bij_Ï€ [OF len] â€¹d âˆˆ Dâ€º
            apply (simp add: L_def len)
            by (metis Î³_def Ï†_cancel_left bij_betw_imp_surj_on elts imageI)
          then have "Ïƒ (L! (K Î³)) (Ï€ (K Î³) d) âˆˆ M âˆ© (L! (K Î³))"
            using smM bij_betw_imp_surj_on [OF ordermap_bij] â€¹length L = length Î±sâ€º
            unfolding Ïƒ_def
            by (metis (no_types) "*" inv_into_into len nth_mem vsubsetD total_on_VWF wf_VWF)
          then show "Ïƒ (L ! K (ordermap D VWF d)) (Ï€ (K (ordermap D VWF d)) d) âˆˆ M"
            using Î³_def by blast
        qed
      qed auto
    qed
  qed (simp add: UL_eq_D)
qed


text â€¹The ``remark'' of ErdÅ‘s and E. C. Milner, Canad. Math. Bull. Vol. 17 (2), 1974â€º

proposition indecomposable_imp_Ex_less_sets:
  assumes indec: "indecomposable Î±" and "Î± > 1" "Ord Î²" and A: "tp A = Î±" "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)"
    and "x âˆˆ A" and A1: "tp A1 = Î±" "A1 âŠ† A"
  obtains A2 where "tp A2 = Î±" "A2 âŠ† A1" "less_sets {x} A2"
proof -
  have "Ord Î±"
    using indec indecomposable_imp_Ord by blast
  have "Limit Î±"
    by (simp add: assms indecomposable_imp_Limit)
  have "small A"
    by (meson A small_elts smaller_than_small)
  define Ï† where "Ï† â‰¡ inv_into A (ordermap A VWF)"
  then have bij_Ï†: "bij_betw Ï† (elts Î±) A"
    using A bij_betw_inv_into down ordermap_bij by blast
  have bij_om: "bij_betw (ordermap A VWF) A (elts Î±)"
    using A down ordermap_bij by blast
  define Î³ where "Î³ â‰¡ ordermap A VWF x"
  have Î³: "Î³ âˆˆ elts Î±"
    unfolding Î³_def using A â€¹x âˆˆ Aâ€º down by auto
  then have "Ord Î³"
    using Ord_in_Ord â€¹Ord Î±â€º by blast
  have "A âŠ† ON"
    by (meson Ord_mult â€¹Ord Î±â€º â€¹Ord Î²â€º A dual_order.trans elts_subset_ON)
  define B where "B â‰¡ Ï† ` (elts (succ Î³))"
  show thesis
  proof
    have "small A1"
      by (meson â€¹small Aâ€º A1 smaller_than_small)
    then have "tp (A1 - B) â‰¤ tp A1"
      unfolding B_def by (auto intro!: ordertype_VWF_mono del: vsubsetI)
    moreover have "tp (A1 - B) â‰¥ Î±"
    proof -
      have "Â¬ (Î± â‰¤ tp B)"
        unfolding B_def
      proof (subst ordertype_VWF_inc_eq)
        show "elts (succ  Î³) âŠ† ON"
          by (auto simp: Î³_def ordertype_VWF_inc_eq intro: Ord_in_Ord)
        have "elts (succ  Î³) âŠ† elts Î±"
          using Ord_trans Î³ â€¹Ord Î±â€º by auto
        then show "Ï† ` elts (succ  Î³) âŠ† ON"
          using â€¹A âŠ† ONâ€º bij_Ï† bij_betw_imp_surj_on by blast
        show "Ï† u < Ï† v"
          if "u âˆˆ elts (succ  Î³)" and "v âˆˆ elts (succ  Î³)" and "u < v" for u v
        proof -
          have "succ Î³ âˆˆ elts Î±"
            using Î³ Limit_def â€¹Limit Î±â€º by blast
          then have "u âˆˆ elts Î±" "v âˆˆ elts Î±"
            using Ord_trans â€¹Ord Î±â€º that by blast+
          then show ?thesis
            using that â€¹Limit Î±â€º â€¹small Aâ€º A bij_betwE [OF bij_Ï†]
            by (metis ON_imp_Ord Ord_linear2 â€¹A âŠ† ONâ€º Ï†_def inv_ordermap_VWF_mono_le leD)
        qed
        show "Â¬ Î± â‰¤ tp (elts (succ  Î³))"
        proof (subst ordertype_eq_Ord)
          show "Â¬ Î± â‰¤ succ Î³"
            by (meson Î³ â€¹Limit Î±â€º less_eq_V_def mem_not_refl subsetD succ_in_Limit_iff)
        qed (use â€¹Ord Î³â€º in blast)
      qed auto
      then show ?thesis
        using indecomposable_ordertype_ge [OF indec, of A1 B] â€¹small A1â€º A1
        by (auto simp: B_def)
    qed
    ultimately show "tp (A1 - B) = Î±"
      using A1 by blast
    show "less_sets {x} (A1 - B)"
    proof (clarsimp simp: less_sets_def B_def simp del: elts_succ)
      fix y
      assume "y âˆˆ A1" and y: "y âˆ‰ Ï† ` elts (succ Î³)"
      obtain "Ord x" "Ord y"
        using â€¹A âŠ† ONâ€º â€¹x âˆˆ Aâ€º â€¹y âˆˆ A1â€º A1 by auto
      have "y âˆˆ Ï† ` elts (succ Î³)" if "y âˆˆ elts (succ x)"
      proof -
        have "ordermap A VWF y âˆˆ elts (ZFC_in_HOL.succ (ordermap A VWF x))"
          using A1
          by (metis insert_iff ordermap_mono subset_iff that wf_VWF OrdmemD VWF_iff_Ord_less â€¹Ord xâ€º â€¹Ord yâ€º â€¹small Aâ€º â€¹y âˆˆ A1â€º elts_succ)
        then show ?thesis
          using that A1 unfolding Î³_def
          by (metis â€¹y âˆˆ A1â€º Ï†_def bij_betw_inv_into_left bij_om imageI subsetD)
      qed
      then show "x < y"
        by (meson Ord_linear2 Ord_mem_iff_lt Ord_succ â€¹Ord xâ€º â€¹Ord yâ€º y succ_le_iff)
    qed
  qed auto
qed


text â€¹the main theorem, from which they derive the headline resultâ€º
theorem Erdos_Milner_aux:
  fixes k::nat and Î³::V
  assumes part: "partn_lst_VWF Î± [ord_of_nat k, Î³] 2"
    and indec: "indecomposable Î±" and "k > 1" "Ord Î³" and Î²: "Î² âˆˆ elts Ï‰1"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF (Î±*Î²) [ord_of_nat (2*k), min Î³ (Ï‰*Î²)] 2"
proof (cases "Î±=1 âˆ¨ Î²=0")
  case True
  have "Ord Î²"
    using Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord Î² by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "Î²=0")
    case True
    moreover have "min Î³ 0 = 0"
      by (simp add: min_def)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by (simp add: partn_lst_triv0 [where i=1])
  next
    case False
    then have "Î±=1"
      using True by blast
    then obtain i where "i < Suc (Suc 0)" "[ord_of_nat k, Î³] ! i â‰¤ Î±"
      using partn_lst_VWF_nontriv [OF part] by auto
    then have "Î³ â‰¤ 1"
      using â€¹Î±=1â€º â€¹k > 1â€º by (fastforce simp: less_Suc_eq)
    then have "min Î³ (Ï‰*Î²) â‰¤ 1"
      by (metis Ord_1 Ord_Ï‰ Ord_linear_le Ord_mult â€¹Ord Î²â€º min_def order_trans)
    moreover have "elts Î² â‰  {}"
      using False by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by (auto simp: True â€¹Ord Î²â€º â€¹Î²â‰ 0â€º â€¹Î±=1â€º intro!: partn_lst_triv1 [where i=1])
  qed
next
  case False
  then have "Î± â‰  1" "Î² â‰  0"
    by auto
  then have "0 âˆˆ elts Î²"
    using Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord Î² mem_0_Ord by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "Î±=0")
    case True
    have â€ : "[ord_of_nat (2 * k), 0] ! 1 = 0"
      by simp
    show ?thesis
      using True assms
      by (force simp: partn_lst_def nsets_empty_iff simp flip: numeral_2_eq_2 dest!: less_2_cases intro: â€ )
  next
    case False
    then have "Î± â‰¥ Ï‰"
      using indec â€¹Î± â‰  1â€º
      by (metis Ord_Ï‰ indecomposable_is_Ï‰_power le_oexp oexp_0_right)
    then have "Î± > 1"
      using Ï‰_gt1 dual_order.strict_trans1 by blast
    show ?thesis
      unfolding partn_lst_def
    proof clarsimp
      fix f
      assume "f âˆˆ [elts (Î±*Î²)]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
      then have f: "f âˆˆ [elts (Î±*Î²)]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<2::nat}"
        by (simp add: eval_nat_numeral)
      obtain ord [iff]: "Ord Î±" "Ord Î²" "Ord (Î±*Î²)"
        using Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord Î² indec indecomposable_imp_Ord Ord_mult by blast
      have *: False
        if i [rule_format]: "âˆ€H. tp H = ord_of_nat (2*k) âŸ¶ H âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âŸ¶ Â¬ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
          and ii [rule_format]: "âˆ€H. tp H = Î³ âŸ¶ H âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âŸ¶ Â¬ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
          and iii [rule_format]: "âˆ€H. tp H = (Ï‰*Î²) âŸ¶ H âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âŸ¶ Â¬ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
      proof -
        have Ak0: "âˆƒX âˆˆ [A]â‡—kâ‡–. f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}" â€•â€¹remark (8) about @{term"A âŠ† S"}â€º
          if A_Î±Î²: "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" and ot: "tp A â‰¥ Î±" for A
        proof -
          let ?g = "inv_into A (ordermap A VWF)"
          have "small A"
            using down that by auto
          then have inj_g: "inj_on ?g (elts Î±)"
            by (meson inj_on_inv_into less_eq_V_def ordermap_surj ot subset_trans)
          have Aless: "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ A; y âˆˆ A; x < yâŸ§ âŸ¹ (x,y) âˆˆ VWF"
            by (meson Ord_in_Ord VWF_iff_Ord_less â€¹Ord(Î±*Î²)â€º subsetD that(1))
          then have om_A_less: "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ A; y âˆˆ A; x < yâŸ§ âŸ¹ ordermap A VWF x < ordermap A VWF y"
            by (auto simp: â€¹small Aâ€º ordermap_mono_less)
          have Î±_sub: "elts Î± âŠ† ordermap A VWF ` A"
            by (metis â€¹small Aâ€º elts_of_set less_eq_V_def ordertype_def ot replacement)
          have g_less: "?g x < ?g y" if "x < y" "x âˆˆ elts Î±" "y âˆˆ elts Î±" for x y
          proof -
            have "?g x âˆˆ A" "?g y âˆˆ A"
              using that by (meson Î±_sub inv_into_into subsetD)+
            moreover have "x âˆˆ ordermap A VWF ` A" "y âˆˆ ordermap A VWF ` A"
              using Î±_sub that by blast+
            moreover have "A âŠ† ON"
              using A_Î±Î² elts_subset_ON â€¹Ord(Î±*Î²)â€º by blast
            ultimately show ?thesis
              by (metis ON_imp_Ord Ord_linear_lt f_inv_into_f less_not_sym om_A_less â€¹x < yâ€º)
          qed
          have "?g âˆˆ elts Î± â†’ elts (Î± * Î²)"
            by (meson A_Î±Î² Pi_I' Î±_sub inv_into_into subset_eq)
          then have fg: "f âˆ˜ (Î»X. ?g ` X) âˆˆ [elts Î±]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<2}"
            by (rule nsets_compose_image_funcset [OF f _ inj_g])
          obtain i H where "i < 2" "H âŠ† elts Î±"
            and ot_eq: "tp H = [k,Î³]!i" "(f âˆ˜ (Î»X. ?g ` X)) ` (nsets H 2) âŠ† {i}"
            using ii partn_lst_E [OF part fg] by (auto simp: eval_nat_numeral)
          then consider (0) "i=0" | (1) "i=1"
            by linarith
          then show ?thesis
          proof cases
            case 0
            then have "f ` [inv_into A (ordermap A VWF) ` H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
              using ot_eq â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º Î±_sub by (auto simp: nsets_def [of _ k] inj_on_inv_into elim!: nset_image_obtains)
            moreover have "finite H âˆ§ card H = k"
              using 0 ot_eq â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º down by (simp add: finite_ordertype_eq_card)
            then have "inv_into A (ordermap A VWF) ` H âˆˆ [A]â‡—kâ‡–"
              using â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º Î±_sub by (auto simp: nsets_def [of _ k] card_image inj_on_inv_into inv_into_into)
            ultimately show ?thesis
              by blast
          next
            case 1
            have gH: "?g ` H âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
              by (metis A_Î±Î² Î±_sub â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º image_subsetI inv_into_into subset_eq)
            have [simp]: "tp (?g ` H) = tp H"
            proof (rule ordertype_VWF_inc_eq)
              show "?g ` H âŠ† ON"
                using elts_subset_ON gH ord(3) by auto
              show "?g x < inv_into A (ordermap A VWF) y" if "x âˆˆ H" "y âˆˆ H" "x < y" for x y
                using that â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º g_less by blast
            qed (use â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º elts_subset_ON ord down in auto)
            show ?thesis
              using ii [of "?g ` H"] ot_eq 1
              apply (auto simp: gH elim!: nset_image_obtains)
              apply (meson â€¹H âŠ† elts Î±â€º inj_g bij_betw_def inj_on_subset)
              done
          qed
        qed
        define K where "K â‰¡ Î»i x. {y âˆˆ elts (Î±*Î²). x â‰  y âˆ§ f{x,y} = i}"
        have small_K: "small (K i x)" for i x
          by (simp add: K_def)
        define KI where "KI â‰¡ Î»i X. (â‹‚xâˆˆX. K i x)"
        have KI_disj_self: "X âˆ© KI i X = {}" for i X
          by (auto simp: KI_def K_def)
        define M where "M â‰¡ Î»D ğ”„ x. {Î½::V. Î½ âˆˆ D âˆ§ tp (K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) â‰¥ Î±}"
        have M_sub_D: "M D ğ”„ x âŠ† D" for D ğ”„ x
          by (auto simp: M_def)
        have small_M [simp]: "small (M D ğ”„ x)" if "small D" for D ğ”„ x
          by (simp add: M_def that)
        have 9: "tp {x âˆˆ A. tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D} â‰¥ Î±" (is "ordertype ?AD _ â‰¥ Î±")
          if inD: "indecomposable (tp D)" and D: "D âŠ† elts Î²" and A: "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" and tpA: "tp A = Î±"
            and ğ”„: "ğ”„ âˆˆ D â†’ {X. X âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âˆ§ tp X = Î±}"  for D A ğ”„
            â€•â€¹remark (9), assuming an indecomposable order typeâ€º
        proof (rule ccontr)
          define A' where "A' â‰¡ {x âˆˆ A. Â¬ tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D}"
          have small [iff]: "small A" "small D"
            using A D down by (auto simp: M_def)
          have small_ğ”„: "small (ğ”„ Î´)" if "Î´ âˆˆ D" for Î´
            using that ğ”„ by (auto simp: Pi_iff subset_iff_less_eq_V)
          assume not_Î±_le: "Â¬ Î± â‰¤ tp {x âˆˆ A. tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D}"
          moreover
          obtain "small A" "small A'" "A' âŠ† A" and A'_sub: "A' âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
            using A'_def A down by auto
          moreover have "A' = A - ?AD"
            by (force simp: A'_def)
          ultimately have A'_ge: "tp A' â‰¥ Î±"
            by (metis (no_types, lifting) dual_order.refl indec indecomposable_ordertype_eq mem_Collect_eq subsetI tpA)
          obtain X where "X âŠ† A'" "finite X" "card X = k" and fX0: "f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
            using Ak0 [OF A'_sub A'_ge] by (auto simp: nsets_def [of _ k])
          then have â€¡: "Â¬ tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D" if "x âˆˆ X" for x
            using that by (auto simp: A'_def)
          obtain x where "x âˆˆ X"
            using â€¹card X = kâ€º â€¹k>1â€º by fastforce
          have "Â¬ D âŠ† (â‹ƒ xâˆˆX. M D ğ”„ x)"
          proof
            assume not: "D âŠ† (â‹ƒxâˆˆX. M D ğ”„ x)"
            have "âˆƒXâˆˆM D ğ”„ ` X. tp D â‰¤ tp X"
            proof (rule indecomposable_ordertype_finite_ge [OF inD])
              show "M D ğ”„ ` X â‰  {}"
                using A'_def A'_ge not not_Î±_le by auto
              show "small (â‹ƒ (M D ğ”„ ` X))"
                using â€¹finite Xâ€º by (simp add: finite_imp_small)
            qed (use â€¹finite Xâ€º not in auto)
            then show False
              by (simp add: â€¡)
          qed
          then obtain Î½ where "Î½ âˆˆ D" and Î½: "Î½ âˆ‰ (â‹ƒ xâˆˆX. M D ğ”„ x)"
            by blast
          define ğ’œ where "ğ’œ â‰¡ {KI 0 X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½, â‹ƒxâˆˆX. K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½, X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½}"
          have Î±Î²: "X âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)"
            using A'_sub â€¹X âŠ† A'â€º ğ”„ â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º by auto
          then have "KI 0 X âˆª (â‹ƒxâˆˆX. K 1 x) âˆª X = elts (Î±*Î²)"
            using â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º f by (force simp: K_def KI_def Pi_iff less_2_cases_iff)
          with Î±Î² have ğ”„Î½_ğ’œ: "finite ğ’œ" "ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† â‹ƒğ’œ"
            by (auto simp: ğ’œ_def)
          then have "Â¬ tp (K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) â‰¥ Î±" if "x âˆˆ X" for x
            using that â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º Î½ â€¹k > 1â€º â€¹card X = kâ€º by (fastforce simp: M_def)
          moreover have sm_K1: "small (â‹ƒxâˆˆX. K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½)"
            by (meson Finite_V Int_lower2 â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º â€¹finite Xâ€º small_ğ”„ small_UN smaller_than_small)
          ultimately have not1: "Â¬ tp (â‹ƒxâˆˆX. K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) â‰¥ Î±"
            using â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹x âˆˆ Xâ€º indecomposable_ordertype_finite_ge [OF indec, of "(Î»x. K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) ` X"] by blast
          moreover have "Â¬ tp (X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) â‰¥ Î±"
            using â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹Î± â‰¥ Ï‰â€º
            by (meson finite_Int mem_not_refl ordertype_VWF_Ï‰ vsubsetD)
          moreover have "Î± â‰¤ tp (ğ”„ Î½)"
            using ğ”„ â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º small_ğ”„ by fastforce+
          moreover have "small (â‹ƒ ğ’œ)"
            using â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º small_ğ”„ by (fastforce simp: ğ’œ_def intro: smaller_than_small sm_K1)
          ultimately have K0ğ”„_ge: "tp (KI 0 X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) â‰¥ Î±"
            using indecomposable_ordertype_finite_ge [OF indec ğ”„Î½_ğ’œ] by (auto simp: ğ’œ_def)
          have ğ”„Î½: "ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)" "tp (ğ”„ Î½) = Î±"
            using â€¹Î½ âˆˆ Dâ€º ğ”„ by blast+
          then obtain Y where Ysub: "Y âŠ† KI 0 X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½" and "finite Y" "card Y = k" and fY0: "f ` [Y]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
            using Ak0 [OF _ K0ğ”„_ge] by (auto simp: nsets_def [of _ k])
          have â€ : "X âˆ© Y = {}"
            using Ysub KI_disj_self by blast
          then have "card (X âˆª Y) = 2*k"
            by (simp add: â€¹card X = kâ€º â€¹card Y = kâ€º â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹finite Yâ€º card_Un_disjoint)
          moreover have "X âˆª Y âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
            using A'_sub â€¹X âŠ† A'â€º ğ”„Î½(1) â€¹Y âŠ† KI 0 X âˆ© ğ”„ Î½â€º by auto
          moreover have "f ` [X âˆª Y]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
            using fX0 fY0 Ysub by (auto simp: â€  nsets_disjoint_2 image_Un image_UN KI_def K_def)
          ultimately show False
            using i â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹finite Yâ€º ordertype_VWF_finite_nat by auto
        qed
        have IX: "tp {x âˆˆ A. tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D} â‰¥ Î±"
          if D: "D âŠ† elts Î²" and A: "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" and tpA: "tp A = Î±"
            and ğ”„: "ğ”„ âˆˆ D â†’ {X. X âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âˆ§ tp X = Î±}" for D A ğ”„
            â€•â€¹remark (9) for any order typeâ€º
        proof -
          obtain L where UL: "â‹ƒ(List.set L) âŠ† D"
