            and indL: "â‹€X. X âˆˆ List.set L âŸ¹ indecomposable (tp X)"
            and eqL: "â‹€M. âŸ¦M âŠ† D; â‹€X. X âˆˆ List.set L âŸ¹ tp (M âˆ© X) â‰¥ tp XâŸ§ âŸ¹ tp M = tp D"
            using ord by (metis strong_ordertype_eq D order_refl)
          obtain A'' where A'': "A'' âŠ† A" "tp A'' â‰¥ Î±"
            and "â‹€x X. âŸ¦x âˆˆ A''; X âˆˆ List.set LâŸ§ âŸ¹ tp (M D ğ”„ x âˆ© X) â‰¥ tp X"
            using UL indL
          proof (induction L arbitrary: thesis)
            case (Cons X L)
            then obtain A'' where A'': "A'' âŠ† A" "tp A'' â‰¥ Î±" and "X âŠ† D"
              and ge_X: "â‹€x X. âŸ¦x âˆˆ A''; X âˆˆ List.set LâŸ§ âŸ¹ tp (M D ğ”„ x âˆ© X) â‰¥ tp X" by auto
            then have tp_A'': "tp A'' = Î±"
              by (metis A antisym down ordertype_VWF_mono tpA)
            have ge_Î±: "tp {x âˆˆ A''. tp (M X ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp X} â‰¥ Î±"
              by (rule 9) (use A A'' tp_A'' Cons.prems â€¹D âŠ† elts Î²â€º â€¹X âŠ† Dâ€º ğ”„ in auto)
            let ?A = "{x âˆˆ A''. tp (M D ğ”„ x âˆ© X) â‰¥ tp X}"
            have M_eq: "M D ğ”„ x âˆ© X = M X ğ”„ x" if "x âˆˆ A''" for x
              using that â€¹X âŠ† Dâ€º by (auto simp: M_def)
            show thesis
            proof (rule Cons.prems)
              show "Î± â‰¤ tp ?A"
                using ge_Î± by (simp add: M_eq cong: conj_cong)
              show "tp Y â‰¤ tp (M D ğ”„ x âˆ© Y)" if "x âˆˆ ?A" "Y âˆˆ list.set (X # L)" for x Y
                using that ge_X by force
            qed (use A'' in auto)
          qed (use tpA in auto)
          then have tp_M_ge: "tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D" if "x âˆˆ A''" for x
            using eqL that by (auto simp: M_def)
          have "Î± â‰¤ tp A''"
            by (simp add: A'')
          also have "â€¦ â‰¤ tp {x âˆˆ A''. tp (M D ğ”„ x) â‰¥ tp D}"
            by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) tp_M_ge eq_iff mem_Collect_eq subsetI)
          also have "â€¦ â‰¤ tp {x âˆˆ A. tp D â‰¤ tp (M D ğ”„ x)}"
            by (rule ordertype_mono) (use A'' A down in auto)
          finally show ?thesis .
        qed
        have [simp]: "tp {0} = 1"
          using ordertype_eq_Ord by fastforce
        have IX': "tp {x âˆˆ A'. tp (K 1 x âˆ© A) â‰¥ Î±} â‰¥ Î±"
          if A: "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "tp A = Î±" and A': "A' âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "tp A' = Î±" for A A'
        proof -
          have â€¡: "Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 t âˆ© A)" if "t âˆˆ A'" "1 â‰¤ tp {Î½. Î½ = 0 âˆ§ Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 t âˆ© A)}" for t
            using that
            by (metis Collect_empty_eq less_eq_V_0_iff ordertype_empty zero_neq_one)
          have "tp {x âˆˆ A'. 1 â‰¤ tp {Î½. Î½ = 0 âˆ§ Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 x âˆ© A)}}
                  â‰¤ tp {x âˆˆ A'. Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 x âˆ© A)}"
            by (rule ordertype_mono) (use "â€¡" A' in â€¹auto simp: downâ€º)
          then show ?thesis
            using IX [of "{0}" A' "Î»x. A"] that â€¹0 âˆˆ elts Î²â€º
            by (simp add: M_def cong: conj_cong)
        qed

        have 10: "âˆƒx0 âˆˆ A. âˆƒg âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î². strict_mono_on g (elts Î²) âˆ§ (âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ F. g Î½ = Î½)
                                      âˆ§ (âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ elts Î². tp (K 1 x0 âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) â‰¥ Î±)"
          if F: "finite F" "F âŠ† elts Î²"
            and A: "A âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "tp A = Î±"
            and ğ”„: "ğ”„ âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ {X. X âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²) âˆ§ tp X = Î±}"
          for F A ğ”„
        proof -
          define p where "p â‰¡ card F"
          have "Î² âˆ‰ F"
            using that by auto
          then obtain Î¹ :: "nat â‡’ V" where bijÎ¹: "bij_betw Î¹ {..p} (insert Î² F)" and monÎ¹: "strict_mono_on Î¹ {..p}"
            using ZFC_Cardinals.ex_bij_betw_strict_mono_card [of "insert Î² F"] elts_subset_ON â€¹Ord Î²â€º F
            by (simp add: p_def lessThan_Suc_atMost) blast
          have less_Î¹_I: "Î¹ k < Î¹ l" if "k < l" "l â‰¤ p" for k l
            using monÎ¹ that by (auto simp: strict_mono_on_def)
          then have less_Î¹_D: "k < l" if "Î¹ k < Î¹ l" "k â‰¤ p" for k l
            by (metis less_asym linorder_neqE_nat that)
          have Ord_Î¹: "Ord (Î¹ k)" if "k â‰¤ p" for k
            by (metis (no_types, lifting) ON_imp_Ord atMost_iff insert_subset mem_Collect_eq order_trans  â€¹F âŠ† elts Î²â€º bijÎ¹ bij_betwE elts_subset_ON â€¹Ord Î²â€º that)
          have le_Î¹0 [simp]: "â‹€j. j â‰¤ p âŸ¹ Î¹ 0 â‰¤ Î¹ j"
            by (metis eq_refl leI le_0_eq less_Î¹_I less_imp_le)
          have le_Î¹: "Î¹ i â‰¤ Î¹ (j - Suc 0)" if "i < j" "j â‰¤ p" for i j
          proof (cases i)
            case 0 then show ?thesis
              using le_Î¹0 that by auto
          next
            case (Suc i') then show ?thesis
              by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) Suc_pred le_less less_Suc_eq less_Suc_eq_0_disj less_Î¹_I not_less_eq that)
          qed

          have [simp]: "Î¹ p = Î²"
          proof -
            obtain k where k: "Î¹ k = Î²" "k â‰¤ p"
              by (meson atMost_iff bijÎ¹ bij_betw_iff_bijections insertI1)
            then have "k = p âˆ¨ k < p"
              by linarith
            then show ?thesis
              using bijÎ¹ ord k that(2)
              by (metis OrdmemD atMost_iff bij_betw_iff_bijections insert_iff leD less_Î¹_D order_refl subsetD)
          qed

          have F_imp_Ex: "âˆƒk < p. Î¾ = Î¹ k" if "Î¾ âˆˆ F" for Î¾
          proof -
            obtain k where k: "k â‰¤ p" "Î¾ = Î¹ k"
              by (metis â€¹Î¾ âˆˆ Fâ€º atMost_iff bijÎ¹ bij_betw_def imageE insert_iff)
            then have "k â‰  p"
              using that F by auto
            with k show ?thesis
              using le_neq_implies_less by blast
          qed
          have F_imp_ge: "Î¾ â‰¥ Î¹ 0" if "Î¾ âˆˆ F" for Î¾
            using F_imp_Ex [OF that] by (metis dual_order.order_iff_strict le0 less_Î¹_I)
          define D where "D â‰¡ Î»k. (if k=0 then {..<Î¹ 0} else {Î¹ (k-1)<..<Î¹ k}) âˆ© elts Î²"
          have DÎ²: "D k âŠ† elts Î²" for k
            by (auto simp: D_def)
          then have small_D [simp]: "small (D k)" for k
            by (meson down)
          have M_Int_D: "M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x âˆ© D k = M (D k) ğ”„ x" if "k â‰¤ p" for x k
            using DÎ² by (auto simp: M_def)
          have Î¹_le_if_D: "Î¹ k â‰¤ Î¼" if "Î¼ âˆˆ D (Suc k)" for Î¼ k
            using that
            by (simp add: D_def order.order_iff_strict split: if_split_asm)
          have "disjnt (D i) (D j)" if "i < j" "j â‰¤ p" for i j
          proof (cases j)
            case (Suc j')
            then show ?thesis
              using that
              apply (auto simp: disjnt_def D_def)
              using not_less_eq by (blast intro: less_Î¹_D less_trans Suc_leD)+
          qed (use that in auto)
          then have disjnt_DD: "disjnt (D i) (D j)" if "i â‰  j" "i â‰¤ p" "j â‰¤ p" for i j
            using disjnt_sym nat_neq_iff that by auto
          have UN_D_eq: "(â‹ƒl â‰¤ k. D l) = {..<Î¹ k} âˆ© (elts Î² - F)" if "k â‰¤ p" for k
            using that
          proof (induction k)
            case 0
            then show ?case
              by (auto simp: D_def F_imp_ge leD)
          next
            case (Suc k)
            have "D (Suc k) âˆª {..<Î¹ k} âˆ© (elts Î² - F) = {..<Î¹ (Suc k)} âˆ© (elts Î² - F)"
              (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
            proof
              show "?lhs âŠ† ?rhs"
                using Suc.prems
                by (auto simp: D_def if_split_mem2 intro: less_Î¹_I less_trans dest!: less_Î¹_D F_imp_Ex)
              have "â‹€x. âŸ¦x < Î¹ (Suc k); x âˆˆ elts Î²; x âˆ‰ F; Î¹ k â‰¤ xâŸ§ âŸ¹ Î¹ k < x"
                using Suc.prems â€¹F âŠ† elts Î²â€º bijÎ¹ le_imp_less_or_eq
                by (fastforce simp: bij_betw_iff_bijections)
              then show "?rhs âŠ† ?lhs"
                using Suc.prems by (auto simp: D_def Ord_not_less Ord_in_Ord [OF â€¹Ord Î²â€º] Ord_Î¹ if_split_mem2)
            qed
            then
            show ?case
              using Suc by (simp add: atMost_Suc)
          qed
          have Î²_decomp: "elts Î² = F âˆª (â‹ƒk â‰¤ p. D k)"
            using â€¹F âŠ† elts Î²â€º OrdmemD [OF â€¹Ord Î²â€º] by (auto simp: UN_D_eq)
          define Î²idx where "Î²idx â‰¡ Î»Î½. @k. Î½ âˆˆ D k âˆ§ k â‰¤ p"
          have Î²idx: "Î½ âˆˆ D (Î²idx Î½) âˆ§ Î²idx Î½ â‰¤ p" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î² - F" for Î½
            using that by (force simp: Î²idx_def Î²_decomp intro: someI_ex del: conjI)
          have any_imp_Î²idx: "k = Î²idx Î½" if "Î½ âˆˆ D k" "k â‰¤ p" for k Î½
          proof (rule ccontr)
            assume non: "k â‰  Î²idx Î½"
            have "Î½ âˆ‰ F"
              using that UN_D_eq by auto
            then show False
              using disjnt_DD [OF non] by (metis DÎ² Diff_iff Î²idx disjnt_iff subsetD that)
          qed
          have "âˆƒA'. A' âŠ† A âˆ§ tp A' = Î± âˆ§ (âˆ€x âˆˆ A'. F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x)"
            using F
          proof induction
            case (insert Î½ F)
            then obtain A' where "A' âŠ† A" and A': "A' âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "tp A' = Î±" and FN: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A' âŸ¹ F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
              using A(1) by auto
            define A'' where "A'' â‰¡ {x âˆˆ A'. Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½)}"
            have "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" "F âŠ† elts Î²"
              using insert by auto
            note ordertype_eq_Ord [OF â€¹Ord Î²â€º, simp]
            show ?case
            proof (intro exI conjI)
              show "A'' âŠ† A"
                using â€¹A' âŠ† Aâ€º by (auto simp: A''_def)
              have "tp A'' â‰¤ Î±"
                using â€¹A'' âŠ† Aâ€º down ordertype_VWF_mono A by blast
              moreover have "ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)" "tp (ğ”„ Î½) = Î±"
                using ğ”„ â€¹Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²â€º by auto
              then have "Î± â‰¤ tp A''"
                using IX' [OF _ _ A'] by (simp add: A''_def)
              ultimately show "tp A'' = Î±"
                by (rule antisym)
              have "Î½ âˆˆ M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x" "F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
                if "x âˆˆ A''" for x
              proof -
                show "F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
                  using A''_def FN that by blast
                show "Î½ âˆˆ M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
                  using â€¹Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²â€º that by (simp add: M_def A''_def)
              qed
              then show "âˆ€xâˆˆA''. insert Î½ F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
                by blast
            qed
          qed (use A in auto)
          then obtain A' where A': "A' âŠ† A" "tp A' = Î±" and FN: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A' âŸ¹ F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
            by metis
          have False
            if *: "â‹€x0 g. âŸ¦x0 âˆˆ A; g âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î²; strict_mono_on g (elts Î²)âŸ§
                   âŸ¹ (âˆƒÎ½âˆˆF. g Î½ â‰  Î½) âˆ¨ (âˆƒÎ½âˆˆelts Î². tp (K 1 x0 âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) < Î±)"
          proof -
            { fix x       â€• â€¹construction of the monotone map @{term g} mentioned aboveâ€º
              assume "x âˆˆ A'"
              with A' have "x âˆˆ A" by blast
              have "âˆƒk. k â‰¤ p âˆ§ tp (M (D k) ğ”„ x) < tp (D k)" (is "?P")
              proof (rule ccontr)
                assume "Â¬ ?P"
                then have le: "tp (D k) â‰¤ tp (M (D k) ğ”„ x)" if "k â‰¤ p" for k
                  by (meson Ord_linear2 Ord_ordertype that)
                have "âˆƒfâˆˆD k â†’ M (D k) ğ”„ x. inj_on f (D k) âˆ§ (strict_mono_on f (D k))"
                     if "k â‰¤ p" for k
                  using le [OF that] that VWF_iff_Ord_less
                  apply (clarsimp simp: ordertype_le_ordertype strict_mono_on_def)
                  by (metis (full_types) DÎ² M_sub_D Ord_in_Ord PiE VWF_iff_Ord_less ord(2) subsetD)
                then obtain h where fun_h: "â‹€k. k â‰¤ p âŸ¹ h k âˆˆ D k â†’ M (D k) ğ”„ x"
                  and inj_h: "â‹€k. k â‰¤ p âŸ¹ inj_on (h k) (D k)"
                  and mono_h: "â‹€k x y. k â‰¤ p âŸ¹ strict_mono_on (h k) (D k)"
                  by metis
                then have fun_hD: "â‹€k. k â‰¤ p âŸ¹ h k âˆˆ D k â†’ D k"
                  by (auto simp: M_def)
                have h_increasing: "Î½ â‰¤ h k Î½"
                  if "k â‰¤ p" and Î½: "Î½ âˆˆ D k" for k Î½
                proof (rule Ord_mono_imp_increasing)
                  show "h k âˆˆ D k â†’ D k"
                    by (simp add: fun_hD that(1))
                  show "D k âŠ† ON"
                    using DÎ² elts_subset_ON ord(2) by blast
                qed (auto simp: that mono_h)
                define g where "g â‰¡ Î»Î½. if Î½ âˆˆ F then Î½ else h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                have [simp]: "g Î½ = Î½" if "Î½ âˆˆ F" for Î½
                  using that by (auto simp: g_def)
                have fun_g: "g âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î²"
                proof (rule Pi_I)
                  fix x assume "x âˆˆ elts Î²"
                  then have "x âˆˆ D (Î²idx x)" "Î²idx x â‰¤ p" if "x âˆ‰ F"
                    using that by (auto simp: Î²idx)
                  then show "g x âˆˆ elts Î²"
                    using fun_h  DÎ² M_sub_D â€¹x âˆˆ elts Î²â€º
                    by (simp add: g_def) blast
                qed
                have h_in_D: "h (Î²idx Î½) Î½ âˆˆ D (Î²idx Î½)" if "Î½ âˆ‰ F" "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½
                  using Î²idx fun_hD that by fastforce
                have 1: "Î¹ k < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                  if "k < p" and Î½: "Î½ âˆ‰ F" "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" and "Î¹ k < Î½" for k Î½
                  using that h_in_D [OF Î½] Î²idx
                  by (fastforce simp: D_def dest: h_increasing split: if_split_asm)
                moreover have 2: "h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼ < Î¹ k"
                  if Î¼: "Î¼ âˆ‰ F" "Î¼ âˆˆ elts Î²" and "k < p" "Î¼ < Î¹ k" for Î¼ k
                proof -
                  have "Î²idx Î¼ â‰¤ k"
                  proof (rule ccontr)
                    assume "Â¬ Î²idx Î¼ â‰¤ k"
                    then have "k < Î²idx Î¼"
                      by linarith
                    then show False
                      using Î¹_le_if_D Î²idx
                      by (metis Diff_iff Suc_pred le0 leD le_Î¹ le_less_trans Î¼ â€¹Î¼ < Î¹ kâ€º)
                  qed
                  then show ?thesis
                    using that h_in_D [OF Î¼]
                    apply (simp add: D_def split: if_split_asm)
                     apply (metis (no_types) dual_order.order_iff_strict le0 less_Î¹_I less_trans)
                    by (metis (no_types) dual_order.order_iff_strict less_Î¹_I less_trans)
                qed
                moreover have "h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼ < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                  if Î¼: "Î¼ âˆ‰ F" "Î¼ âˆˆ elts Î²" and Î½: "Î½ âˆ‰ F" "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" and "Î¼ < Î½" for Î¼ Î½
                proof -
                  have le: "Î²idx Î¼ â‰¤ Î²idx Î½" if "Î¹ (Î²idx Î¼ - Suc 0) < h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼" "h (Î²idx Î½) Î½ < Î¹ (Î²idx Î½)"
                    by (metis 2 that Diff_iff Î²idx Î¼ Î½ â€¹Î¼ < Î½â€º dual_order.strict_implies_order dual_order.strict_trans1 h_increasing leI le_Î¹ less_asym)
                  have "h 0 Î¼ < h 0 Î½" if "Î²idx Î¼ = 0" "Î²idx Î½ = 0"
                    using that mono_h unfolding strict_mono_on_def
                    by (metis Diff_iff Î²idx Î¼ Î½ â€¹Î¼ < Î½â€º)
                  moreover have "h 0 Î¼ < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                    if "0 < Î²idx Î½" "h 0 Î¼ < Î¹ 0" and "Î¹ (Î²idx Î½ - Suc 0) < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                    by (meson DiffI Î²idx Î½ le_Î¹ le_less_trans less_le_not_le that)
                  moreover have "Î²idx Î½ â‰  0"
                    if "0 < Î²idx Î¼" "h 0 Î½ < Î¹ 0" "Î¹ (Î²idx Î¼ - Suc 0) < h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼"
                    using le le_0_eq that by fastforce
                  moreover have "h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼ < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                    if "Î¹ (Î²idx Î¼ - Suc 0) < h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼" "h (Î²idx Î½) Î½ < Î¹ (Î²idx Î½)"
                       "h (Î²idx Î¼) Î¼ < Î¹ (Î²idx Î¼)" "Î¹ (Î²idx Î½ - Suc 0) < h (Î²idx Î½) Î½"
                    using mono_h unfolding strict_mono_on_def
                      by (metis le Diff_iff Î²idx Î¼ Î½ â€¹Î¼ < Î½â€º le_Î¹ le_less le_less_trans that)
                  ultimately show  ?thesis
                    using h_in_D [OF Î¼] h_in_D [OF Î½] by (simp add: D_def split: if_split_asm)
                qed
                ultimately have sm_g: "strict_mono_on g (elts Î²)"
                  by (auto simp: g_def strict_mono_on_def dest!: F_imp_Ex)
                show False
                  using * [OF â€¹x âˆˆ Aâ€º fun_g sm_g]
                proof safe
                  fix Î½
                  assume "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" and Î½: "tp (K 1 x âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) < Î±"
                  have FM: "F âŠ† M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x"
                    by (meson FN â€¹x âˆˆ A'â€º)
                  have False if "tp (K (Suc 0) x âˆ© ğ”„ Î½) < Î±" "Î½ âˆˆ F"
                    using that FM by (auto simp: M_def)
                  moreover have False if "tp (K (Suc 0) x âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) < Î±" "Î½ âˆˆ D k" "k â‰¤ p" "Î½ âˆ‰ F" for k
                  proof -
                    have "h (Î²idx Î½) Î½ âˆˆ M (D (Î²idx Î½)) ğ”„ x"
                      using fun_h Î²idx â€¹Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²â€º â€¹Î½ âˆ‰ Fâ€º by auto
                    then show False
                      using that by (simp add: M_def g_def leD)
                  qed
                  ultimately show False
                    using â€¹Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²â€º Î½ by (force simp: Î²_decomp)
                qed auto
              qed
              then have "âˆƒl. l â‰¤ p âˆ§ tp (M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x âˆ© D l) < tp (D l)"
                using M_Int_D by auto
            }
            then obtain l where lp: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A'âŸ¹ l x â‰¤ p"
              and lless: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A'âŸ¹ tp (M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x âˆ© D (l x)) < tp (D (l x))"
              by metis
            obtain A'' L where "A'' âŠ† A'" and A'': "A'' âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)" "tp A'' = Î±" and lL: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A'' âŸ¹ l x = L"
            proof -
              have eq: "A' = (â‹ƒiâ‰¤p. {x âˆˆ A'. l x = i})"
                using lp by auto
              have "âˆƒXâˆˆ(Î»i. {x âˆˆ A'. l x = i}) ` {..p}. Î± â‰¤ tp X"
              proof (rule indecomposable_ordertype_finite_ge [OF indec])
                show "small (â‹ƒiâ‰¤p. {x âˆˆ A'. l x = i})"
                  by (metis A'(1) A(1) eq down smaller_than_small)
              qed (use A' eq in auto)
              then show thesis
              proof
                fix A''
                assume A'': "A'' âˆˆ (Î»i. {x âˆˆ A'. l x = i}) ` {..p}" and "Î± â‰¤ tp A''"
                then obtain L where L: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ A'' âŸ¹ l x = L"
                  by auto
                have "A'' âŠ† A'"
                  using A'' by force
                then have "tp A'' â‰¤ tp A'"
                  by (meson A' A down order_trans ordertype_VWF_mono)
                with â€¹Î± â‰¤ tp A''â€º have "tp A'' = Î±"
                  using A'(2) by auto
                moreover have "A'' âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
                  using A' A â€¹A'' âŠ† A'â€º by auto
                ultimately show thesis
                  using L that [OF â€¹A'' âŠ† A'â€º] by blast
              qed
            qed
            have ğ”„D: "ğ”„ âˆˆ D L â†’ {X. X âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²) âˆ§ tp X = Î±}"
              using ğ”„ DÎ² by blast
            have "M (elts Î²) ğ”„ x âˆ© D L = M (D L) ğ”„ x" for x
              using DÎ² by (auto simp: M_def)
            then have "tp (M (D L) ğ”„ x) < tp (D L)" if "x âˆˆ A''" for x
              using lless that â€¹A'' âŠ† A'â€º lL by force
            then have â€ : "{x âˆˆ A''. tp (D L) â‰¤ tp (M (D L) ğ”„ x)} = {}"
              using leD by blast
            have "Î± â‰¤ tp {x âˆˆ A''. tp (D L) â‰¤ tp (M (D L) ğ”„ x)}"
              using IX [OF DÎ² A'' ğ”„D] by simp
            then show False
              using â€¹Î± â‰  0â€º by (simp add: â€ )
          qed
          then show ?thesis
            by (meson Ord_linear2 Ord_ordertype â€¹Ord Î±â€º)
        qed
        let ?U = "UNIV :: nat set"
        define Î¼ where "Î¼ â‰¡ fst âˆ˜ from_nat_into (elts Î² Ã— ?U)"
        define q where "q â‰¡ to_nat_on (elts Î² Ã— ?U)"
        have co_Î²U: "countable (elts Î² Ã— ?U)"
          by (simp add: Î² less_Ï‰1_imp_countable)
        moreover have "elts Î² Ã— ?U â‰  {}"
          using â€¹0 âˆˆ elts Î²â€º by blast
        ultimately have "range (from_nat_into (elts Î² Ã— ?U)) = (elts Î² Ã— ?U)"
          by (metis range_from_nat_into)
        then have Î¼_in_Î² [simp]: "Î¼ i âˆˆ elts Î²" for i
          by (metis SigmaE Î¼_def comp_apply fst_conv range_eqI)

        then have Ord_Î¼ [simp]: "Ord (Î¼ i)" for i
          using Ord_in_Ord by blast

        have inf_Î²U: "infinite (elts Î² Ã— ?U)"
          using â€¹0 âˆˆ elts Î²â€º finite_cartesian_productD2 by auto

        have 11 [simp]: "Î¼ (q (Î½,n)) = Î½" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ n
          by (simp add: Î¼_def q_def that co_Î²U)
        have range_Î¼ [simp]: "range Î¼ = elts Î²"
          by (auto simp: image_iff) (metis 11)
        have [simp]: "KI i {} = UNIV" "KI i (insert a X) = K i a âˆ© KI i X" for i a X
          by (auto simp: KI_def)
        define Î¦ where "Î¦ â‰¡ Î»n::nat. Î»ğ”„ x. (âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ elts Î². ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âˆ§ tp (ğ”„ Î½) = Î±) âˆ§ x ` {..<n} âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²)
                                         âˆ§ (â‹ƒÎ½ âˆˆ elts Î². ğ”„ Î½) âŠ† KI 1 (x ` {..<n}) âˆ§ strict_mono_sets (elts Î²) ğ”„"
        define Î¨ where "Î¨ â‰¡ Î»n::nat. Î»g ğ”„ ğ”„' xn. g âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î² âˆ§ strict_mono_on g (elts Î²) âˆ§ (âˆ€iâ‰¤n. g (Î¼ i) = Î¼ i)
                  âˆ§ (âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ elts Î². ğ”„' Î½ âŠ† K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½))
                  âˆ§ less_sets {xn} (ğ”„' (Î¼ n)) âˆ§ xn âˆˆ ğ”„ (Î¼ n)"
        let ?ğ”„0 = "Î»Î½. plus (Î± * Î½) ` elts Î±"
        have base: "Î¦ 0 ?ğ”„0 x" for x
          by (auto simp: Î¦_def add_mult_less add_mult_less_add_mult ordertype_image_plus strict_mono_sets_def less_sets_def)
        have step: "Ex (Î»(g,ğ”„',xn). Î¨ n g ğ”„ ğ”„' xn âˆ§ Î¦ (Suc n) ğ”„' (x(n:=xn)))" if "Î¦ n ğ”„ x" for n ğ”„ x
        proof -
          have ğ”„: "â‹€Î½. Î½ âˆˆ elts Î² âŸ¹ ğ”„ Î½ âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²) âˆ§ tp (ğ”„ Î½) = Î±"
            and x: "x ` {..<n} âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
            and sub: "â‹ƒ (ğ”„ ` elts Î²) âŠ† KI (Suc 0) (x ` {..<n})"
            and sm: "strict_mono_sets (elts Î²) ğ”„"
            using that by (auto simp: Î¦_def)
          have Î¼Î²: "Î¼ ` {..n} âŠ† elts Î²" and ğ”„sub: "ğ”„ (Î¼ n) âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
            by (auto simp: ğ”„)
          have ğ”„fun: "ğ”„ âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ {X. X âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²) âˆ§ tp X = Î±}"
            by (simp add: ğ”„)
          then obtain xn g where xn: "xn âˆˆ ğ”„ (Î¼ n)" and g: "g âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î²"
            and sm_g: "strict_mono_on g (elts Î²)" and g_Î¼: "âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ Î¼`{..n}. g Î½ = Î½"
            and g_Î±: "âˆ€Î½ âˆˆ elts Î². Î± â‰¤ tp (K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½))"
            using 10 [OF _ Î¼Î² ğ”„sub _ ğ”„fun] by (auto simp: ğ”„)
          have tp1: "tp (K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) = Î±" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½
          proof (rule antisym)
            have "tp (K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) â‰¤ tp (ğ”„ (g Î½))"
            proof (rule ordertype_VWF_mono)
              show "small (ğ”„ (g Î½))"
                by (metis PiE ğ”„ down g that)
            qed auto
            also have "â€¦ = Î±"
              using ğ”„ g that by force
            finally show "tp (K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)) â‰¤ Î±" .
          qed (use that g_Î± in auto)
          have tp2: "tp (ğ”„ (Î¼ n)) = Î±"
            by (auto simp: ğ”„)
          obtain A2 where A2: "tp A2 = Î±" "A2 âŠ† K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (Î¼ n)" "less_sets {xn} A2"
            using indecomposable_imp_Ex_less_sets [OF indec â€¹Î± > 1â€º â€¹Ord Î²â€º tp2]
            by (metis ğ”„sub Î¼_in_Î² atMost_iff image_eqI inf_le2 le_refl xn tp1 g_Î¼)
          then have A2_sub: "A2 âŠ† ğ”„ (Î¼ n)" by simp
          let ?ğ”„ = "Î»Î½. if Î½ = Î¼ n then A2 else K 1 xn âˆ© ğ”„ (g Î½)"
          have [simp]: "({..<Suc n} âˆ© {x. x â‰  n}) = ({..<n})"
            by auto
          have "K (Suc 0) xn âˆ© (â‹ƒxâˆˆelts Î² âˆ© {Î½. Î½ â‰  Î¼ n}. ğ”„ (g x)) âŠ† KI (Suc 0) (x ` {..<n})"
            using sub g by (auto simp: KI_def)
          moreover have "A2 âŠ† KI (Suc 0) (x ` {..<n})" "A2 âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
            using ğ”„sub sub A2 by fastforce+
          moreover have "xn âˆˆ elts (Î± * Î²)"
            using ğ”„sub xn by blast
         moreover have "strict_mono_sets (elts Î²) ?ğ”„"
            using sm sm_g g g_Î¼ A2_sub
            unfolding strict_mono_sets_def strict_mono_on_def less_sets_def Pi_iff subset_iff Ball_def Bex_def image_iff
            by (simp (no_asm_use) add: if_split_mem2) (smt order_refl)
          ultimately have "Î¦ (Suc n) ?ğ”„ (x(n := xn))"
            using tp1 x A2 by (auto simp: Î¦_def K_def)
          with A2 show ?thesis
            by (rule_tac x="(g,?ğ”„,xn)" in exI) (simp add: Î¨_def g sm_g g_Î¼ xn)
        qed
        define G where "G â‰¡ Î»n ğ”„ x. @(g,ğ”„',x'). âˆƒxn. Î¨ n g ğ”„ ğ”„' xn âˆ§ x' = (x(n:=xn)) âˆ§ Î¦ (Suc n) ğ”„' x'"
        have GÎ¦: "(Î»(g,ğ”„',x'). Î¦ (Suc n) ğ”„' x') (G n ğ”„ x)"
          and GÎ¨: "(Î»(g,ğ”„',x'). Î¨ n g ğ”„ ğ”„' (x' n)) (G n ğ”„ x)"  if "Î¦ n ğ”„ x" for n ğ”„ x
          using step [OF that] by (force simp: G_def dest: some_eq_imp)+
        define H where "H â‰¡ rec_nat (id,?ğ”„0,undefined) (Î»n (g0,ğ”„,x0). G n ğ”„ x0)"
        have H_Suc: "H (Suc n) = (case H n of (g0, xa, xb) â‡’ G n xa xb)" for n
          by (simp add: H_def)
        have "(Î»(g,ğ”„,x). Î¦ n ğ”„ x) (H n)" for n
        proof (induction n)
          case 0 show ?case
            by (simp add: H_def base)
        next
          case (Suc n) then show ?case
            using GÎ¦ by (fastforce simp: H_Suc)
        qed
        then have H_imp_Î¦: "Î¦ n ğ”„ x" if "H n = (g,ğ”„,x)" for g ğ”„ x n
          by (metis case_prodD that)
        then have H_imp_Î¨: "(Î»(g,ğ”„',x'). let (g0,ğ”„,x) = H n in Î¨ n g ğ”„ ğ”„' (x' n)) (H (Suc n))" for n
          using GÎ¨ by (fastforce simp: H_Suc split: prod.split)
        define g where "g â‰¡ Î»n. (Î»(g,ğ”„,x). g) (H (Suc n))"
        have g: "g n âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î²" and sm_g: "strict_mono_on (g n) (elts Î²)"
                 and 13: "â‹€i. iâ‰¤n âŸ¹ g n (Î¼ i) = Î¼ i" for n
            using H_imp_Î¨ [of n] by (auto simp: g_def Î¨_def)
        define ğ”„ where "ğ”„ â‰¡ Î»n. (Î»(g,ğ”„,x). ğ”„) (H n)"
        define x where "x â‰¡ Î»n. (Î»(g,ğ”„,x). x n) (H (Suc n))"
        have 14: "ğ”„ (Suc n) Î½ âŠ† K 1 (x n) âˆ© ğ”„ n (g n Î½)" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ n
          using H_imp_Î¨ [of n] that by (force simp: Î¨_def ğ”„_def x_def g_def)
        then have x14: "ğ”„ (Suc n) Î½ âŠ† ğ”„ n (g n Î½)" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ n
          using that by blast
        have 15: "x n âˆˆ ğ”„ n (Î¼ n)" and 16: "less_sets {x n} (ğ”„ (Suc n) (Î¼ n))" for n
          using H_imp_Î¨ [of n] by (force simp: Î¨_def ğ”„_def x_def)+
        have ğ”„_Î±Î²: "ğ”„ n Î½ âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ n
          using H_imp_Î¦ [of n] that by (auto simp: Î¦_def ğ”„_def split: prod.split)
        have 12: "strict_mono_sets (elts Î²) (ğ”„ n)" for n
          using H_imp_Î¦ [of n] that by (auto simp: Î¦_def ğ”„_def split: prod.split)
        have tp_ğ”„: "tp (ğ”„ n Î½) = Î±" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ n
          using H_imp_Î¦ [of n] that by (auto simp: Î¦_def ğ”„_def split: prod.split)
        let ?Z = "range x"
        have S_dec: "â‹ƒ (ğ”„ (m+k) ` elts Î²) âŠ† â‹ƒ (ğ”„ m ` elts Î²)" for k m
          by (induction k) (use 14 g in â€¹fastforce+â€º)
        have "x n âˆˆ K 1 (x m)" if "m<n" for m n
        proof -
          have "x n âˆˆ (â‹ƒÎ½ âˆˆ elts Î². ğ”„ n Î½)"
            by (meson "15" UN_I Î¼_in_Î²)
          also have "â€¦ âŠ† (â‹ƒÎ½ âˆˆ elts Î². ğ”„ (Suc m) Î½)"
            using S_dec [of "Suc m"] less_iff_Suc_add that by auto
          also have "â€¦ âŠ† K 1 (x m)"
            using 14 by auto
          finally show ?thesis .
        qed
        then have "f{x m, x n} = 1" if "m<n" for m n
          using that by (auto simp: K_def)
        then have Z_K1: "f ` [?Z]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
          by (clarsimp simp: nsets_2_eq) (metis insert_commute less_linear)
        moreover have Z_sub: "?Z âŠ† elts (Î± * Î²)"
          using "15" ğ”„_Î±Î² Î¼_in_Î² by blast
        moreover have "tp ?Z â‰¥ Ï‰ * Î²"
        proof -
          define ğ”¤ where "ğ”¤ â‰¡ Î»i j x. wfrec (measure (Î»k. j-k)) (Î»ğ”¤ k. if k<j then g k (ğ”¤ (Suc k)) else x) i"
          have ğ”¤: "ğ”¤ i j x = (if i<j then g i (ğ”¤ (Suc i) j x) else x)" for i j x
            by (simp add: ğ”¤_def wfrec cut_apply)
          have 17: "ğ”¤ k j (Î¼ i) = Î¼ i" if "i â‰¤ k" for i j k
            using wf_measure [of "Î»k. j-k"] that
            by (induction k rule: wf_induct_rule) (simp add: "13" ğ”¤ le_imp_less_Suc)
          have ğ”¤_in_Î²: "ğ”¤ i j Î½  âˆˆ elts Î²" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for i j Î½
            using wf_measure [of "Î»k. j-k"] that
          proof (induction i rule: wf_induct_rule)
            case (less i)
            with g show ?case by (force simp: ğ”¤ [of i])
          qed
          then have ğ”¤_fun: "ğ”¤ i j âˆˆ elts Î² â†’ elts Î²" for i j
            by simp
          have sm_ğ”¤: "strict_mono_on (ğ”¤ i j) (elts Î²)" for i j
            using wf_measure [of "Î»k. j-k"]
          proof (induction i rule: wf_induct_rule)
            case (less i)
            with sm_g show ?case
              by (auto simp: ğ”¤ [of i] strict_mono_on_def ğ”¤_in_Î²)
          qed
          have *: "ğ”„ j (Î¼ j) âŠ† ğ”„ i (ğ”¤ i j (Î¼ j))" if "i < j" for i j
            using wf_measure [of "Î»k. j-k"] that
          proof (induction i rule: wf_induct_rule)
            case (less i)
            then have "j - Suc i < j - i"
              by (metis (no_types) Suc_diff_Suc lessI)
            with less ğ”¤_in_Î² show ?case
              by (simp add: ğ”¤ [of i]) (metis 17 Suc_lessI Î¼_in_Î² order_refl order_trans x14)
          qed
          have le: "ğ”¤ i j (Î¼ j) â‰¤ Î¼ i âŸ· Î¼ j â‰¤ Î¼ i" for i j
            using sm_ğ”¤ unfolding strict_mono_on_def
            by (metis "17" Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear2 Î¼_in_Î² leD le_refl less_V_def â€¹Ord Î²â€º)
          then have less: "ğ”¤ i j (Î¼ j) < Î¼ i âŸ· Î¼ j < Î¼ i" for i j
            by (metis (no_types, lifting) "17" Î¼_in_Î² less_V_def order_refl sm_ğ”¤ strict_mono_on_def)
          have eq: "ğ”¤ i j (Î¼ j) = Î¼ i âŸ· Î¼ j = Î¼ i" for i j
            by (metis eq_refl le less less_le)
          have 18: "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n)) âŸ· Î¼ m < Î¼ n" for m n
          proof (cases n m rule: linorder_cases)
            case less
            show ?thesis
            proof (intro iffI)
              assume "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))"
              moreover
              have "Â¬ less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))" if "Î¼ n = Î¼ m"
                by (metis "*" "15" eq less less_V_def less_sets_def less_sets_weaken2 that)
              moreover
              have "Â¬ less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))" if "Î¼ n < Î¼ m"
                using that 12 15 * [OF less]
                apply (clarsimp simp: less_sets_def strict_mono_sets_def)
                by (metis Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear2 ğ”¤_in_Î² Î¼_in_Î² â€¹Ord Î²â€º le leD less_asym subsetD)
              ultimately show "Î¼ m < Î¼ n"
                by (meson Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear_lt Î¼_in_Î² â€¹Ord Î²â€º)
            next
              assume "Î¼ m < Î¼ n"
              then have "less_sets (ğ”„ n (ğ”¤ n m (Î¼ m))) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))"
                by (metis "12" ğ”¤_in_Î² Î¼_in_Î² eq le less_V_def strict_mono_sets_def)
              then show "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))"
                by (meson *[OF less] less_sets_weaken1)
          qed
          next
            case equal
            with 15 show ?thesis by auto
          next
            case greater
            show ?thesis
            proof (intro iffI)
              assume "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))"
              moreover
              have "Â¬ less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))" if "Î¼ n = Î¼ m"
                by (metis "*" "15" disjnt_iff eq greater in_mono less_sets_imp_disjnt that)
              moreover
              have "Â¬ less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))" if "Î¼ n < Î¼ m"
                using that 12 15 * [OF greater]
                apply (clarsimp simp: less_sets_def strict_mono_sets_def)
                by (meson ğ”¤_in_Î² Î¼_in_Î² in_mono less less_asym)
              ultimately show "Î¼ m < Î¼ n"
                by (meson Ord_Î¼ Ord_linear_lt)
            next
              assume "Î¼ m < Î¼ n"
              then have "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ m (ğ”¤ m n (Î¼ n)))"
                by (meson 12 Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear2 ğ”¤_in_Î² Î¼_in_Î² le leD ord(2) strict_mono_sets_def)
              then show "less_sets (ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)) (ğ”„ n (Î¼ n))"
                by (meson "*" greater less_sets_weaken2)
            qed
          qed
          have ğ”„_increasing_Î¼: "ğ”„ n (Î¼ n) âŠ† ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)" if "m â‰¤ n" "Î¼ m = Î¼ n" for m n
            by (metis "*" "17" dual_order.order_iff_strict that)
          moreover have INF: "infinite {n. n â‰¥ m âˆ§ Î¼ m = Î¼ n}" for m
          proof -
            have "infinite (range (Î»n. q (Î¼ m, n)))"
              unfolding q_def
              using to_nat_on_infinite [OF co_Î²U inf_Î²U] finite_image_iff
              by (simp add: finite_image_iff inj_on_def)
            moreover have "(range (Î»n. q (Î¼ m, n))) âŠ† {n. Î¼ m = Î¼ n}"
              using 11 [of "Î¼ m"] by auto
            ultimately have "infinite {n. Î¼ m = Î¼ n}"
              using finite_subset by auto
            then have "infinite ({n. Î¼ m = Î¼ n} - {..<m})"
              by simp
            then show ?thesis
              by (auto simp: finite_nat_set_iff_bounded Bex_def not_less)
          qed
          let ?eqv = "Î»m. {n. m â‰¤ n âˆ§ Î¼ m = Î¼ n}"
          have sm_x: "strict_mono_on x (?eqv m)" for m
          proof (clarsimp simp: strict_mono_on_def)
            fix n p
            assume "m â‰¤ n" "Î¼ p = Î¼ n" "Î¼ m = Î¼ n" "n < p"
            with 16 [of n] show "x n < x p"
              by (simp add: less_sets_def) (metis "*" "15" "17" Suc_lessI le_SucI subsetD)
          qed
          then have inj_x: "inj_on x (?eqv m)" for m
            using strict_mono_on_imp_inj_on by blast
          define ZA where "ZA â‰¡ Î»m. ?Z âˆ© ğ”„ m (Î¼ m)"
          have small_ZA [simp]: "small (ZA m)" for m
            by (metis ZA_def inf_le1 small_image_nat smaller_than_small)
          have 19: "tp (ZA m) â‰¥ Ï‰" for m
          proof -
            have "x ` {n. m â‰¤ n âˆ§ Î¼ m = Î¼ n} âŠ† ZA m"
              unfolding ZA_def using "15" ğ”„_increasing_Î¼ by blast
            then have "infinite (ZA m)"
              using INF [of m] finite_image_iff [OF inj_x] by (meson finite_subset)
            then show ?thesis
              by (simp add: ordertype_infinite_ge_Ï‰)
          qed
          have "âˆƒf âˆˆ elts Ï‰ â†’ ZA m. strict_mono_on f (elts Ï‰)" for m
          proof -
            obtain Z where "Z âŠ† ZA m" "tp Z = Ï‰"
              by (meson 19 Ord_Ï‰ le_ordertype_obtains_subset small_ZA)
            moreover have "ZA m âŠ† ON"
              using Ord_in_Ord ğ”„_Î±Î² Î¼_in_Î² unfolding ZA_def by blast
            ultimately show ?thesis
              by (metis strict_mono_on_ordertype Pi_mono small_ZA smaller_than_small subset_iff)
          qed
          then obtain Ï† where Ï†: "â‹€m. Ï† m âˆˆ elts Ï‰ â†’ ZA m"
                         and sm_Ï†: "â‹€m. strict_mono_on (Ï† m) (elts Ï‰)"
            by metis
          have "Ex(Î»(m,Î½). Î½ âˆˆ elts Î² âˆ§ Î³ = Ï‰ * Î½ + ord_of_nat m)" if "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²)" for Î³
            using that by (auto simp: mult [of Ï‰ Î²] lift_def elts_Ï‰)
          then obtain split where split: "â‹€Î³. Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²) âŸ¹
             (Î»(m,Î½). Î½ âˆˆ elts Î² âˆ§ Î³ = Ï‰ * Î½ + ord_of_nat m)(split Î³)"
            by meson
          have split_eq [simp]: "split (Ï‰ * Î½ + ord_of_nat m) = (m,Î½)" if "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î½ m
          proof -
            have [simp]: "Ï‰ * Î½ + ord_of_nat m = Ï‰ * Î¾ + ord_of_nat n âŸ· Î¾ = Î½ âˆ§ n = m" if "Î¾ âˆˆ elts Î²" for Î¾ n
              by (metis Ord_Ï‰ that Ord_mem_iff_less_TC mult_cancellation_lemma ord_of_nat_Ï‰ ord_of_nat_inject)
            show ?thesis
              using split [of "Ï‰*Î½ + m"] that by (auto simp: mult [of Ï‰ Î²] lift_def cong: conj_cong)
          qed
          define Ï€ where "Ï€ â‰¡ Î»Î³. (Î»(m,Î½). Ï† (q(Î½,0)) m)(split Î³)"
          have Ï€_Pi: "Ï€ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²) â†’ (â‹ƒm. ZA m)"
            using Ï† by (fastforce simp: Ï€_def mult [of Ï‰ Î²] lift_def elts_Ï‰)
          moreover have "(â‹ƒm. ZA m) âŠ† ON"
            unfolding ZA_def using ğ”„_Î±Î² Î¼_in_Î² elts_subset_ON by blast
          ultimately have Ord_Ï€_Pi: "Ï€ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²) â†’ ON"
            by fastforce
          show "tp ?Z â‰¥ Ï‰ * Î²"
          proof -
            have â€ : "(â‹ƒm. ZA m) = ?Z"
              using "15" by (force simp: ZA_def)
            moreover
            have "tp (elts (Ï‰ * Î²)) â‰¤ tp (â‹ƒm. ZA m)"
            proof (rule ordertype_inc_le)
              show "Ï€ ` elts (Ï‰ * Î²) âŠ† (â‹ƒm. ZA m)"
                using Ï€_Pi by blast
            next
              fix u v
              assume x: "u âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²)" and y: "v âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ * Î²)" and "(u,v) âˆˆ VWF"
              then have "u<v"
                by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_in_Ord Ord_mult VWF_iff_Ord_less ord(2))
              moreover
              obtain m Î½ n Î¾ where ueq: "u = Ï‰ * Î½ + ord_of_nat m" and Î½: "Î½ âˆˆ elts Î²"
                             and veq: "v = Ï‰ * Î¾ + ord_of_nat n" and Î¾: "Î¾ âˆˆ elts Î²"
                using x y by (auto simp:  mult [of Ï‰ Î²] lift_def elts_Ï‰)
              ultimately have "Î½ â‰¤ Î¾"
                by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear2 â€¹Ord Î²â€º add_mult_less_add_mult less_asym ord_of_nat_Ï‰)
              consider (eq) "Î½ = Î¾" | (lt) "Î½ < Î¾"
                using â€¹Î½ â‰¤ Î¾â€º le_neq_trans by blast
              then have "Ï€ u < Ï€ v"
              proof cases
                case eq
                then have "m < n"
                  using ueq veq â€¹u<vâ€º by simp
                then have "Ï† (q (Î¾, 0)) m < Ï† (q (Î¾, 0)) n"
                  using sm_Ï† strict_mono_onD by blast
                then show ?thesis
                  using eq ueq veq Î½ â€¹m < nâ€º by (simp add: Ï€_def)
              next
                case lt
                have "Ï† (q(Î½,0)) m âˆˆ ğ”„ (q(Î½,0)) (Î¼(q(Î½,0)))" "Ï† (q (Î¾,0)) n âˆˆ ğ”„ (q(Î¾,0)) (Î¼(q(Î¾,0)))"
                  using Ï† unfolding ZA_def by blast+
                then show ?thesis
                  using lt ueq veq Î½ Î¾ 18 [of "q(Î½,0)" "q(Î¾,0)"]
                  by (simp add: Ï€_def less_sets_def)
              qed
              then show "(Ï€ u, Ï€ v) âˆˆ VWF"
                using Ï€_Pi
                by (metis Ord_Ï€_Pi PiE VWF_iff_Ord_less x y mem_Collect_eq)
            qed (use â€  in auto)
            ultimately show ?thesis by simp
          qed
        qed
        then obtain Z where "Z âŠ† ?Z" "tp Z = Ï‰ * Î²"
          by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_mult ord Z_sub down le_ordertype_obtains_subset)
        ultimately show False
          using iii [of Z] by (meson dual_order.trans image_mono nsets_mono)
      qed
      have False
        if 0: "âˆ€H. tp H = ord_of_nat (2*k) âŸ¶ H âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âŸ¶ Â¬ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
          and 1: "âˆ€H. tp H = min Î³ (Ï‰ * Î²) âŸ¶ H âŠ† elts (Î±*Î²) âŸ¶ Â¬ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
      proof (cases "Ï‰*Î² â‰¤ Î³")
        case True
        then have â€ : "âˆƒH'âŠ†H. tp H' = Ï‰ * Î²" if "tp H = Î³" "small H" for H
          by (metis Ord_Ï‰ Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord Ord_mult Î² le_ordertype_obtains_subset that)
        have [simp]: "min Î³ (Ï‰*Î²) = Ï‰*Î²"
          by (simp add: min_absorb2 that True)
        then show ?thesis
          using * [OF 0] 1 True
          by simp (meson â€  down image_mono nsets_mono subset_trans)
      next
        case False
        then have â€ : "âˆƒH'âŠ†H. tp H' = Î³" if "tp H = Ï‰ * Î²" "small H" for H
          by (metis Ord_linear_le Ord_ordertype â€¹Ord Î³â€º le_ordertype_obtains_subset that)
        then have "Î³ â‰¤ Ï‰*Î²"
          by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord Ord_linear_le Ord_mult Î² â€¹Ord Î³â€º False)
        then have [simp]: "min Î³ (Ï‰*Î²) = Î³"
          by (simp add: min_absorb1)
        then show ?thesis
          using * [OF 0] 1 False
          by simp (meson â€  down image_mono nsets_mono subset_trans)
      qed
      then show "âˆƒi<Suc (Suc 0). âˆƒHâŠ†elts (Î±*Î²). tp H = [ord_of_nat (2*k), min Î³ (Ï‰*Î²)] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
        by force
    qed
  qed
qed


theorem Erdos_Milner:
  assumes Î½: "Î½ âˆˆ elts Ï‰1"
  shows "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(1 + Î½ * ord_of_nat n)) [ord_of_nat (2^n), Ï‰â†‘(1+Î½)] 2"
proof (induction n)
  case 0
  then show ?case
    using partn_lst_VWF_degenerate [of 1 2] by simp
next
  case (Suc n)
  have "Ord Î½"
    using Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_in_Ord assms by blast
  have "1+Î½ â‰¤ Î½+1"
    by (simp add: â€¹Ord Î½â€º one_V_def plus_Ord_le)
  then have [simp]: "min (Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + Î½)) (Ï‰ * Ï‰ â†‘ Î½) = Ï‰ â†‘ (1+Î½)"
    by (simp add: â€¹Ord Î½â€º oexp_add min_def)
  have ind: "indecomposable (Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + Î½ * ord_of_nat n))"
    by (simp add: â€¹Ord Î½â€º indecomposable_Ï‰_power)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "n = 0")
    case True
    then show ?thesis
      using partn_lst_VWF_Ï‰_2 â€¹Ord Î½â€º one_V_def by auto
  next
    case False
    then have "Suc 0 < 2 ^ n"
      using less_2_cases not_less_eq by fastforce
    then have "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + Î½ * n) * Ï‰ â†‘ Î½) [ord_of_nat (2 * 2 ^ n), Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + Î½)] 2"
      using Erdos_Milner_aux [OF Suc ind, where Î² = "Ï‰â†‘Î½"] â€¹Ord Î½â€º Î½
      by (auto simp: countable_oexp)
    then show ?thesis
      using â€¹Ord Î½â€º by (simp add: mult_succ mult.assoc oexp_add)
  qed
qed


corollary remark_3: "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(Suc(4*k))) [4, Ï‰â†‘(Suc(2*k))] 2"
  using Erdos_Milner [of "2*k" 2]
  apply (simp flip: ord_of_nat_mult ord_of_nat.simps)
  by (simp add: one_V_def)


text â€¹Theorem 3.2 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
corollary Theorem_3_2:
  fixes k n::nat
  shows "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(n*k)) [Ï‰â†‘n, ord_of_nat k] 2"
proof (cases "n=0 âˆ¨ k=0")
  case True
  then show ?thesis
    by (auto intro: partn_lst_triv0 [where i=1] partn_lst_triv1 [where i=0] simp add:)
next
  case False
  then have "n > 0" "k > 0"
    by auto
  have PV: "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + ord_of_nat (n-1) * ord_of_nat (k-1))) [ord_of_nat (2 ^ (k-1)), Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + ord_of_nat (n-1))] 2"
    using Erdos_Milner [of "ord_of_nat (n-1)" "k-1"] Ord_Ï‰1 Ord_mem_iff_lt less_imp_le by blast
  have "k+n â‰¤ Suc (Suc(k-1) * Suc(n-1))"
    by simp
  also have "â€¦ â‰¤ Suc (k * n)"
    using False by auto
  finally have "1 + (n - 1) * (k - 1) â‰¤ (n*k)"
    using False by (auto simp: algebra_simps)
  then have "(1 + ord_of_nat (n - 1) * ord_of_nat (k - 1)) â‰¤ ord_of_nat(n*k)"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) One_nat_def one_V_def ord_of_nat.simps ord_of_nat_add ord_of_nat_mono_iff ord_of_nat_mult)
  then have x: "Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + ord_of_nat (n - 1) * ord_of_nat (k - 1)) â‰¤ Ï‰â†‘(n*k)"
    by (simp add: oexp_mono_le)
  then have "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(n*k)) [ord_of_nat (2 ^ (k-1)), Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + ord_of_nat (n-1))] 2"
    using Partitions.partn_lst_greater_resource PV x by blast
  then have "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(n*k)) [Ï‰ â†‘ (1 + ord_of_nat (n-1)), ord_of_nat (2 ^ (k-1))] 2"
    using partn_lst_two_swap by blast
  moreover have "(1 + ord_of_nat (n-1)) = ord_of_nat n"
    using ord_of_minus_1 [OF â€¹n > 0â€º]
    by (simp add: one_V_def)
  ultimately have "partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘(n*k)) [Ï‰ â†‘ n, ord_of_nat (2 ^ (k-1))] 2"
    by simp
  then show ?thesis
    using power_gt_expt [of 2 "k-1"]
    by (force simp: less_Suc_eq intro: partn_lst_less)
qed

end

Theory Omega_Omega

section â€¹An ordinal partition theorem by Jean A. Larsonâ€º

text â€¹Jean A. Larson,
     A short proof of a partition theorem for the ordinal $\omega^\omega$.
     \emph{Annals of Mathematical Logic}, 6:129â€“145, 1973.â€º

theory Omega_Omega
  imports "HOL-Library.Product_Lexorder" Erdos_Milner

begin

abbreviation "list_of â‰¡ sorted_list_of_set"

subsection â€¹Cantor normal form for ordinals below @{term "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"}â€º

text â€¹Unlike @{term Cantor_sum}, there is no list of ordinal exponents,
which are instead taken as consecutive. We obtain an order-isomorphism between @{term "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"}
and increasing lists of natural numbers (ordered lexicographically).â€º

fun omega_sum_aux  where
  Nil: "omega_sum_aux 0 _ = 0"
| Suc: "omega_sum_aux (Suc n) [] = 0"
| Cons: "omega_sum_aux (Suc n) (m#ms) = (Ï‰â†‘n) * (ord_of_nat m) + omega_sum_aux n ms"

abbreviation omega_sum where "omega_sum ms â‰¡ omega_sum_aux (length ms) ms"

text â€¹A normal expansion has no leading zeroesâ€º
primrec normal:: "nat list â‡’ bool" where
  normal_0: "normal [] = True"
| normal_Suc: "normal (m#ms) = (m > 0)"

lemma omega_sum_0_iff [simp]: "normal ns âŸ¹ omega_sum ns = 0 âŸ· ns = []"
  by (induction ns) auto

lemma Ord_omega_sum_aux [simp]: "Ord (omega_sum_aux k ms)"
  by (induction rule: omega_sum_aux.induct) auto

lemma Ord_omega_sum: "Ord (omega_sum ms)"
  by simp

lemma omega_sum_less_Ï‰Ï‰ [intro]: "omega_sum ms < Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
proof (induction ms)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by (auto simp: zero_less_Limit)
next
  case (Cons m ms)
  have "Ï‰ â†‘ (length ms) * ord_of_nat m âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ Suc (length ms))"
    using Ord_mem_iff_lt by auto
  then have "Ï‰â†‘(length ms) * ord_of_nat m âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)"
    using Ord_ord_of_nat oexp_mono_le omega_nonzero ord_of_nat_le_omega by blast
  with Cons show ?case
    by (auto simp: mult_succ OrdmemD oexp_less indecomposableD indecomposable_Ï‰_power)
qed

lemma omega_sum_aux_less: "omega_sum_aux k ms < Ï‰ â†‘ k"
proof (induction rule: omega_sum_aux.induct)
  case (3 n m ms)
  have " Ï‰â†‘n * ord_of_nat m + Ï‰â†‘n < Ï‰â†‘n * Ï‰"
    by (metis Ord_ord_of_nat Ï‰_power_succ_gtr mult_succ oexp_succ ord_of_nat.simps(2))
  with 3 show ?case
    using dual_order.strict_trans by force
qed auto

lemma omega_sum_less: "omega_sum ms < Ï‰ â†‘ (length ms)"
  by (rule omega_sum_aux_less)

lemma omega_sum_ge: "m â‰  0 âŸ¹ Ï‰ â†‘ (length ms) â‰¤ omega_sum (m#ms)"
  apply clarsimp
  by (metis Ord_ord_of_nat add_le_cancel_left0 le_mult Nat.neq0_conv ord_of_eq_0_iff vsubsetD)

lemma omega_sum_length_less:
  assumes "length ms < length ns" "normal ns"
  shows "omega_sum ms < omega_sum ns"
proof (cases ns)
  case Nil
  then show ?thesis
    using assms by auto
next
  case (Cons n ns')
  have "Ï‰ â†‘ length ms â‰¤ Ï‰ â†‘ length ns'"
    using assms local.Cons by (simp add: oexp_mono_le)
  then have "Â¬ omega_sum (n#ns') â‰¤ omega_sum ms"
    using omega_sum_ge [of n ns'] omega_sum_less [of ms] â€¹normal nsâ€º local.Cons by auto
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis Ord_linear2 Ord_omega_sum local.Cons)
qed

lemma omega_sum_length_leD:
  assumes "omega_sum ms â‰¤ omega_sum ns" "normal ms"
  shows "length ms â‰¤ length ns"
  by (meson assms leD leI omega_sum_length_less)


lemma omega_sum_less_eqlen_iff_cases [simp]:
  assumes "length ms = length ns"
   shows "omega_sum (m#ms) < omega_sum (n#ns)
          âŸ· m<n âˆ¨ m=n âˆ§ omega_sum ms < omega_sum ns"
  (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume L: ?lhs
  have "Â¬ Suc n < Suc m"
    using omega_sum_less [of ms] omega_sum_less [of ns] L assms mult_nat_less_add_less by fastforce
  then have "mâ‰¤n"
    by auto
  with L assms show ?rhs
    by auto
next
  assume ?rhs
  then show ?lhs
    by (auto simp: mult_nat_less_add_less omega_sum_aux_less assms)
qed

lemma omega_sum_lex_less_iff_cases:
   "((length ms, omega_sum (m#ms)), (length ns, omega_sum (n#ns))) âˆˆ less_than <*lex*> VWF
   âŸ· length ms < length ns
            âˆ¨ length ms = length ns âˆ§ m<n
            âˆ¨ m=n âˆ§ ((length ms, omega_sum ms), (length ns, omega_sum ns)) âˆˆ less_than <*lex*> VWF"
  using omega_sum_less_eqlen_iff_cases by force

lemma omega_sum_less_iff_cases:
  assumes "m > 0" "n > 0"
  shows "omega_sum (m#ms) < omega_sum (n#ns)
          âŸ· length ms < length ns
            âˆ¨ length ms = length ns âˆ§ m<n
            âˆ¨ length ms = length ns âˆ§ m=n âˆ§ omega_sum ms < omega_sum ns"
    (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume L: ?lhs
  then have "length ms â‰¤ length ns"
    using omega_sum_length_leD [OF less_imp_le [OF L]] by (simp add: â€¹m > 0â€º)
  moreover have "mâ‰¤n" if "length ms = length ns"
    using L omega_sum_less_eqlen_iff_cases that by auto
  ultimately show ?rhs
    using L by auto
next
  assume ?rhs
  moreover
  have "omega_sum (m # ms) < omega_sum (n # ns)"
    if "length ms < length ns"
    using that by (metis Suc_mono â€¹n > 0â€º length_Cons normal_Suc omega_sum_length_less)
  ultimately show ?lhs
    using omega_sum_less_eqlen_iff_cases by force
qed

lemma omega_sum_less_iff:
  "((length ms, omega_sum ms), (length ns, omega_sum ns)) âˆˆ less_than <*lex*> VWF
   âŸ· (ms,ns) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
proof (induction ms arbitrary: ns)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Cons m ms)
  then show ?case
  proof (induction ns)
    case (Cons n ns')
    show ?case
      using omega_sum_lex_less_iff_cases [of ms m ns' n] Cons.prems
      by (simp add: Cons_lenlex_iff lenlex_length order.not_eq_order_implies_strict nat_less_le)
  qed auto
qed

lemma eq_omega_sum_less_iff:
  assumes "length ms = length ns"
  shows "(omega_sum ms, omega_sum ns) âˆˆ VWF âŸ· (ms,ns) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
  by (metis assms in_lex_prod less_not_refl less_than_iff omega_sum_less_iff)

lemma eq_omega_sum_eq_iff:
  assumes "length ms = length ns"
  shows "omega_sum ms = omega_sum ns âŸ· ms=ns"
proof
  assume "omega_sum ms = omega_sum ns"
  then have "(omega_sum ms, omega_sum ns) âˆ‰ VWF" "(omega_sum ns, omega_sum ms) âˆ‰ VWF"
    by auto
  then obtain "(ms,ns) âˆ‰ lenlex less_than" "(ns,ms) âˆ‰ lenlex less_than"
    using assms eq_omega_sum_less_iff by metis
  moreover have "total (lenlex less_than)"
    by (simp add: total_lenlex total_less_than)
  ultimately show "ms=ns"
    by (meson UNIV_I total_on_def)
qed auto

lemma inj_omega_sum: "inj_on omega_sum {l. length l = n}"
  unfolding inj_on_def using eq_omega_sum_eq_iff by fastforce

lemma Ex_omega_sum: "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘n) âŸ¹ âˆƒns. Î³ = omega_sum ns âˆ§ length ns = n"
proof (induction n arbitrary: Î³)
  case 0
  then show ?case
    by (rule_tac x="[]" in exI) auto
next
  case (Suc n)
  then obtain k::nat where k: "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ n * k)"
       and kmin: "â‹€k'. k'<k âŸ¹ Î³ âˆ‰ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ n * k')"
    by (metis Ord_ord_of_nat elts_mult_Ï‰E oexp_succ ord_of_nat.simps(2))
  show ?case
  proof (cases k)
    case (Suc k')
    then obtain Î´ where Î´: "Î³ = (Ï‰ â†‘ n * k') + Î´"
      by (metis lessI mult_succ ord_of_nat.simps(2) k kmin mem_plus_V_E)
    then have Î´in: "Î´ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰ â†‘ n)"
      using Suc k mult_succ by auto
    then obtain ns where ns: "Î´ = omega_sum ns" and len: "length ns = n"
      using Suc.IH by auto
    moreover have "omega_sum ns < Ï‰â†‘n"
      using OrdmemD ns Î´in by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by (rule_tac x="k'#ns" in exI) (simp add: Î´)
  qed (use k in auto)
qed

lemma omega_sum_drop [simp]: "omega_sum (dropWhile (Î»n. n=0) ns) = omega_sum ns"
  by (induction ns) auto

lemma normal_drop [simp]: "normal (dropWhile (Î»n. n=0) ns)"
  by (induction ns) auto

lemma omega_sum_Ï‰Ï‰:
  assumes "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)"
  obtains ns where "Î³ = omega_sum ns" "normal ns"
proof -
  obtain ms where "Î³ = omega_sum ms"
    using assms Ex_omega_sum by (auto simp: oexp_Limit elts_Ï‰)
  show thesis
  proof
    show "Î³ = omega_sum (dropWhile (Î»n. n=0) ms)"
      by (simp add: â€¹Î³ = omega_sum msâ€º)
    show "normal (dropWhile (Î»n. n=0) ms)"
      by auto
  qed
qed

definition Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ :: "V â‡’ nat list"
  where "Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ â‰¡ Î»x. @ns. x = omega_sum ns âˆ§ normal ns"

lemma
  assumes "Î³ âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)"
  shows Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰: "omega_sum (Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î³) = Î³"
    and normal_Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰: "normal (Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î³)"
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰_def assms omega_sum_Ï‰Ï‰ someI)+


subsection â€¹Larson's set $W(n)$â€º

definition WW :: "nat list set"
  where "WW â‰¡ {l. strict_sorted l}"

fun into_WW :: "nat â‡’ nat list â‡’ nat list" where
  "into_WW k [] = []"
| "into_WW k (n#ns) = (k+n) # into_WW (Suc (k+n)) ns"

fun from_WW :: "nat â‡’ nat list â‡’ nat list" where
  "from_WW k [] = []"
| "from_WW k (n#ns) = (n - k) # from_WW (Suc n) ns"

lemma from_into_WW [simp]: "from_WW k (into_WW k ns) = ns"
  by (induction ns arbitrary: k) auto

lemma inj_into_WW: "inj (into_WW k)"
  by (metis from_into_WW injI)

lemma into_from_WW_aux:
  "âŸ¦strict_sorted ns; âˆ€nâˆˆlist.set ns. k â‰¤ nâŸ§ âŸ¹ into_WW k (from_WW k ns) = ns"
  by (induction ns arbitrary: k) (auto simp: Suc_leI)

lemma into_from_WW [simp]: "strict_sorted ns âŸ¹ into_WW 0 (from_WW 0 ns) = ns"
  by (simp add: into_from_WW_aux)

lemma into_WW_imp_ge: "y âˆˆ List.set (into_WW x ns) âŸ¹ x â‰¤ y"
  by (induction ns arbitrary: x) fastforce+

lemma strict_sorted_into_WW: "strict_sorted (into_WW x ns)"
  by (induction ns arbitrary: x) (auto simp: dest: into_WW_imp_ge)

lemma length_into_WW: "length (into_WW x ns) = length ns"
  by (induction ns arbitrary: x) auto

lemma WW_eq_range_into: "WW = range (into_WW 0)"
  by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) WW_def equalityI image_subset_iff into_from_WW mem_Collect_eq rangeI strict_sorted_into_WW subset_iff)

lemma into_WW_lenlex_iff: "(into_WW k ms, into_WW k ns) âˆˆ lenlex less_than âŸ· (ms, ns) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
proof (induction ms arbitrary: ns k)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by simp (metis length_0_conv length_into_WW)
next
  case (Cons m ms)
  then show ?case
    by (induction ns) (auto simp: Cons_lenlex_iff length_into_WW)
qed

lemma wf_llt [simp]: "wf (lenlex less_than)"
  by blast

lemma trans_llt [simp]: "trans (lenlex less_than)"
  by blast

lemma total_llt [simp]: "total_on A (lenlex less_than)"
  by (meson UNIV_I total_lenlex total_less_than total_on_def)

lemma omega_sum_1_less:
  assumes "(ms,ns) âˆˆ lenlex less_than" shows "omega_sum (1#ms) < omega_sum (1#ns)"
proof -
  have "omega_sum (1#ms) < omega_sum (1#ns)" if "length ms < length ns"
    using omega_sum_less_iff_cases that zero_less_one by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using assms by (auto simp: mult_succ simp flip: omega_sum_less_iff)
qed

lemma ordertype_WW_1: "ordertype WW (lenlex less_than) â‰¤ ordertype UNIV (lenlex less_than)"
  by (rule ordertype_mono) auto

lemma ordertype_WW_2: "ordertype UNIV (lenlex less_than) â‰¤ Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
proof (rule ordertype_inc_le_Ord)
  show "range (Î»ms. omega_sum (1#ms)) âŠ† elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)"
    by (meson Ord_Ï‰ Ord_mem_iff_lt Ord_oexp Ord_omega_sum image_subset_iff omega_sum_less_Ï‰Ï‰)
qed (use omega_sum_1_less in auto)

lemma ordertype_WW_3: "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰ â‰¤ ordertype WW (lenlex less_than)"
proof -
  define Ï€ where "Ï€ â‰¡ into_WW 0 âˆ˜ Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰"
  have Ï‰Ï‰: "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰ = tp (elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰))"
    by simp
  also have "â€¦ â‰¤ ordertype WW (lenlex less_than)"
  proof (rule ordertype_inc_le)
    fix Î± Î²
    assume Î±: "Î± âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)" and Î²: "Î² âˆˆ elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰)" and "(Î±, Î²) âˆˆ VWF"
    then obtain *: "Ord Î±" "Ord Î²" "Î±<Î²"
      by (metis Ord_in_Ord Ord_ordertype VWF_iff_Ord_less Ï‰Ï‰)
    then have "length (Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î±) â‰¤ length (Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î²)"
      using Î± Î² by (simp add: Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ normal_Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ omega_sum_length_leD)
    with Î± Î² * have "(Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î±, Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ Î²) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
      by (auto simp: Cantor_Ï‰Ï‰ simp flip: omega_sum_less_iff)
    then show "(Ï€ Î±, Ï€ Î²) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
      by (simp add: Ï€_def into_WW_lenlex_iff)
  next
    show "Ï€ ` elts (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰) âŠ† WW"
      by (auto simp: Ï€_def WW_def strict_sorted_into_WW)
  qed auto
  finally show "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰ â‰¤ ordertype WW (lenlex less_than)" .
qed

lemma ordertype_WW: "ordertype WW (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
  and ordertype_UNIV_Ï‰Ï‰: "ordertype UNIV (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
  using ordertype_WW_1 ordertype_WW_2 ordertype_WW_3 by auto


lemma ordertype_Ï‰Ï‰:
  fixes F :: "nat â‡’ nat list set"
  assumes "â‹€j::nat. ordertype (F j) (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘j"
  shows "ordertype (â‹ƒj. F j) (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
proof (rule antisym)
  show "ordertype (â‹ƒ (range F)) (lenlex less_than) â‰¤ Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰"
    by (metis ordertype_UNIV_Ï‰Ï‰ ordertype_mono small top_greatest trans_llt wf_llt)
  have "â‹€n. Ï‰ â†‘ ord_of_nat n â‰¤ ordertype (â‹ƒ (range F)) (lenlex less_than)"
    by (metis TC_small Union_upper assms ordertype_mono rangeI trans_llt wf_llt)
  then show "Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰ â‰¤ ordertype (â‹ƒ (range F)) (lenlex less_than)"
    by (auto simp: oexp_Ï‰_Limit ZFC_in_HOL.SUP_le_iff elts_Ï‰)
qed



definition WW_seg :: "nat â‡’ nat list set"
  where "WW_seg n â‰¡ {l âˆˆ WW. length l = n}"

lemma WW_seg_subset_WW: "WW_seg n âŠ† WW"
  by (auto simp: WW_seg_def)

lemma WW_eq_UN_WW_seg: "WW = (â‹ƒ n. WW_seg n)"
  by (auto simp: WW_seg_def)

lemma ordertype_list_seg: "ordertype {l. length l = n} (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘n"
proof -
  have "bij_betw omega_sum {l. length l = n} (elts (Ï‰â†‘n))"
    unfolding WW_seg_def bij_betw_def
    by (auto simp: inj_omega_sum Ord_mem_iff_lt omega_sum_less dest: Ex_omega_sum)
  then show ?thesis
    by (force simp: ordertype_eq_iff simp flip: eq_omega_sum_less_iff)
qed

lemma ordertype_WW_seg: "ordertype (WW_seg n) (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘n"
  (is "ordertype ?W ?R = Ï‰â†‘n")
proof -
  have "ordertype {l. length l = n} ?R = ordertype ?W ?R"
  proof (subst ordertype_eq_ordertype)
    show "âˆƒf. bij_betw f {l. length l = n} ?W âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆ{l. length l = n}. âˆ€yâˆˆ{l. length l = n}. ((f x, f y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than) = ((x, y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than))"
    proof (intro exI conjI)
      have "inj_on (into_WW 0) {l. length l = n}"
        by (metis from_into_WW inj_onI)
      then show "bij_betw (into_WW 0) {l. length l = n} ?W"
        by (auto simp: bij_betw_def WW_seg_def WW_eq_range_into length_into_WW)
    qed (simp add: into_WW_lenlex_iff)
  qed auto
  then show ?thesis
    using ordertype_list_seg by auto
qed


subsection â€¹Definitions required for the lemmasâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Larson's "$<$"-relation on ordered listsâ€º

instantiation list :: (ord)ord
begin

definition "xs < ys â‰¡ xs â‰  [] âˆ§ ys â‰  [] âŸ¶ last xs < hd ys" for xs ys :: "'a list"
definition "xs â‰¤ ys â‰¡ xs < ys âˆ¨ xs = ys" for xs ys :: "'a list"

instance
  by standard

end

lemma less_Nil [simp]: "xs < []" "[] < xs"
  by (auto simp: less_list_def)

lemma less_sets_imp_list_less:
  assumes "less_sets (list.set xs) (list.set ys)"
  shows "xs < ys"
  by (metis assms last_in_set less_list_def less_sets_def list.set_sel(1))

lemma less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set:
  assumes "less_sets A B" "finite A" "finite B"
  shows "list_of A < list_of B"
  by (simp add: assms less_sets_imp_list_less)

lemma sorted_list_of_set_imp_less_sets:
  assumes "xs < ys" "sorted xs" "sorted ys"
  shows "less_sets (list.set xs) (list.set ys)"
  using assms sorted_hd_le sorted_le_last
  by (force simp: less_list_def less_sets_def intro: order.trans)

lemma less_list_iff_less_sets:
  assumes "sorted xs" "sorted ys"
  shows "xs < ys âŸ· less_sets (list.set xs) (list.set ys)"
  using assms sorted_hd_le sorted_le_last
  by (force simp: less_list_def less_sets_def intro: order.trans)

lemma sorted_trans:
  assumes "xs < ys" "ys < zs" "sorted ys" "ys â‰  []" shows "xs < zs"
  using assms unfolding less_list_def
  by (metis dual_order.strict_trans last_in_set leD neqE sorted_hd_le)

lemma strict_sorted_imp_append_less:
  assumes "strict_sorted (xs @ ys)"
  shows "xs < ys"
  using assms by (simp add: less_list_def sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)

lemma strict_sorted_append_iff:
  "strict_sorted (xs @ ys) âŸ· xs < ys âˆ§ strict_sorted xs âˆ§ strict_sorted ys" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume ?lhs then show ?rhs
    by (auto simp: sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_sorted_wrt less_list_def)
next
  assume R: ?rhs
  then have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x âˆˆ list.set xs; y âˆˆ list.set ysâŸ§ âŸ¹ x < y"
    using less_setsD sorted_list_of_set_imp_less_sets strict_sorted_imp_sorted by blast
  with R show ?lhs
    by (auto simp: sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
qed

lemma singleton_less_list_iff: "sorted xs âŸ¹ [n] < xs âŸ· {..n} âˆ© list.set xs = {}"
  apply (simp add: less_list_def set_eq_iff)
  by (metis empty_iff less_le_trans list.set(1) list.set_sel(1) not_le sorted_hd_le)

lemma less_last_iff: "xs@[x] < ys âŸ· [x] < ys"
  by (simp add: less_list_def)

lemma less_Cons_iff: "NO_MATCH [] ys âŸ¹ xs < y#ys âŸ· xs < [y]"
  by (simp add: less_list_def)

lemma less_hd_imp_less: "xs < [hd ys] âŸ¹ xs < ys"
  by (simp add: less_list_def)

lemma last_less_imp_less: "[last xs] < ys âŸ¹ xs < ys"
  by (simp add: less_list_def)

lemma strict_sorted_concat_I:
  assumes
    "â‹€x. x âˆˆ list.set xs âŸ¹ strict_sorted x"
    "â‹€n. Suc n < length xs âŸ¹ xs!n < xs!Suc n"
  assumes "xs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "strict_sorted (concat xs)"
  using assms
proof (induction xs)
  case (Cons x xs)
  then have "x < concat xs"
    apply (simp add: less_list_def)
    by (metis Compl_iff hd_concat insertI1 length_greater_0_conv length_pos_if_in_set list.sel(1) lists.cases nth_Cons_0)
  with Cons show ?case
    by (force simp: strict_sorted_append_iff)
qed auto


subsection â€¹Nash Williams for listsâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Thin sets of listsâ€º

inductive initial_segment :: "'a list â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
  where "initial_segment xs (xs@ys)"

definition thin where "thin A â‰¡ Â¬ (âˆƒx y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ A âˆ§ x â‰  y âˆ§ initial_segment x y)"

lemma initial_segment_ne:
  assumes "initial_segment xs ys" "xs â‰  []"
  shows "ys â‰  [] âˆ§ hd ys = hd xs"
  using assms by (auto elim!: initial_segment.cases)

lemma take_initial_segment:
  assumes "initial_segment xs ys" "k â‰¤ length xs"
  shows "take k xs = take k ys"
  by (metis append_eq_conv_conj assms initial_segment.cases min_def take_take)

lemma initial_segment_length_eq:
  assumes "initial_segment xs ys" "length xs = length ys"
  shows "xs = ys"
  using assms initial_segment.cases by fastforce

lemma initial_segment_Nil [simp]: "initial_segment [] ys"
  by (simp add: initial_segment.simps)

lemma initial_segment_Cons [simp]: "initial_segment (x#xs) (y#ys) âŸ· x=y âˆ§ initial_segment xs ys"
  by (metis append_Cons initial_segment.simps list.inject)

lemma init_segment_iff_initial_segment:
  assumes "strict_sorted xs" "strict_sorted ys"
  shows "init_segment (list.set xs) (list.set ys) âŸ· initial_segment xs ys" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
proof
  assume ?lhs
  then obtain S' where S': "list.set ys = list.set xs âˆª S'" "less_sets (list.set xs) S'"
    by (auto simp: init_segment_def)
  then have "finite S'"
    by (metis List.finite_set finite_Un)
  have "ys = xs @ list_of S'"
    using S' â€¹strict_sorted xsâ€º
  proof (induction xs)
    case Nil
    with â€¹strict_sorted ysâ€º show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (Cons a xs)
    with â€¹finite S'â€º have "ys = a # xs @ list_of S'"
      by (metis List.finite_set â€¹finite S'â€º append_Cons assms(2) sorted_list_of_set_Un sorted_list_of_set_set_of)
    then show ?case
      by (auto simp: Cons)
  qed
  then show ?rhs
    using initial_segment.intros by blast
next
  assume ?rhs
  then show ?lhs
  proof cases
    case (1 ys)
    with assms(2) show ?thesis
      using sorted_list_of_set_imp_less_sets strict_sorted_imp_sorted
      by (auto simp: init_segment_def strict_sorted_append_iff)
  qed
qed

theorem Nash_Williams_WW:
  fixes h :: "nat list â‡’ nat"
  assumes "infinite M" and h: "h ` {l âˆˆ A. List.set l âŠ† M} âŠ† {..<2}" and "thin A" "A âŠ† WW"
  obtains i N where "i < 2" "infinite N" "N âŠ† M" "h ` {l âˆˆ A. List.set l âŠ† N} âŠ† {i}"
proof -
  define AM where "AM â‰¡ {l âˆˆ A. List.set l âŠ† M}"
  have "thin_set (list.set ` A)"
    using â€¹thin Aâ€º â€¹A âŠ† WWâ€º unfolding thin_def thin_set_def WW_def
    by (auto simp: subset_iff init_segment_iff_initial_segment)
  then have "thin_set (list.set ` AM)"
    by (simp add: AM_def image_subset_iff thin_set_def)
  then have "Ramsey (list.set ` AM) 2"
    using Nash_Williams_2 by metis
  moreover have "(h âˆ˜ list_of) âˆˆ list.set ` AM â†’ {..<2}"
    unfolding AM_def
  proof clarsimp
    fix l
    assume "l âˆˆ A" "list.set l âŠ† M"
    then have "strict_sorted l"
      using WW_def â€¹A âŠ† WWâ€º by blast
    then show "h (list_of (list.set l)) < 2"
      using h â€¹l âˆˆ Aâ€º â€¹list.set l âŠ† Mâ€º by auto
  qed
  ultimately obtain N i where N: "N âŠ† M" "infinite N" "i<2"
    and "â‹€j. âŸ¦j<2; iâ‰ jâŸ§ âŸ¹ (h âˆ˜ list_of) -` {j} âˆ© (list.set ` AM) âˆ© Pow N = {}"
    unfolding Ramsey_def by (metis â€¹infinite Mâ€º)
  then have N_disjoint: "(h âˆ˜ list_of) -` {1-i} âˆ© (list.set ` AM) âˆ© Pow N = {}"
    by (metis One_nat_def diff_less_Suc not_less_eq numeral_2_eq_2 zero_less_diff)
  have "h ` {l âˆˆ A. list.set l âŠ† N} âŠ† {i}"
  proof clarify
    fix l
    assume "l âˆˆ A" and "list.set l âŠ† N"
    then have "h l < 2"
      using h â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º by force
    with â€¹i<2â€º have "h l â‰  Suc 0 - i âŸ¹ h l = i"
      by (auto simp: eval_nat_numeral less_Suc_eq)
    moreover have "strict_sorted l"
      using â€¹A âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹l âˆˆ Aâ€º unfolding WW_def by blast
    moreover have "h (list_of (list.set l)) = 1 - i âŸ¶ Â¬ (list.set l âŠ† N)"
      using N_disjoint â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º â€¹l âˆˆ Aâ€º by (auto simp: AM_def)
    ultimately
    show "h l = i"
      using N â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º â€¹l âˆˆ Aâ€º â€¹list.set l âŠ† Nâ€º
      by (auto simp: vimage_def set_eq_iff AM_def WW_def subset_iff)
  qed
  then show thesis
    using that â€¹i<2â€º N by auto
qed

subsection â€¹Specialised functions on listsâ€º

lemma mem_lists_non_Nil: "xss âˆˆ lists (- {[]}) âŸ· (âˆ€x âˆˆ list.set xss. x â‰  [])"
  by auto

fun acc_lengths :: "nat â‡’ 'a list list â‡’ nat list"
  where "acc_lengths acc [] = []"
      | "acc_lengths acc (l#ls) = (acc + length l) # acc_lengths (acc + length l) ls"

lemma length_acc_lengths [simp]: "length (acc_lengths acc ls) = length ls"
  by (induction ls arbitrary: acc) auto

lemma acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff [simp]: "acc_lengths acc ls = [] âŸ· ls = []"
  by (metis length_0_conv length_acc_lengths)

lemma set_acc_lengths:
  assumes "ls âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" shows "list.set (acc_lengths acc ls) âŠ† {acc<..}"
  using assms by (induction ls rule: acc_lengths.induct) fastforce+

text â€¹Useful because @{text acc_lengths.simps} will later be deleted from the simpset.â€º
lemma hd_acc_lengths [simp]: "hd (acc_lengths acc (l#ls)) = acc + length l"
  by simp

lemma last_acc_lengths [simp]:
  "ls â‰  [] âŸ¹ last (acc_lengths acc ls) = acc + sum_list (map length ls)"
by (induction acc ls rule: acc_lengths.induct) auto

lemma nth_acc_lengths [simp]:
  "âŸ¦ls â‰  []; k < length lsâŸ§ âŸ¹ acc_lengths acc ls ! k = acc + sum_list (map length (take (Suc k) ls))"
  by (induction acc ls arbitrary: k rule: acc_lengths.induct) (fastforce simp: less_Suc_eq nth_Cons')+

lemma acc_lengths_plus: "acc_lengths (m+n) as = map ((+)m) (acc_lengths n as)"
  by (induction n as arbitrary: m rule: acc_lengths.induct) (auto simp: add.assoc)

lemma acc_lengths_shift: "NO_MATCH 0 acc âŸ¹ acc_lengths acc as = map ((+)acc) (acc_lengths 0 as)"
  by (metis acc_lengths_plus add.comm_neutral)

lemma length_concat_acc_lengths:
  "ls â‰  [] âŸ¹ k + length (concat ls) âˆˆ list.set (acc_lengths k ls)"
  by (metis acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff last_acc_lengths last_in_set length_concat)

lemma strict_sorted_acc_lengths:
  assumes "ls âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" shows "strict_sorted (acc_lengths acc ls)"
  using assms
proof (induction ls rule: acc_lengths.induct)
  case (2 acc l ls)
  then have "strict_sorted (acc_lengths (acc + length l) ls)"
    using "2" by auto
  then show ?case
    using set_acc_lengths "2.prems" by auto
qed auto

lemma acc_lengths_append:
  "acc_lengths acc (xs @ ys)
   = acc_lengths acc xs @ acc_lengths (acc + sum_list (map length xs)) ys"
by (induction acc xs rule: acc_lengths.induct) (auto simp: add.assoc)


declare acc_lengths.simps [simp del]

lemma length_concat_ge:
  assumes "as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "length (concat as) â‰¥ length as"
  using assms
proof (induction as)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have "length a â‰¥ Suc 0" "â‹€l. l âˆˆ list.set as âŸ¹ length l â‰¥ Suc 0"
    by (auto simp: Suc_leI)
  then show ?case
    using Cons.IH by force
qed auto


fun interact :: "'a list list â‡’ 'a list list â‡’ 'a list"
  where
  "interact [] ys = concat ys"
| "interact xs [] = concat xs"
| "interact (x#xs) (y#ys) = x @ y @ interact xs ys"

lemma (in monoid_add) length_interact:
  "length (interact xs ys) = sum_list (map length xs) + sum_list (map length ys)"
  by (induction rule: interact.induct) (auto simp: length_concat)

lemma length_interact_ge:
  assumes "xs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "ys âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "length (interact xs ys) â‰¥ length xs + length ys"
  by (metis mem_lists_non_Nil add_mono assms length_concat length_concat_ge length_interact)

lemma set_interact [simp]:
  shows "list.set (interact xs ys) = list.set (concat xs) âˆª list.set (concat ys)"
by (induction rule: interact.induct) auto

lemma interact_eq_Nil_iff [simp]:
  assumes "xs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "ys âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "interact xs ys = [] âŸ· xs=[] âˆ§ ys=[]"
  using length_interact_ge [OF assms]  by fastforce

lemma interact_sing [simp]: "interact [x] ys = x @ concat ys"
  by (metis (no_types) concat.simps(2) interact.simps neq_Nil_conv)

lemma hd_interact: "âŸ¦xs â‰  []; hd xs â‰  []âŸ§ âŸ¹ hd (interact xs ys) = hd (hd xs)"
  by (metis concat.simps(2) hd_append2 interact.simps(2) interact.simps(3) list.exhaust list.sel(1))

lemma acc_lengths_concat_injective:
  assumes "concat as' = concat as" "acc_lengths n as' = acc_lengths n as"
  shows "as' = as"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: n as')
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    by (metis acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff)
next
  case (Cons a as)
  then obtain a' bs where "as' = a'#bs"
    by (metis Suc_length_conv length_acc_lengths)
  with Cons show ?case
    by (simp add: acc_lengths.simps)
qed

lemma acc_lengths_interact_injective:
  assumes "interact as' bs' = interact as bs" "acc_lengths a as' = acc_lengths a as" "acc_lengths b bs' = acc_lengths b bs"
  shows "as' = as âˆ§ bs' = bs"
  using assms
proof (induction as bs arbitrary: a b as' bs' rule: interact.induct)
  case (1 cs)
  then have "as' = []"
    by (metis acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff)
  with 1 show ?case
    using acc_lengths_concat_injective by auto
next
  case (2 c cs)
  then show ?case
    by (metis acc_lengths_concat_injective acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff interact.simps(2) list.exhaust)
next
  case (3 x xs y ys)
  then obtain a' us b' vs where "as' = a'#us" "bs' = b'#vs"
    by (metis length_Suc_conv length_acc_lengths)
  with 3 show ?case
    by (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps)
qed


lemma strict_sorted_interact_I:
  assumes "length ys â‰¤ length xs" "length xs â‰¤ Suc (length ys)"
    "â‹€x. x âˆˆ list.set xs âŸ¹ strict_sorted x"
    "â‹€y. y âˆˆ list.set ys âŸ¹ strict_sorted y"
    "â‹€n. n < length ys âŸ¹ xs!n < ys!n"
    "â‹€n. Suc n < length xs âŸ¹ ys!n < xs!Suc n"
  assumes "xs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "ys âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "strict_sorted (interact xs ys)"
  using assms
proof (induction rule: interact.induct)
  case (3 x xs y ys)
  then have "x < y"
    by force+
  moreover have "strict_sorted (interact xs ys)"
    using 3 by simp (metis Suc_less_eq nth_Cons_Suc)
  moreover have "y < interact xs ys"
  proof (clarsimp simp add: less_list_def)
    assume "y â‰  []" and ne: "interact xs ys â‰  []"
    then show "last y < hd (interact xs ys)"
      using 3
      apply simp
      by (metis dual_order.strict_trans1 hd_interact length_greater_0_conv less_list_def list.sel(1) lists.simps mem_lists_non_Nil nth_Cons' nth_mem)
  qed
  ultimately show ?case
    using 3 by (simp add: strict_sorted_append_iff less_list_def)
qed auto


subsection â€¹Forms and interactionsâ€º

subsubsection â€¹Formsâ€º

inductive Form_Body :: "[nat, nat, nat list, nat list, nat list] â‡’ bool"
  where "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs"
  if "length xs < length ys" "xs = concat (a#as)" "ys = concat (b#bs)"
          "a#as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "b#bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
          "length (a#as) = ka" "length (b#bs) = kb"
          "c = acc_lengths 0 (a#as)"
          "d = acc_lengths 0 (b#bs)"
          "zs = concat [c, a, d, b] @ interact as bs"
          "strict_sorted zs"


inductive Form :: "[nat, nat list set] â‡’ bool"
  where "Form 0 {xs,ys}" if "length xs = length ys" "xs â‰  ys"
      | "Form (2*k-1) {xs,ys}" if "Form_Body k k xs ys zs" "k > 0"
      | "Form (2*k)   {xs,ys}" if "Form_Body (Suc k) k xs ys zs" "k > 0"

inductive_cases Form_0_cases_raw: "Form 0 u"

lemma Form_elim_upair:
  assumes "Form l U"
  obtains xs ys where "xs â‰  ys" "U = {xs,ys}" "length xs â‰¤ length ys"
  using assms
  by (elim Form.cases Form_Body.cases; metis dual_order.order_iff_strict less_not_refl)


lemma Form_Body_WW:
  assumes "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs"
  shows "zs âˆˆ WW"
  by (rule Form_Body.cases [OF assms]) (auto simp: WW_def)

lemma Form_Body_nonempty:
  assumes "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs"
  shows "length zs > 0"
  by (rule Form_Body.cases [OF assms]) auto

lemma Form_Body_length:
  assumes "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs"
  shows "length xs < length ys"
  using Form_Body.cases assms by blast

lemma form_cases:
  fixes l::nat
  obtains (zero) "l = 0" | (nz) ka kb where "l = ka+kb - 1" "0 < kb" "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
proof -
  have "l = 0 âˆ¨ (âˆƒka kb. l = ka+kb - 1 âˆ§ 0 < kb âˆ§ kb â‰¤ ka âˆ§ ka â‰¤ Suc kb)"
    by presburger
  then show thesis
    using nz zero by blast
qed

subsubsection â€¹Interactionsâ€º

lemma interact:
  assumes "Form l U" "l>0"
  obtains ka kb xs ys zs where "l = ka+kb - 1" "U = {xs,ys}" "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs" "0 < kb" "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
  using form_cases [of l]
proof cases
  case zero
  then show ?thesis
    using Form_0_cases_raw assms that(1) by auto
next
  case (nz ka kb)
  obtain xs ys where xys: "xs â‰  ys" "U = {xs,ys}" "length xs â‰¤ length ys"
    using Form_elim_upair assms by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "ka = kb")
    case True
    show ?thesis
      using Form.cases [OF â€¹Form l Uâ€º]
    proof cases
      case (2 k xs' ys' zs')
      then have "xs' = xs âˆ§ ys' = ys"
        by (metis Form_Body_length Set.doubleton_eq_iff leD xys(2) xys(3))
      moreover have "k = ka"
        using 2 True nz by presburger
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using 2 True nz(1) nz(4) that xys(1) by blast
    qed (use True nz in â€¹presburger+â€º)
  next
    case False
    show ?thesis
      using Form.cases [OF â€¹Form l Uâ€º]
    proof cases
      case (3 k xs' ys' zs')
      then have "xs' = xs âˆ§ ys' = ys"
        by (metis Form_Body_length Set.doubleton_eq_iff leD xys(2) xys(3))
      moreover have "k = kb"
        using 3 False nz
        by linarith 
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using 3 False nz â€¹xs â‰  ysâ€º
        by (metis le_SucE le_antisym that)
    qed (use False nz in â€¹presburger+â€º)
  qed
qed


definition inter_scheme :: "nat â‡’ nat list set â‡’ nat list"
  where "inter_scheme l U â‰¡ @zs. âˆƒk xs ys. l > 0
                    âˆ§ (l = 2*k-1 âˆ§ U = {xs,ys} âˆ§ Form_Body k k xs ys zs
                     âˆ¨ l = 2*k âˆ§ U = {xs,ys} âˆ§ Form_Body (Suc k) k xs ys zs)"


lemma inter_scheme:
  assumes "Form l U" "l>0"
  obtains ka kb xs ys where "l = ka+kb - 1" "U = {xs,ys}" "Form_Body ka kb xs ys (inter_scheme l U)" "0 < kb" "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
  using interact [OF â€¹Form l Uâ€º]
proof cases
  case 1
  with â€¹l > 0â€º show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (2 ka kb xs ys zs)
  then have Â§: "â‹€ka kb zs. Â¬ Form_Body ka kb ys xs zs"
    using Form_Body_length less_asym' by blast
  have "Form_Body ka kb xs ys (inter_scheme l U)"
  proof (cases "ka = kb")
    case True
    with 2 have l: "âˆ€k. l â‰  k * 2"
      by presburger
    have [simp]: "â‹€k. kb + kb - Suc 0 = k * 2 - Suc 0 âŸ· k=kb"
      by auto
    show ?thesis
      unfolding inter_scheme_def using 2 l True
      by (auto simp add: Â§ â€¹l > 0â€º Set.doubleton_eq_iff conj_disj_distribR ex_disj_distrib algebra_simps some_eq_ex)
  next
    case False
    with 2 have l: "âˆ€k. l â‰  k * 2 - Suc 0" and [simp]: "ka = Suc kb"
      by presburger+
    have [simp]: "â‹€k. kb + kb = k * 2 âŸ· k=kb"
      by auto
    show ?thesis
      unfolding inter_scheme_def using 2 l False
      by (auto simp add: Â§ â€¹l > 0â€º Set.doubleton_eq_iff conj_disj_distribR ex_disj_distrib algebra_simps some_eq_ex)
  qed
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: 2 that)
qed


lemma inter_scheme_simple:
  assumes "Form l U" "l>0"
  shows "inter_scheme l U âˆˆ WW âˆ§ length (inter_scheme l U) > 0"
  using inter_scheme [OF assms] by (meson Form_Body_WW Form_Body_nonempty)

lemma inter_scheme_strict_sorted:
  assumes "Form l U" "l>0"
  shows "strict_sorted (inter_scheme l U)"
  using inter_scheme_simple [OF assms] by (auto simp: WW_def)

subsubsection â€¹Injectivity of interactionsâ€º

proposition inter_scheme_injective:
  assumes "Form l U" "Form l U'" "l > 0" and eq: "inter_scheme l U' = inter_scheme l U"
  shows "U' = U"
proof -
  obtain ka kb xs ys 
    where l: "l = ka+kb - 1" and U: "U = {xs,ys}" 
      and FB: "Form_Body ka kb xs ys (inter_scheme l U)" and "0 < kb" "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
    using assms inter_scheme by blast
  then obtain a as b bs c d
    where xs: "xs = concat (a#as)" and ys: "ys = concat (b#bs)"
      and len: "length (a#as) = ka" "length (b#bs) = kb"
      and c: "c = acc_lengths 0 (a#as)"
      and d: "d = acc_lengths 0 (b#bs)"
      and Ueq: "inter_scheme l U = concat [c, a, d, b] @ interact as bs"
    by (auto simp: Form_Body.simps)
  obtain ka' kb' xs' ys' 
    where l': "l = ka'+kb' - 1" and U': "U' = {xs',ys'}" 
      and FB': "Form_Body ka' kb' xs' ys' (inter_scheme l U')" and "0 < kb'" "kb' â‰¤ ka'" "ka' â‰¤ Suc kb'"
    using assms inter_scheme by blast
  then obtain a' as' b' bs' c' d'
    where xs': "xs' = concat (a'#as')" and ys': "ys' = concat (b'#bs')"
      and len': "length (a'#as') = ka'" "length (b'#bs') = kb'"
      and c': "c' = acc_lengths 0 (a'#as')"
      and d': "d' = acc_lengths 0 (b'#bs')"
      and Ueq': "inter_scheme l U' = concat [c', a', d', b'] @ interact as' bs'"
    using Form_Body.simps by auto
  have [simp]: "ka' = ka âˆ§ kb' = kb"
    using â€¹l > 0â€º l l' â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kbâ€º â€¹ka' â‰¤ Suc kb'â€º â€¹kb â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹kb' â‰¤ ka'â€º le_SucE le_antisym mult_2 by linarith 
  have [simp]: "length c = length c'" "length d = length d'"
    using c c' d d' len' len by auto
  have c_off: "c' = c" "a' @ d' @ b' @ interact as' bs' = a @ d @ b @ interact as bs"
    using eq by (auto simp: Ueq Ueq')
  then have len_a: "length a' = length a"
    by (metis acc_lengths.simps(2) add.left_neutral c c' nth_Cons_0)
  with c_off have Â§: "a' = a" "d' = d" "b' @ interact as' bs' = b @ interact as bs"
    by auto
  then have "length (interact as' bs') = length (interact as bs)"
    by (metis acc_lengths.simps(2) add_left_cancel append_eq_append_conv d d' list.inject)
  with Â§ have "b' = b" "interact as' bs' = interact as bs"
    by auto
  moreover have "acc_lengths 0 as' = acc_lengths 0 as"
    using â€¹a' = aâ€º â€¹c' = câ€º by (simp add: c' c acc_lengths.simps acc_lengths_shift)
  moreover have "acc_lengths 0 bs' = acc_lengths 0 bs"
    using â€¹b' = bâ€º â€¹d' = dâ€º by (simp add: d' d acc_lengths.simps acc_lengths_shift)
  ultimately have "as' = as âˆ§ bs' = bs"
    using acc_lengths_interact_injective by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: â€¹a' = aâ€º U U' â€¹b' = bâ€º xs xs' ys ys')
qed


lemma strict_sorted_interact_imp_concat:
    "strict_sorted (interact as bs) âŸ¹ strict_sorted (concat as) âˆ§ strict_sorted (concat bs)"
proof (induction as bs rule: interact.induct)
  case (3 x xs y ys)
  show ?case
  proof (cases x)
    case Nil
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases y)
      case Nil
      then show ?thesis
        using "3" strict_sorted_append_iff by (auto simp: â€¹x = []â€º)
    next
      case (Cons a list)
      with Nil 3 show ?thesis
        apply (simp add: strict_sorted_append_iff)
