        by (metis (no_types, lifting) Un_iff set_interact sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    qed
  next
    case (Cons a list)
    have Â§: "sorted_wrt (<) ((a # list) @ y @ interact xs ys)"
      by (metis (no_types) "3.prems" interact.simps(3) local.Cons strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    then have "list = [] âˆ¨ concat xs = [] âˆ¨ last list < hd (concat xs)"
      by (metis (full_types) Un_iff hd_in_set last_ConsR last_in_set list.simps(3) set_append set_interact sorted_wrt_append)
    then have "list < concat xs"
      using less_list_def by blast
    have "list < y"
      by (metis Â§ append.assoc last.simps less_list_def list.distinct(1) strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    note Cons1 = Cons
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases y)
      case Nil
      then show ?thesis
        using 3 by (simp add: sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    next
      case (Cons a' list')
      have "strict_sorted (list' @ concat ys)"
        apply (simp add: strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
        by (metis "3.IH" "Â§" Un_iff append_Cons local.Cons set_interact sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted.simps(2) strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
      moreover have "y < concat ys"
        by (metis "Â§" Un_iff hd_in_set last_in_set less_list_def set_interact sorted_wrt_append)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using 3 â€¹list < concat xsâ€º
        by (auto simp: Cons1 strict_sorted_append_iff)
    qed
  qed
qed auto




lemma strict_sorted_interact_hd:
  "âŸ¦strict_sorted (interact cs ds); cs â‰  []; ds â‰  []; hd cs â‰  []; hd ds â‰  []âŸ§
       âŸ¹ hd (hd cs) < hd (hd ds)"
  by (metis Nil_is_append_conv hd_append2 hd_in_set interact.simps(3) list.exhaust_sel sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)


text â€¹the lengths of the two lists can differ by oneâ€º
proposition interaction_scheme_unique_aux:
  assumes eq: "concat as = concat as'" and ys': "concat bs = concat bs'"
    and ne: "as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
    and ss_zs: "strict_sorted (interact as bs)"
    and "length bs â‰¤ length as" "length as â‰¤ Suc (length bs)"
    and ne': "as' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "bs' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
    and ss_zs': "strict_sorted (interact as' bs')"
    and "length bs' â‰¤ length as'" "length as' â‰¤ Suc (length bs')"
    and "length as = length as'" "length bs = length bs'"
  shows "as = as' âˆ§ bs = bs'"
  using assms
proof (induction "length as" arbitrary: as bs as' bs')
  case 0 then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Suc k)
  show ?case
  proof (cases k)
    case 0
    then have "length as = Suc 0"
      using Suc.hyps(2) by auto
    then obtain a a' where "as = [a]" "as' = [a']"
      by (metis â€¹length as = length as'â€º length_0_conv length_Suc_conv)
    with 0 show ?thesis
      using Suc.prems
      apply (simp add: le_Suc_eq)
      by (metis concat.simps length_0_conv length_Suc_conv self_append_conv)
  next
    case (Suc k')
    then obtain a cs b ds where eq: "as = a#cs" "bs = b#ds"
      using Suc.prems
      by (metis Suc.hyps(2) le0 list.exhaust list.size(3) not_less_eq_eq)
    have "length as' â‰  0"
      using Suc.hyps(2) Suc.prems(1) Suc.prems(3) interact_eq_Nil_iff by auto
    then obtain a' cs' b' ds' where eq': "as' = a'#cs'" "bs' = b'#ds'"
      by (metis Suc.prems(14) eq(2) length_0_conv list.exhaust)
    obtain k: "k = length cs" "k â‰¤ Suc (length ds)"
      using eq â€¹Suc k = length asâ€º â€¹length bs â‰¤ length asâ€º â€¹length as â‰¤ Suc (length bs)â€º by auto
    case (Suc k')
    obtain [simp]: "b â‰  []" "b' â‰  []" "a â‰  []" "a' â‰  []"
      using Suc.prems by (simp add: eq eq')
    then have "hd b' = hd b"
      using Suc.prems(2) by (metis concat.simps(2) eq'(2) eq(2) hd_append2)

    have ss_ab: "strict_sorted (concat as)" "strict_sorted (concat bs)"
      using strict_sorted_interact_imp_concat Suc.prems(5) by blast+
    have "a < b"
      by (metis eq Suc.prems(5) append.assoc interact.simps(3) strict_sorted_append_iff)
    have sw_ab: "sorted_wrt (<) (a @ b @ interact cs ds)"
      by (metis Suc.prems(5) eq interact.simps(3) strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    then have "hd b âˆ‰ list.set (concat cs)"
      by (metis Un_iff â€¹b â‰  []â€º list.set_sel(1) not_less_iff_gr_or_eq set_interact sorted_wrt_append)
    have "b < concat cs"
      using eq â€¹strict_sorted (interact as bs)â€º
      apply (simp add: strict_sorted_append_iff)
      by (metis Un_iff sw_ab last_in_set less_list_def list.set_sel(1) set_interact sorted_wrt_append)
    have "strict_sorted (a @ concat cs)"
      using eq(1) ss_ab(1) by force
    then have b_cs: "strict_sorted (b @ concat cs)"
      by (metis â€¹b < concat csâ€º strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt sw_ab)
    have "list.set a = list.set (concat as) âˆ© {..< hd b}"
    proof -
      have "x âˆˆ list.set a"
        if "x < hd b" and "l âˆˆ list.set cs" and "x âˆˆ list.set l" for x l
        using b_cs sorted_hd_le strict_sorted_imp_sorted that by fastforce
      then show ?thesis
        using â€¹b â‰  []â€º sw_ab by (force simp: strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_wrt_append eq)
    qed
    moreover
    have ss_ab': "strict_sorted (concat as')" "strict_sorted (concat bs')"
      using strict_sorted_interact_imp_concat Suc.prems(10) by blast+
    have "a' < b'"
      by (metis eq' Suc.prems(10) append.assoc interact.simps(3) strict_sorted_append_iff)
    have sw_ab': "sorted_wrt (<) (a' @ b' @ interact cs' ds')"
      by (metis Suc.prems(10) eq' interact.simps(3) strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
    then have "hd b' âˆ‰ list.set (concat cs')"
      by (metis Un_iff â€¹b' â‰  []â€º list.set_sel(1) not_less_iff_gr_or_eq set_interact sorted_wrt_append)
    have "b' < concat cs'"
      using eq' â€¹strict_sorted (interact as' bs')â€º
      apply (simp add: strict_sorted_append_iff)
      by (metis Un_iff last_in_set less_list_def list.set_sel(1) set_interact sorted_wrt_append sw_ab')
    have "strict_sorted (a' @ concat cs')"
      using eq'(1) ss_ab'(1) by force
    then have b_cs': "strict_sorted (b' @ concat cs')"
      using â€¹b' < concat cs'â€º eq'(2) ss_ab'(2) strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
    have "list.set a' = list.set (concat as') âˆ© {..< hd b'}"
    proof -
      have "x âˆˆ list.set a'"
        if "x < hd b'" and "l âˆˆ list.set cs'" and "x âˆˆ list.set l" for x l
        using b_cs' sorted_hd_le strict_sorted_imp_sorted that by fastforce
      then show ?thesis
        using â€¹b' â‰  []â€º sw_ab' by (force simp: strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_wrt_append eq')
    qed
    ultimately have "a=a'"
      by (metis Suc.prems(1) â€¹hd b' = hd bâ€º sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_equal strict_sorted_sorted_wrt sw_ab sw_ab')
    moreover
    have ccat_cs_cs': "concat cs = concat cs'"
      using Suc.prems(1) â€¹a = a'â€º eq'(1) eq(1) by fastforce
    have "b=b'"
    proof (cases "ds = [] âˆ¨ ds' = []")
      case True
      then show ?thesis
        using Suc.prems(14) Suc.prems(2) eq'(2) eq(2) by auto
    next
      case False
      then have "ds â‰  []" "ds' â‰  []"
        by auto
      have "strict_sorted b"
        by (metis Suc.prems(2) concat.simps(2) eq(2) ss_ab'(2) strict_sorted_append_iff)
      moreover
      have "cs â‰  []"
        using k local.Suc by auto

      then obtain "hd cs â‰  []" "hd ds â‰  []"
        using Suc.prems(3) Suc.prems(4) eq list.set_sel(1)
        by (simp add: â€¹ds â‰  []â€º mem_lists_non_Nil)
      then have "concat cs â‰  []"
        using â€¹cs â‰  []â€º hd_in_set by auto
      have "hd (concat cs) < hd (concat ds)"
        using strict_sorted_interact_hd
        by (metis â€¹cs â‰  []â€º â€¹ds â‰  []â€º â€¹hd cs â‰  []â€º â€¹hd ds â‰  []â€º hd_concat strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt sw_ab)
      then have "list.set b = list.set (concat bs) âˆ© {..< hd (concat cs)}"
        using ss_ab
        apply (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff eq)
        apply (metis â€¹b < concat csâ€º â€¹concat cs â‰  []â€º hd_in_set sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt)
        by (metis strict_sorted_iff UN_I dual_order.strict_trans2 order.asym set_concat sorted_hd_le)
      moreover
      have "cs' â‰  []"
        using k local.Suc â€¹concat cs â‰  []â€º ccat_cs_cs' by auto
      then obtain "hd cs' â‰  []" "hd ds' â‰  []"
        using Suc.prems(8,9) â€¹ds' â‰  []â€º eq'(1) eq'(2) list.set_sel(1) by auto
      then have "concat cs' â‰  []"
        using â€¹cs' â‰  []â€º hd_in_set by auto
      have "hd (concat cs') < hd (concat ds')"
        using strict_sorted_interact_hd
        by (metis â€¹cs' â‰  []â€º â€¹ds' â‰  []â€º â€¹hd cs' â‰  []â€º â€¹hd ds' â‰  []â€º hd_concat strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_sorted_wrt sw_ab')
      then have "list.set b' = list.set (concat bs') âˆ© {..< hd (concat cs')}"
        using ss_ab'
        apply (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff eq')
         apply (meson strict_sorted_iff â€¹b' < concat cs'â€º â€¹b' â‰  []â€º â€¹concat cs' â‰  []â€º dual_order.strict_trans2 less_list_def sorted_le_last)
        by (metis strict_sorted_iff UN_I dual_order.strict_trans2 order.asym set_concat sorted_hd_le)

      ultimately show "b = b'"
        by (metis Suc.prems(2) ccat_cs_cs' strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_equal strict_sorted_sorted_wrt sw_ab')
    qed
    moreover
    have "cs = cs' âˆ§ ds = ds'"
    proof (rule Suc.hyps)
      show "k = length cs"
        using eq Suc.hyps(2) by auto[1]
      show "concat ds = concat ds'"
        using Suc.prems(2) â€¹b = b'â€º eq'(2) eq(2) by auto
      show "strict_sorted (interact cs ds)"
        using eq Suc.prems(5) strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
      show "length ds â‰¤ length cs" "length cs â‰¤ Suc (length ds)"
        using eq Suc.hyps(2) Suc.prems(6) k by auto
      show "strict_sorted (interact cs' ds')"
        using eq' Suc.prems(10) strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
      show "length cs = length cs'"
        using Suc.hyps(2) Suc.prems(13) eq'(1) k(1) by force
    qed (use ccat_cs_cs' eq eq' Suc.prems in auto)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by (simp add: â€¹a = a'â€º â€¹b = b'â€º eq eq')
  qed
qed


proposition Form_Body_unique:
  assumes "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs" "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs'" and "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
  shows "zs' = zs"
proof -
  obtain a as b bs c d
      where xs: "xs = concat (a#as)" and ys: "ys = concat (b#bs)"
        and ne: "a#as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "b#bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
        and len: "length (a#as) = ka" "length (b#bs) = kb"
        and c: "c = acc_lengths 0 (a#as)"
        and d: "d = acc_lengths 0 (b#bs)"
        and Ueq: "zs = concat [c, a, d, b] @ interact as bs"
        and ss_zs: "strict_sorted zs"
    using Form_Body.cases [OF assms(1)] by (metis (no_types))
  obtain a' as' b' bs' c' d'
      where xs': "xs = concat (a'#as')" and ys': "ys = concat (b'#bs')"
        and ne': "a'#as' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "b'#bs' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
        and len': "length (a'#as') = ka" "length (b'#bs') = kb"
        and c': "c' = acc_lengths 0 (a'#as')"
        and d': "d' = acc_lengths 0 (b'#bs')"
        and Ueq': "zs' = concat [c', a', d', b'] @ interact as' bs'"
        and ss_zs': "strict_sorted zs'"
    using Form_Body.cases [OF assms(2)] by (metis (no_types))
  have [simp]: "length c = length c'" "length d = length d'"
    using c c' d d' len' len by auto
  have "a < b"
    using ss_zs apply (simp add: Ueq strict_sorted_append_iff)
    by (metis strict_sorted_iff append.assoc d length_0_conv length_acc_lengths list.distinct(1) strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_trans)
  have "a' < b'"
    using ss_zs' apply (simp add: Ueq' strict_sorted_append_iff)
    by (metis strict_sorted_iff append.assoc d' length_0_conv length_acc_lengths list.distinct(1) strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_trans)
  have "a#as = a'#as' âˆ§ b#bs = b'#bs'"
  proof (rule interaction_scheme_unique_aux)
    show "concat (a # as) = concat (a' # as')"
      using xs xs' by blast
    show "concat (b # bs) = concat (b' # bs')"
      using ys ys' by blast
    show "a # as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "b # bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
      using ne by auto
    show "strict_sorted (interact (a # as) (b # bs))"
      using ss_zs â€¹a < bâ€º apply (simp add: Ueq strict_sorted_append_iff)
      by (metis strict_sorted_iff append.assoc append.left_neutral strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_trans)
    show "length (b # bs) â‰¤ length (a # as)" "length (b' # bs') â‰¤ length (a' # as')"
      using â€¹kb â‰¤ kaâ€º len len' by auto
    show "length (a # as) â‰¤ Suc (length (b # bs))"
      using â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kbâ€º len by linarith
    then show "length (a' # as') â‰¤ Suc (length (b' # bs'))"
      using len len' by fastforce
    show "a' # as' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "b' # bs' âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
      using ne' by auto
    show "strict_sorted (interact (a' # as') (b' # bs'))"
      using ss_zs' â€¹a' < b'â€º apply (simp add: Ueq' strict_sorted_append_iff)
      by (metis strict_sorted_iff append.assoc append.left_neutral strict_sorted_append_iff sorted_trans)
    show "length (a # as) = length (a' # as')"
      using len'(1) len(1) by blast
    show "length (b # bs) = length (b' # bs')"
      using len'(2) len(2) by blast
  qed
  then show ?thesis
    using Ueq Ueq' c c' d d' by blast
qed


lemma Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme:
  assumes "Form_Body ka kb xs ys zs" and "0 < kb" "kb â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc kb"
  shows "zs = inter_scheme ((ka+kb) - Suc 0) {xs,ys}"
proof -
  have "length xs < length ys"
    by (meson Form_Body_length assms(1))
  have [simp]: "a + a = b + b âŸ· a=b"  "a + a - Suc 0 = b + b - Suc 0 âŸ· a=b" for a b::nat
    by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "ka = kb")
    case True
    show ?thesis
      unfolding inter_scheme_def
      apply (rule some_equality [symmetric])
      using assms True mult_2 not_gr0 one_is_add apply fastforce
      using assms â€¹length xs < length ysâ€º
      apply (auto simp: True mult_2 Set.doubleton_eq_iff Form_Body_unique dest: Form_Body_length)
      by presburger
  next
    case False
    then have eq: "ka = Suc kb"
      using assms by linarith
    show ?thesis
      unfolding inter_scheme_def
      apply (rule some_equality [symmetric])
      using assms False mult_2 one_is_add eq apply fastforce
      using assms â€¹length xs < length ysâ€º
       apply (auto simp: eq mult_2 Set.doubleton_eq_iff Form_Body_unique dest: Form_Body_length)
      by presburger
  qed
qed


subsection â€¹For Lemma 3.8 AND PROBABLY 3.7â€º

definition grab :: "nat set â‡’ nat â‡’ nat set Ã— nat set"
  where "grab N n â‰¡ (N âˆ© enumerate N ` {..<n}, N âˆ© {enumerate N n..})"

lemma grab_0 [simp]: "grab N 0 = ({}, N)"
  by (fastforce simp add: grab_def enumerate_0 Least_le)

lemma less_sets_grab:
  "infinite N âŸ¹ less_sets (fst (grab N n)) (snd (grab N n))"
  by (auto simp: grab_def less_sets_def intro: enumerate_mono less_le_trans)

lemma finite_grab [iff]: "finite (fst (grab N n))"
  by (simp add: grab_def)

lemma card_grab [simp]:
  assumes "infinite N" shows "card (fst (grab N n)) = n"
proof -
  have "N âˆ© enumerate N ` {..<n} = enumerate N ` {..<n}"
    using assms by (auto simp: enumerate_in_set)
  with assms show ?thesis
    by (simp add: card_image grab_def strict_mono_enum strict_mono_imp_inj_on)
qed

lemma fst_grab_subset: "fst (grab N n) âŠ† N"
  using grab_def range_enum by fastforce

lemma snd_grab_subset: "snd (grab N n) âŠ† N"
  by (auto simp: grab_def)

lemma grab_Un_eq:
  assumes "infinite N" shows "fst (grab N n) âˆª snd (grab N n) = N"
proof
  show "N âŠ† fst (grab N n) âˆª snd (grab N n)"
    unfolding grab_def
    using assms enumerate_Ex le_less_linear strict_mono_enum strict_mono_less by fastforce
qed (simp add: grab_def)

lemma finite_grab_iff [simp]: "finite (snd (grab N n)) âŸ· finite N"
  by (metis finite_grab grab_Un_eq infinite_Un infinite_super snd_grab_subset)

lemma grab_eqD:
    "âŸ¦grab N n = (A,M); infinite NâŸ§
    âŸ¹ less_sets A M âˆ§ finite A âˆ§ card A = n âˆ§ infinite M âˆ§ A âŠ† N âˆ§ M âŠ† N"
  using card_grab grab_def less_sets_grab finite_grab_iff by auto

lemma less_sets_fst_grab: "less_sets A N âŸ¹ less_sets A (fst (grab N n))"
  by (simp add: fst_grab_subset less_sets_weaken2)

textâ€¹Possibly redundant, given @{term grab}â€º
definition nxt where "nxt â‰¡ Î»N. Î»n::nat. N âˆ© {n<..}"

lemma infinite_nxtN: "infinite N âŸ¹ infinite (nxt N n)"
  by (simp add: infinite_nat_greaterThan nxt_def)

lemma nxt_subset: "nxt N n âŠ† N"
  unfolding nxt_def by blast

lemma nxt_subset_greaterThan: "m â‰¤ n âŸ¹ nxt N n âŠ† {m<..}"
  by (auto simp: nxt_def)

lemma nxt_subset_atLeast: "m â‰¤ n âŸ¹ nxt N n âŠ† {m..}"
  by (auto simp: nxt_def)

lemma enum_nxt_ge: "infinite N âŸ¹ a â‰¤ enum (nxt N a) n"
  by (simp add: atLeast_le_enum infinite_nxtN nxt_subset_atLeast)

lemma inj_enum_nxt: "infinite N âŸ¹ inj_on (enum (nxt N a)) A"
  by (simp add: infinite_nxtN strict_mono_enum strict_mono_imp_inj_on)


subsection â€¹Larson's Lemma 3.11â€º

text â€¹Again from Jean A. Larson,
     A short proof of a partition theorem for the ordinal $\omega^\omega$.
     \emph{Annals of Mathematical Logic}, 6:129â€“145, 1973.â€º

lemma lemma_3_11:
  assumes "l > 0"
  shows "thin (inter_scheme l ` {U. Form l U})"
  using form_cases [of l]
proof cases
  case zero
  then show ?thesis
    using assms by auto
next
  case (nz ka kb)
  show ?thesis
    unfolding thin_def
  proof clarify
    fix U U'
    assume ne: "inter_scheme l U â‰  inter_scheme l U'" and init: "initial_segment (inter_scheme l U) (inter_scheme l U')"
    assume "Form l U"
    then obtain kp kq xs ys 
      where "l = kp+kq - 1" "U = {xs,ys}" and U: "Form_Body kp kq xs ys (inter_scheme l U)" and "0 < kq" "kq â‰¤ kp" "kp â‰¤ Suc kq"
      using assms inter_scheme by blast
    then have "kp = ka âˆ§ kq = kb"
      using nz by linarith
    then obtain a as b bs c d
      where xs: "xs = concat (a#as)" and ys: "ys = concat (b#bs)"
        and len: "length (a#as) = ka" "length (b#bs) = kb"
        and c: "c = acc_lengths 0 (a#as)"
        and d: "d = acc_lengths 0 (b#bs)"
        and Ueq: "inter_scheme l U = concat [c, a, d, b] @ interact as bs"
      using U by (auto simp: Form_Body.simps)
    assume "Form l U'"
    then obtain kp' kq' xs' ys' 
      where "l = kp'+kq' - 1" "U' = {xs',ys'}" and U': "Form_Body kp' kq' xs' ys' (inter_scheme l U')" and "0 < kq'" "kq' â‰¤ kp'" "kp' â‰¤ Suc kq'"
      using assms inter_scheme by blast
    then have "kp' = ka âˆ§ kq' = kb"
      using nz by linarith
    then obtain a' as' b' bs' c' d'
      where xs': "xs' = concat (a'#as')" and ys': "ys' = concat (b'#bs')"
        and len': "length (a'#as') = ka" "length (b'#bs') = kb"
        and c': "c' = acc_lengths 0 (a'#as')"
        and d': "d' = acc_lengths 0 (b'#bs')"
        and Ueq': "inter_scheme l U' = concat [c', a', d', b'] @ interact as' bs'"
      using U' by (auto simp: Form_Body.simps)
    have [simp]: "length bs' = length bs" "length as' = length as"
      using len len' by auto
    have "inter_scheme l U â‰  []" "inter_scheme l U' â‰  []"
      using Form_Body_nonempty U U' by auto
    define u1 where "u1 â‰¡ hd (inter_scheme l U)"
    have u1_eq': "u1 = hd (inter_scheme l U')"
      using â€¹inter_scheme l U â‰  []â€º init u1_def initial_segment_ne by fastforce
    have au1: "u1 = length a"
      by (simp add: u1_def Ueq c acc_lengths.simps)
    have au1': "u1 = length a'"
      by (simp add: u1_eq' Ueq' c' acc_lengths.simps)
    have len_eqk: "length c' = ka" "length d' = kb" "length c' = ka" "length d' = kb"
      using c d len c' d' len' by auto
    have take: "take (ka + u1 + kb) (c @ a @ d @ l) = c @ a @ d"
               "take (ka + u1 + kb) (c' @ a' @ d' @ l) = c' @ a' @ d'" for l
      using c d c' d' len by (simp_all add: flip: au1 au1')
    have leU: "ka + u1 + kb â‰¤ length (inter_scheme l U)"
      using c d len by (simp add: au1 Ueq)
    then have "take (ka + u1 + kb) (inter_scheme l U) = take (ka + u1 + kb) (inter_scheme l U')"
      using take_initial_segment init by blast
    then have Â§: "c @ a @ d = c' @ a' @ d'"
      by (metis Ueq Ueq' append.assoc concat.simps(2) take)
    have "length (inter_scheme l U) = ka + (c @ a @ d)!(ka-1) + kb + last d"
      by (simp add: Ueq c d length_interact nth_append flip: len)
    moreover have "length (inter_scheme l U') = ka + (c' @ a' @ d')!(ka-1) + kb + last d'"
      by (simp add: Ueq' c' d' length_interact nth_append flip: len')
    moreover have "last d = last d'"
      using "Â§" c d d' len'(1) len_eqk(1) by auto
    ultimately have "length (inter_scheme l U) = length (inter_scheme l U')"
      by (simp add: Â§)
    then show False
      using init initial_segment_length_eq ne by blast
  qed
qed


subsection â€¹Larson's Lemma 3.6â€º

proposition lemma_3_6:
  fixes g :: "nat list set â‡’ nat"
  assumes g: "g âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {0,1}"
  obtains N j where "infinite N"
    and "â‹€k u. âŸ¦k > 0; u âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–; Form k u; [enum N k] < inter_scheme k u; List.set (inter_scheme k u) âŠ† NâŸ§ âŸ¹ g u = j k"
proof -
  define Î¦ where "Î¦ â‰¡ Î»m::nat. Î»M. infinite M âˆ§ m < Inf M"
  define Î¨ where "Î¨ â‰¡ Î»l m n::nat. Î»M N j. n > m âˆ§ N âŠ† M âˆ§ n âˆˆ M âˆ§ (âˆ€U. Form l U âˆ§ U âŠ† WW âˆ§ [n] < inter_scheme l U âˆ§ list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N âŸ¶ g U = j)"
  { fix l m::nat and M :: "nat set"
    assume "l > 0" "Î¦ m M"
    let ?A = "inter_scheme l ` {U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–. Form l U}"
    define h where "h â‰¡ Î»zs. g (inv_into {U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–. Form l U} (inter_scheme l) zs)"
    have "thin ?A"
      using â€¹l > 0â€º lemma_3_11 by (simp add: thin_def)
    moreover
    have "?A âŠ† WW"
      using inter_scheme_simple â€¹0 < lâ€º by blast
    moreover
    have "h ` {l âˆˆ ?A. List.set l âŠ† M} âŠ† {..<2}"
      using g inv_into_into[of concl: "{U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–. Form l U}" "inter_scheme l"]
      by (force simp: h_def Pi_iff)
    ultimately
    obtain j N where "j < 2" "infinite N" "N âŠ† M" and hj: "h ` {l âˆˆ ?A. List.set l âŠ† N} âŠ† {j}"
      using â€¹Î¦ m Mâ€º unfolding Î¦_def by (blast intro: Nash_Williams_WW [of M])
    define n where "n â‰¡ Inf N"
    have "n > m"
      using â€¹Î¦ m Mâ€º â€¹infinite Nâ€º unfolding n_def Î¦_def Inf_nat_def infinite_nat_iff_unbounded
      by (metis LeastI_ex â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º le_less_trans not_less not_less_Least subsetD)
    have "g U = j" if "Form l U" "U âŠ† WW" "[n] < inter_scheme l U" "list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N - {n}" for U
    proof -
      obtain xs ys where xys: "xs â‰  ys" "U = {xs,ys}"
        using Form_elim_upair â€¹Form l Uâ€º by blast
      moreover have "inj_on (inter_scheme l) {U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–. Form l U}"
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) inter_scheme_injective â€¹0 < lâ€º inj_onI mem_Collect_eq)
      moreover have "g (inv_into {U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–. Form l U} (inter_scheme l) (inter_scheme l U)) = j"
        using hj that xys
        apply (simp add: h_def image_subset_iff image_iff)
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) Diff_subset doubleton_in_nsets_2 dual_order.trans)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using that by auto
    qed
    moreover have "n < Inf (N - {n})"
      unfolding n_def
      by (metis Diff_iff Inf_nat_def Inf_nat_def1 â€¹infinite Nâ€º finite.emptyI infinite_remove linorder_neqE_nat not_less_Least singletonI)
    moreover have "n âˆˆ M"
      by (metis Inf_nat_def1 â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º â€¹infinite Nâ€º finite.emptyI n_def subsetD)
    ultimately have "Î¦ n (N - {n}) âˆ§ Î¨ l m n M (N - {n}) j"
      using â€¹Î¦ m Mâ€º â€¹infinite Nâ€º â€¹N âŠ† Mâ€º â€¹n > mâ€º by (auto simp: Î¦_def Î¨_def)
    then have "âˆƒn N j. Î¦ n N âˆ§ Î¨ l m n M N j"
      by blast
  } note * = this
  have base: "Î¦ 0 {0<..}"
    unfolding Î¦_def by (metis infinite_Ioi Inf_nat_def1 greaterThan_iff greaterThan_non_empty)
  have step: "Ex (Î»(n,N,j). Î¦ n N âˆ§ Î¨ l m n M N j)" if "Î¦ m M" "l > 0" for m M l
    using * [of l m M] that by (auto simp: Î¦_def)
  define G where "G â‰¡ Î»l m M. @(n,N,j). Î¦ n N âˆ§ Î¨ (Suc l) m n M N j"
  have GÎ¦: "(Î»(n,N,j). Î¦ n N) (G l m M)" and GÎ¨: "(Î»(n,N,j). Î¨ (Suc l) m n M N j) (G l m M)"
    if "Î¦ m M" for l m M
    using step [OF that, of "Suc l"] by (force simp: G_def dest: some_eq_imp)+
  have G_increasing: "(Î»(n,N,j). n > m âˆ§ N âŠ† M âˆ§ n âˆˆ M) (G l m M)"  if "Î¦ m M" for l m M
    using GÎ¨ [OF that, of l] that by (simp add: Î¨_def split: prod.split_asm)
  define H where "H â‰¡ rec_nat (0,{0<..},0) (Î»l (m,M,j). G l m M)"
  have H_simps: "H 0 = (0,{0<..},0)" "â‹€l. H (Suc l) = (case H l of (m,M,j) â‡’ G l m M)"
    by (simp_all add: H_def)
  have HÎ¦: "(Î»(n,N,j). Î¦ n N) (H l)" for l
  proof (induction l)
    case 0
    with base show ?case
      by (auto simp: H_simps)
  next
    case (Suc l)
    with GÎ¦ show ?case
      by (force simp: H_simps split: prod.split prod.split_asm)
  qed
  define Î½ where "Î½ â‰¡ (Î»l. case H l of (n,M,j) â‡’ n)"
  have H_inc: "Î½ l â‰¥ l" for l
  proof (induction l)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (Suc l)
    then show ?case
      using HÎ¦ G_increasing [of "Î½ l"]
      apply (auto simp: H_simps Î½_def split: prod.split prod.split_asm)
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Suc_leI Suc_le_mono case_prod_conv dual_order.trans)
  qed
  let ?N = "range Î½"
  define j where "j â‰¡ Î»l. case H l of (n,M,j) â‡’ j"
  have H_increasing_Suc: "(case H k of (n, N, j') â‡’ N) âŠ‡ (case H (Suc k) of (n, N, j') â‡’ insert n N)" for k
    using HÎ¦ [of k]
    by (force simp: H_simps split: prod.split dest: G_increasing [where l=k])
  have H_increasing_superset: "(case H k of (n, N, j') â‡’ N) âŠ‡ (case H (n+k) of (n, N, j') â‡’ N)" for k n
  proof (induction n arbitrary:)
    case (Suc n)
    then show ?case
      using H_increasing_Suc [of "n+k"] by (auto split: prod.split_asm)
  qed auto
  then have H_increasing_less: "(case H k of (n, N, j') â‡’ N) âŠ‡ (case H l of (n, N, j') â‡’ insert n N)"
    if "k<l" for k l
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) H_increasing_Suc add.commute less_imp_Suc_add order_trans that)

  have "Î½ k < Î½ (Suc k)" for k
    using HÎ¦ [of k] unfolding Î½_def
    by (auto simp: H_simps split: prod.split dest: G_increasing [where l=k])
  then have strict_mono_Î½: "strict_mono Î½"
    by (simp add: strict_mono_Suc_iff)
  then have enum_N: "enum ?N = Î½"
    by (metis enum_works nat_infinite_iff range_strict_mono_ext)
  have **: "?N âˆ© {n<..} âŠ† N'" if H: "H k = (n, N', j)" for n N' k j
  proof clarify
    fix l
    assume "n < Î½ l"
    then have False if "l â‰¤ k"
      using that strict_monoD [OF strict_mono_Î½, of l k ] H by (force simp: Î½_def)
    then have "k < l"
      using not_less by blast
    then obtain M j where Mj: "H l = (Î½ l,M,j)"
      unfolding Î½_def
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) case_prod_conv old.prod.exhaust)
    then show "Î½ l âˆˆ N'"
      using that H_increasing_less [OF â€¹k<lâ€º] Mj by auto
  qed
  show thesis
  proof
    show "infinite (?N::nat set)"
      using H_inc infinite_nat_iff_unbounded_le by auto
  next
    fix l U
    assume "0 < l" and U: "U âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–"
      and interU: "[enum ?N l] < inter_scheme l U" "Form l U"
      and sub: "list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† ?N"
    obtain k where k: "l = Suc k"
      using â€¹0 < lâ€º gr0_conv_Suc by blast
    have "U âŠ† WW"
      using U by (auto simp: nsets_def)
    moreover
    have "g U = v" if "H k = (m, M, j0)" and "G k m M = (n, N', v)"
      for m M j0 n N' v
    proof -
      have n: "Î½ (Suc k) = n"
        using that by (simp add: Î½_def H_simps)
      have "{..enum (range Î½) l} âˆ© list.set (inter_scheme l U) = {}"
        using inter_scheme_strict_sorted â€¹0 < lâ€º interU singleton_less_list_iff strict_sorted_iff by blast
      then have "list.set (inter_scheme (Suc k) U) âŠ† N'"
        using that sub ** [of "Suc k" n N' v] Suc_le_eq not_less_eq_eq
        by (fastforce simp add:  k n enum_N H_simps)
      then show ?thesis
        using that interU â€¹U âŠ† WWâ€º GÎ¨ [of m M k] HÎ¦ [of k]
        by (auto simp: Î¨_def k enum_N H_simps n)
    qed
    ultimately show "g U = j l"
      by (auto simp: k j_def H_simps split: prod.split)
  qed
qed


subsection â€¹Larson's Lemma 3.7â€º

subsubsection â€¹Preliminariesâ€º

text â€¹Analogous to @{thm [source] ordered_nsets_2_eq}, but without type classesâ€º
lemma total_order_nsets_2_eq:
  assumes tot: "total_on A r" and irr: "irrefl r"
  shows "nsets A 2 = {{x,y} | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ A âˆ§ (x,y) âˆˆ r}"
     (is "_ = ?rhs")
proof
  show "nsets A 2 âŠ† ?rhs"
    unfolding numeral_nat
    apply (clarsimp simp add: nsets_def card_Suc_eq Set.doubleton_eq_iff not_less)
    by (metis tot total_on_def)
  show "?rhs âŠ† nsets A 2"
    using irr unfolding numeral_nat by (force simp: nsets_def card_Suc_eq irrefl_def)
qed

lemma lenlex_nsets_2_eq: "nsets A 2 = {{x,y} | x y. x âˆˆ A âˆ§ y âˆˆ A âˆ§ (x,y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than}"
  using total_order_nsets_2_eq by (simp add: total_order_nsets_2_eq irrefl_def)

lemma sum_sorted_list_of_set_map: "finite I âŸ¹ sum_list (map f (list_of I)) = sum f I"
proof (induction "card I" arbitrary: I)
  case 0
  then show ?case
    by auto
next
  case (Suc n I)
  then have [simp]: "I â‰  {}"
    by auto
  moreover have "sum_list (map f (list_of (I - {Min I}))) = sum f (I - {Min I})"
    using Suc by auto
  ultimately show ?case
    using Suc.prems sum.remove [of I "Min I" f]
    by (simp add: sorted_list_of_set_nonempty Suc)
qed


lemma sorted_list_of_set_UN_eq_concat:
  assumes I: "strict_mono_sets I f" "finite I" and fin: "â‹€i. finite (f i)"
  shows "list_of (â‹ƒi âˆˆ I. f i) = concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ f) (list_of I))"
  using I
proof (induction "card I" arbitrary: I)
  case 0
  then have "I={}" by auto
  then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Suc n I)
  then have "I â‰  {}" and Iexp: "I = insert (Min I) (I - {Min I})"
    using Min_in Suc.hyps(2) Suc.prems(2) by fastforce+
  have IH: "list_of (â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I}))) = concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ f) (list_of (I - {Min I})))"
    using Suc
    by (metis DiffE Min_in â€¹I â‰  {}â€º card_Diff_singleton diff_Suc_1 finite_Diff strict_mono_sets_def)
  have "list_of (â‹ƒ (f ` I)) = list_of (â‹ƒ (f ` (insert (Min I) (I - {Min I}))))"
    using Iexp by auto
  also have "â€¦ = list_of (f (Min I) âˆª â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I})))"
    by (metis Union_image_insert)
  also have "â€¦ = list_of (f (Min I)) @ list_of (â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I})))"
  proof (rule sorted_list_of_set_Un)
    show "less_sets (f (Min I)) (â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I})))"
      using Suc.prems â€¹I â‰  {}â€º strict_mono_less_sets_Min by blast
    show "finite (â‹ƒ (f ` (I - {Min I})))"
      by (simp add: â€¹finite Iâ€º fin)
  qed (use fin in auto)
  also have "â€¦ = list_of (f (Min I)) @ concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ f) (list_of (I - {Min I})))"
    using IH by metis
  also have "â€¦ = concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ f) (list_of I))"
    by (simp add: Suc.prems(2) â€¹I â‰  {}â€º sorted_list_of_set_nonempty)
  finally show ?case .
qed

subsubsection â€¹Lemma 3.7 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º

text â€¹Possibly should be redone using grabâ€º
proposition lemma_3_7:
  assumes "infinite N" "l > 0"
  obtains M where "M âˆˆ [WW]â‡—mâ‡–"
                  "â‹€U. U âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ Form l U âˆ§ List.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N"
proof (cases "m < 2")
  case True
  obtain w where w: "w âˆˆ WW"
    using WW_def strict_sorted_into_WW by auto
  define M where "M â‰¡ if m=0 then {} else {w}"
  have M: "M âˆˆ [WW]â‡—mâ‡–"
    using True by (auto simp: M_def nsets_def w)
  have [simp]: "[M]â‡—2â‡– = {}"
    using True by (auto simp: M_def nsets_def w dest: subset_singletonD)
  show ?thesis
    using M that by fastforce
next
  case False
  then have "m â‰¥ 2"
    by auto
  have nonz: "(enum N âˆ˜ Suc) i > 0" for i
    using assms(1) le_enumerate less_le_trans by fastforce
  note infinite_nxtN [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º, iff]

  have [simp]: "{n<..<Suc n} = {}" for n
    by auto

  define DF where "DF â‰¡ Î»k. rec_nat ((enum N âˆ˜ Suc) ` {..<Suc k}) (Î»r D. enum (nxt N (enum (nxt N (Max D)) (Inf D - Suc 0))) ` {..<Suc k})"
  have DF_simps: "DF k 0 = (enum N âˆ˜ Suc) ` {..<Suc k}"
    "DF k (Suc i) = enum (nxt N (enum (nxt N (Max (DF k i))) (Inf (DF k i) - Suc 0))) ` {..<Suc k}" for i k
    by (auto simp: DF_def)

  have card_DF: "card (DF k i) = Suc k" for i k
  proof (induction i)
    case 0
    have "inj_on (enum N âˆ˜ Suc) {..<Suc k}"
      by (simp add: assms(1) comp_inj_on strict_mono_enum strict_mono_imp_inj_on)
    with 0 show ?case
      using card_image DF_simps by fastforce
  next
    case (Suc i)
    then show ?case
      by (simp add: â€¹infinite Nâ€º DF_simps card_image infinite_nxtN strict_mono_enum strict_mono_imp_inj_on)
  qed
  have DF_ne: "DF k i â‰  {}" for i k
    by (metis card_DF card_lessThan lessThan_empty_iff nat.simps(3))
  have DF_N: "DF k i âŠ† N âˆ© {0<..}" for i k
  proof (induction i)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      using â€¹infinite Nâ€º range_enum nonz by (auto simp: DF_simps)
  next
    case (Suc i)
    then show ?case
      unfolding DF_simps image_subset_iff
      using infinite_nxtN [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º]
      by (metis Int_iff enumerate_in_set greaterThan_iff not_gr0 not_less0 nxt_def)
  qed
  then have DF_gt0: "0 < Inf (DF k i)" for i k
    using DF_ne Inf_nat_def1 by blast
  have finite_DF: "finite (DF k i)" for i k
    by (induction i) (auto simp: DF_simps)

  have sm_enum_DF: "strict_mono_on (enum (DF k i)) {..k}" for k i
    by (metis card_DF enum_works_finite finite_DF lessThan_Suc_atMost)

  have DF_Suc: "less_sets (DF k i) (DF k (Suc i))" for i k
    unfolding less_sets_def
    by (force simp: finite_DF DF_simps
        intro!: greaterThan_less_enum nxt_subset_greaterThan atLeast_le_enum nxt_subset_atLeast infinite_nxtN [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º])
  have DF_DF: "less_sets (DF k i) (DF k j)" if "i<j" for i j k
    by (meson DF_Suc DF_ne UNIV_I less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets strict_mono_setsD that)
  then have sm_DF: "strict_mono_sets UNIV (DF k)" for k
    by (simp add: strict_mono_sets_def)

  define AF where "AF â‰¡ Î»k i. enum (nxt N (Max (DF k i))) ` {..<Inf (DF k i)}"
  have AF_ne: "AF k i â‰  {}" for i k
    by (auto simp: AF_def lessThan_empty_iff DF_gt0)
  have finite_AF [simp]: "finite (AF k i)" for i k
    by (simp add: AF_def)
  have card_AF: "card (AF k i) = â¨… (DF k i)" for k i
    by (simp add: AF_def â€¹infinite Nâ€º card_image inj_enum_nxt)

  have DF_AF: "less_sets (DF k i) (AF k i)" for i k
    unfolding less_sets_def AF_def
    by (simp add: finite_DF â€¹infinite Nâ€º greaterThan_less_enum nxt_subset_greaterThan)

  have AF_DF_Suc: "less_sets (AF k i) (DF k (Suc i))" for i k
    apply (clarsimp simp: DF_simps less_sets_def AF_def)
    using strict_monoD [OF strict_mono_enum]
    by (metis DF_gt0 Suc_pred assms(1) dual_order.order_iff_strict greaterThan_less_enum
        infinite_nxtN linorder_neqE_nat not_less_eq nxt_subset_greaterThan)

  have AF_DF: "less_sets (AF k p) (DF k q)" if "p<q" for k p q
    using AF_DF_Suc
    by (metis DF_ne Suc_lessI UNIV_I less_sets_trans sm_DF strict_mono_sets_def that)

  have AF_Suc: "less_sets (AF k i) (AF k (Suc i))" for i k
    using AF_DF_Suc DF_AF DF_ne less_sets_trans by blast
  then have sm_AF: "strict_mono_sets UNIV (AF k)" for k
    by (simp add: AF_ne less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets)

  define del where "del â‰¡ Î»k i j. enum (DF k i) j - enum (DF k i) (j - Suc 0)"

  define QF where "QF k â‰¡ wfrec pair_less (Î»f (j,i).
       if j=0 then AF k i
       else let r = (if i=0 then f (j-1,m-1) else f (j,i-1)) in
                enum (nxt N (Suc (Max r))) ` {..< del k (if j=k then m - Suc i else i) j})"
    for k
  note cut_apply [simp]

  have finite_QF [simp]: "finite (QF k p)" for p k
    using wf_pair_less
  proof (induction p rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case (less p)
    then show ?case
      by (simp add: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k p] split: prod.split)
  qed

  have del_gt_0: "âŸ¦j < Suc k; 0 < jâŸ§ âŸ¹ 0 < del k i j" for i j k
    by (simp add: card_DF del_def finite_DF)

  have QF_ne [simp]: "QF k (j,i) â‰  {}" if j: "j < Suc k" for j i k
    using wf_pair_less j
  proof (induction "(j,i)" rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case less
    then show ?case
      by (auto simp: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k "(j,i)"] AF_ne lessThan_empty_iff del_gt_0)
  qed

  have QF_0 [simp]: "QF k (0,i) = AF k i" for i k
    by (simp add: def_wfrec [OF QF_def])

  have QF_Suc: "QF k (Suc j,0) = enum (nxt N (Suc (Max (QF k (j, m - Suc 0))))) `
                       {..< del k (if Suc j = k then m - 1 else 0) (Suc j)}" for j k
    apply (simp add: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k "(Suc j,0)"])
    apply (simp add: pair_less_def cut_def)
    done

  have QF_Suc_Suc: "QF k (Suc j, Suc i)
                  = enum (nxt N (Suc (Max (QF k (Suc j, i))))) ` {..< del k (if Suc j = k then m - Suc(Suc i) else Suc i) (Suc j)}"
    for i j k
    by (simp add: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k "(Suc j,Suc i)"])

  have less_QF1: "less_sets (QF k (j, m - Suc 0)) (QF k (Suc j,0))" for j k
    by (auto simp: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k "(Suc j,0)"] pair_lessI1 â€¹infinite Nâ€º enum_nxt_ge
        intro!: less_sets_weaken2 [OF less_sets_Suc_Max])

  have less_QF2: "less_sets (QF k (j,i)) (QF k (j, Suc i))" for j i k
    by (auto simp: def_wfrec [OF QF_def, of k "(j, Suc i)"] pair_lessI2 â€¹infinite Nâ€º enum_nxt_ge
        intro: less_sets_weaken2 [OF less_sets_Suc_Max] strict_mono_setsD [OF sm_AF])

  have less_QF_same: "less_sets (QF k (j,i')) (QF k (j,i))"
    if "i' < i" "j â‰¤ k" for i' i j k
  proof (rule strict_mono_setsD [OF less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets [of "Î»i. QF k (j,i)"]])
    show "less_sets (QF k (j, i)) (QF k (j, Suc i))" for i
      by (simp add: less_QF2)
    show "QF k (j, i) â‰  {}" if "0 < i" for i
      using that by (simp add: â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º le_imp_less_Suc)
  qed (use that in auto)

  have less_QF_step: "less_sets (QF k (j - Suc 0, i')) (QF k (j,i))"
    if "0 < j" "j â‰¤ k" "i' < m" for j i' i k
  proof -
    have less_QF1': "less_sets (QF k (j - Suc 0, m - Suc 0)) (QF k (j,0))" if "j > 0" for j
      by (metis less_QF1 that Suc_pred)
    have Â§: "less_sets (QF k (j - Suc 0, i')) (QF k (j,0))"
    proof (cases "i' = m - Suc 0")
      case True
      then show ?thesis
        using less_QF1' â€¹0 < jâ€º by blast
    next
      case False
      show ?thesis
        using False that less_sets_trans [OF less_QF_same less_QF1' QF_ne] by auto
    qed
    then show ?thesis
      by (metis QF_ne less_QF_same less_Suc_eq_le less_sets_trans â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º zero_less_iff_neq_zero)
  qed

  have less_QF: "less_sets (QF k (j',i')) (QF k (j,i))"
    if j: "j' < j" "j â‰¤ k" and i: "i' < m" "i < m" for j' j i' i k
    using j
  proof (induction "j-j'" arbitrary: j)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (Suc d)
    then have eq: "d = (j - Suc 0) - j'"
      by linarith
    show ?case
    proof (cases "j' < j - Suc 0")
      case True
      then have "less_sets (QF k (j', i')) (QF k (j - Suc 0, i))"
        using Suc eq by auto
      then show ?thesis
        by (rule less_sets_trans [OF _ less_QF_step QF_ne]) (use Suc i in auto)
    next
      case False
      then have "j' = j - Suc 0"
        using â€¹j' < jâ€º by linarith
      then show ?thesis
        using Suc.hyps â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º less_QF_step i by auto
    qed
  qed

  have sm_QF: "strict_mono_sets ({..k} Ã— {..<m}) (QF k)" for k
    unfolding strict_mono_sets_def
  proof (intro strip)
    fix p q
    assume p: "p âˆˆ {..k} Ã— {..<m}" and q: "q âˆˆ {..k} Ã— {..<m}" and "p < q"
    then obtain j' i' j i where Â§: "p = (j',i')" "q = (j,i)" "i' < m" "i < m" "j' â‰¤ k" "j â‰¤ k"
      using surj_pair [of p] surj_pair [of q] by blast
    with â€¹p < qâ€º have "j' < j âˆ¨ j' = j âˆ§ i' < i"
      by auto
    then show "less_sets (QF k p) (QF k q)"
    proof (elim conjE disjE)
      assume "j' < j"
      show "less_sets (QF k p) (QF k q)"
        by (simp add: Â§ â€¹j' < jâ€º less_QF that)
    qed (use Â§ in â€¹simp add: that less_QF_sameâ€º)
  qed
  then have sm_QF1: "strict_mono_sets {..<ka} (Î»j. QF k (j,i))"
    if "i<m" "Suc k â‰¥ ka" "ka â‰¥ k" for ka k i
  proof -
    have "{..<ka} âŠ† {..k}"
      by (metis lessThan_Suc_atMost lessThan_subset_iff â€¹Suc k â‰¥ kaâ€º)
    then show ?thesis
      by (simp add: less_QF strict_mono_sets_def subset_iff that)
  qed

  have disjoint_QF: "i'=i âˆ§ j'=j" if "Â¬ disjnt (QF k (j', i')) (QF k (j,i))" "j' â‰¤ k" "j â‰¤ k" "i' < m" "i < m" for i' i j' j k
    using that strict_mono_sets_imp_disjoint [OF sm_QF]
    by (force simp: pairwise_def)

  have card_QF: "card (QF k (j,i)) = (if j=0 then â¨… (DF k i) else del k (if j = k then m - Suc i else i) j)"
    for i k j
  proof (cases j)
    case 0
    then show ?thesis
      by (simp add: AF_def card_image â€¹infinite Nâ€º inj_enum_nxt)
  next
    case (Suc j')
    show ?thesis
      by (cases i; simp add: Suc QF_Suc QF_Suc_Suc card_image â€¹infinite Nâ€º inj_enum_nxt)
  qed
  have AF_non_Nil: "list_of (AF k i) â‰  []" for k i
    by (simp add: AF_ne)
  have QF_non_Nil: "list_of (QF k (j,i)) â‰  []" if "j < Suc k" for i j k
    by (simp add: that)

  have AF_subset_N: "AF k i âŠ† N" for i k
    unfolding AF_def image_subset_iff
    using nxt_subset enumerate_in_set infinite_nxtN â€¹infinite Nâ€º by blast

  have QF_subset_N: "QF k (j,i) âŠ† N" for i j k
  proof (induction j)
    case 0
    with AF_subset_N show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (Suc j)
    show ?case
      by (cases i) (use nxt_subset enumerate_in_set in â€¹(force simp: QF_Suc QF_Suc_Suc)+â€º)
  qed

  obtain ka k where "k>0" and kka: "k â‰¤ ka" "ka â‰¤ Suc k" "l = ((ka+k) - Suc 0)"
    by (metis One_nat_def assms(2) diff_add_inverse form_cases le0 le_refl)
  then have "ka > 0"
    using dual_order.strict_trans1 by blast
  have ka_k_or_Suc: "ka = k âˆ¨ ka = Suc k"
    using kka by linarith
  have lessThan_k: "{..<k} = insert 0 {0<..<k}" if "k>0" for k::nat
    using that by auto
  then have sorted_list_of_set_k: "list_of {..<k} = 0 # list_of {0<..<k}" if "k>0" for k::nat
    using sorted_list_of_set_insert_cons [of concl: 0 "{0<..<k}"] that by simp

  define RF where "RF â‰¡ Î»j i. if j = k then QF k (j, m - Suc i) else QF k (j,i)"
  have RF_subset_N: "RF j i âŠ† N" if "i<m" for i j
    using that QF_subset_N by (simp add: RF_def)
  have finite_RF [simp]: "finite (RF k p)" for p k
    by (simp add: RF_def)
  have RF_0: "RF 0 i = AF k i" for i
    using RF_def â€¹0 < kâ€º by auto
  have disjoint_RF: "i'=i âˆ§ j'=j" if "Â¬ disjnt (RF j' i') (RF j i)" "j' â‰¤ k" "j â‰¤ k" "i' < m" "i < m" for i' i j' j
    using disjoint_QF that
    by (auto simp: RF_def split: if_split_asm dest: disjoint_QF)

  have sum_card_RF [simp]: "(âˆ‘jâ‰¤n. card (RF j i)) = enum (DF k i) n" if "n â‰¤ k" "i < m" for i n
    using that
  proof (induction n)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      using DF_ne [of k i] finite_DF [of k i] â€¹k>0â€º
      by (simp add: RF_def AF_def card_image â€¹infinite Nâ€º inj_enum_nxt enum_0_eq_Inf_finite)
  next
    case (Suc n)
    then have "enum (DF k i) 0 â‰¤ enum (DF k i) n âˆ§ enum (DF k i) n â‰¤ enum (DF k i) (Suc n)"
      using sm_enum_DF [of k i]
      apply (simp add: strict_mono_on_def)
      by (metis Suc_leD dual_order.order_iff_strict le0)
    with Suc show ?case
      by (auto simp: RF_def card_QF del_def)
  qed
  have DF_in_N: "enum (DF k i) j âˆˆ N" if "j â‰¤ k" for i j
    using DF_N [of k i] card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF that
    by (metis inf.boundedE le_imp_less_Suc subsetD)
  have Inf_DF_N: "â¨…(DF k p) âˆˆ N" for k p
    using DF_N DF_ne Inf_nat_def1 by blast
  have RF_in_N: "(âˆ‘jâ‰¤n. card (RF j i)) âˆˆ N" if "n â‰¤ k" "i < m" for i n
    by (auto simp: DF_in_N that)

  have "ka - Suc 0 â‰¤ k"
    using kka(2) by linarith
  then have sum_card_RF' [simp]:
    "(âˆ‘j<ka. card (RF j i)) = enum (DF k i) (ka - Suc 0)" if "i < m" for i
    using sum_card_RF [of "ka - Suc 0" i]
    by (metis Suc_pred â€¹0 < kaâ€º lessThan_Suc_atMost that)

  have enum_DF_le_iff [simp]:
    "enum (DF k i) j â‰¤ enum (DF k i') j âŸ· i â‰¤ i'" (is "?lhs = _")
    if "j â‰¤ k" for i' i j k
  proof
    show "i â‰¤ i'" if ?lhs
    proof -
      have "enum (DF k i) j âˆˆ DF k i"
        by (simp add: card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF le_imp_less_Suc â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º)
      moreover have "enum (DF k i') j âˆˆ DF k i'"
        by (simp add: â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF le_imp_less_Suc that)
      ultimately have "enum (DF k i') j < enum (DF k i) j" if "i' < i"
        using sm_DF [of k] by (meson UNIV_I less_sets_def strict_mono_setsD that)
      then show ?thesis
        using not_less that by blast
    qed
    show ?lhs if "i â‰¤ i'"
      using sm_DF [of k] that â€¹j â‰¤ kâ€º card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF le_eq_less_or_eq
      by (force simp: strict_mono_sets_def less_sets_def finite_enumerate_in_set)
  qed
  then have enum_DF_eq_iff[simp]:
    "enum (DF k i) j = enum (DF k i') j âŸ· i = i'" if "j â‰¤ k" for i' i j k
    by (metis le_antisym order_refl that)
  have enum_DF_less_iff [simp]:
    "enum (DF k i) j < enum (DF k i') j âŸ· i < i'" if "j â‰¤ k" for i' i j k
    by (meson enum_DF_le_iff not_less that)

  have card_AF_sum: "card (AF k i) + (âˆ‘jâˆˆ{0<..<ka}. card (RF j i)) = enum (DF k i) (ka-1)"
    if "i < m" for i
    using that â€¹k > 0â€º  â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º
    by (simp add: lessThan_k RF_0 flip: sum_card_RF')

  have sorted_list_of_set_iff [simp]: "list_of {0<..<k} = [] âŸ· k = Suc 0" if "k>0" for k::nat
  proof -
    have "list_of {0<..<k} = [] âŸ· {0<..<k} = {}"
      by simp
    also have "â€¦ âŸ· k = Suc 0"
      using â€¹k > 0â€º atLeastSucLessThan_greaterThanLessThan by fastforce
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
  show thesis â€•â€¹proof of main resultâ€º
  proof
    have inj: "inj_on (Î»i. list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j i)) {..<m}"
    proof (clarsimp simp: inj_on_def)
      fix x y
      assume "x < m" "y < m" "list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j x) = list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j y)"
      then have eq: "(â‹ƒj<ka. RF j x) = (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j y)"
        by (simp add: sorted_list_of_set_inject)
      show "x = y"
      proof -
        obtain n where n: "n âˆˆ RF 0 x"
          using AF_ne QF_0 â€¹0 < kâ€º Inf_nat_def1 â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º by (force simp: RF_def)
        with eq â€¹ka > 0â€º obtain j' where "j' < ka" "n âˆˆ RF j' y"
          by blast
        then show ?thesis
          using disjoint_QF [of k 0 x j'] n â€¹x < mâ€º â€¹y < mâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º â€¹0 < kâ€º
          by (force simp: RF_def disjnt_iff simp del: QF_0 split: if_split_asm)
      qed
    qed

    define M where "M â‰¡ (Î»i. list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j i)) ` {..<m}"

    have "finite M"
      unfolding M_def by blast
    moreover have "card M = m"
      by (simp add: M_def â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º card_image inj)
    moreover have "M âŠ† WW"
      by (force simp: M_def WW_def)
    ultimately show "M âˆˆ [WW]â‡—mâ‡–"
      by (simp add: nsets_def)

    have sm_RF: "strict_mono_sets {..<ka} (Î»j. RF j i)" if "i<m" for i
      using sm_QF1 that kka
      by (simp add: less_QF RF_def strict_mono_sets_def)

    have RF_non_Nil: "list_of (RF j i) â‰  []" if "j < Suc k" for i j
      using that by (simp add: RF_def)

    have less_RF_same: "less_sets (RF j i') (RF j i)"
      if "i' < i" "j < k" for i' i j
      using that by (simp add: less_QF_same RF_def)

    have less_RF_same_k: "less_sets (RF k i') (RF k i)" â€•â€¹reversed version for @{term k}â€º
      if "i < i'" "i' < m" for i' i
      using that by (simp add: less_QF_same RF_def)

    show "Form l U âˆ§ list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N" if "U âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡–" for U
    proof -
      from that obtain x y where "U = {x,y}" "x âˆˆ M" "y âˆˆ M" and xy: "(x,y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
        by (auto simp: lenlex_nsets_2_eq)
      let ?R = "Î»p. list_of âˆ˜ (Î»j. RF j p)"
      obtain p q where x: "x = list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j p)"
        and y: "y = list_of (â‹ƒj<ka. RF j q)" and "p < m" "q < m"
        using â€¹x âˆˆ Mâ€º â€¹y âˆˆ Mâ€º by (auto simp: M_def)
      then have pq: "p<q" "length x < length y"
        using xy â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º lexl_not_refl [OF irrefl_less_than]
        by (auto simp: lenlex_def sm_RF sorted_list_of_set_UN_lessThan length_concat sum_sorted_list_of_set_map)
      moreover
      have xc: "x = concat (map (?R p) (list_of {..<ka}))"
        by (simp add: x sorted_list_of_set_UN_eq_concat â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º â€¹p < mâ€º sm_RF)
      have yc: "y = concat (map (?R q) (list_of {..<ka}))"
        by (simp add: y sorted_list_of_set_UN_eq_concat â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º sm_RF)
      have enum_DF_AF: "enum (DF k p) (ka - Suc 0) < hd (list_of (AF k p))" for p
      proof (rule less_setsD [OF DF_AF])
        show "enum (DF k p) (ka - Suc 0) âˆˆ DF k p"
          using â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º card_DF finite_DF by (auto simp: finite_enumerate_in_set)
        show "hd (list_of (AF k p)) âˆˆ AF k p"
          using AF_non_Nil finite_AF hd_in_set set_sorted_list_of_set by blast
      qed

      have less_RF_RF: "less_sets (RF n p) (RF n q)" if "n < k" for n
        using that â€¹p<qâ€º by (simp add: less_RF_same)
      have less_RF_Suc: "less_sets (RF n q) (RF (Suc n) q)" if "n < k" for n
        using â€¹q < mâ€º that by (auto simp: RF_def less_QF)
      have less_RF_k: "less_sets (RF k q) (RF k p)"
        using â€¹q < mâ€º less_RF_same_k â€¹p<qâ€º by blast
      have less_RF_k_ka: "less_sets (RF (k - Suc 0) p) (RF (ka - Suc 0) q)"
        using ka_k_or_Suc less_RF_RF
        by (metis One_nat_def RF_def â€¹0 < kâ€º â€¹ka - Suc 0 â‰¤ kâ€º â€¹p < mâ€º diff_Suc_1 diff_Suc_less less_QF_step)
      have Inf_DF_eq_enum: "â¨… (DF k i) = enum (DF k i) 0" for k i
        by (simp add: Inf_nat_def enumerate_0)

      have Inf_DF_less: "â¨… (DF k i') < â¨… (DF k i)" if "i'<i" for i' i k
        by (metis DF_ne enum_0_eq_Inf enum_0_eq_Inf_finite enum_DF_less_iff le0 that)
      have AF_Inf_DF_less: "â‹€x. x âˆˆ AF k i âŸ¹ â¨… (DF k i') < x" if "i'â‰¤i" for i' i
        using less_setsD [OF DF_AF] DF_ne that
        by (metis Inf_DF_less Inf_nat_def1 dual_order.order_iff_strict dual_order.strict_trans)

      show ?thesis
      proof (cases "k=1")
        case True
        with kka consider "ka=1" | "ka=2" by linarith
        then show ?thesis
        proof cases
          case 1
          define zs where "zs = card (AF 1 p) # list_of (AF 1 p)
                              @ card (AF 1 q) # list_of (AF 1 q)"
          have zs: "Form_Body ka k x y zs"
          proof (intro that exI conjI Form_Body.intros [OF â€¹length x < length yâ€º])
            show "x = concat ([list_of (AF k p)])" "y = concat ([list_of (AF k q)])"
              by (simp_all add: x y 1 lessThan_Suc RF_0)
            have "less_sets (AF k p) (insert (â¨… (DF k q)) (AF k q))"
              by (metis AF_DF DF_ne Inf_nat_def1 RF_0 â€¹0 < kâ€º insert_iff less_RF_RF less_sets_def pq(1))
            then have "strict_sorted (list_of (AF k p) @ â¨… (DF k q) # list_of (AF k q))"
              by (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff intro: less_sets_imp_list_less AF_Inf_DF_less)
            moreover have "â‹€x. x âˆˆ AF k q âŸ¹ â¨… (DF k p) < x"
              by (meson AF_Inf_DF_less less_imp_le_nat â€¹p < qâ€º)
            ultimately show "strict_sorted zs"
              using â€¹p < qâ€º True Inf_DF_less DF_AF DF_ne
              apply (auto simp: zs_def less_sets_def card_AF AF_Inf_DF_less)
              by (meson Inf_nat_def1)
          qed (auto simp: â€¹k=1â€º â€¹ka=1â€º acc_lengths.simps zs_def AF_ne)
          have zs_N: "list.set zs âŠ† N"
            using AF_subset_N by (auto simp: zs_def card_AF Inf_DF_N â€¹k=1â€º)
          show ?thesis
          proof
            have "l = 1"
              using kka â€¹k=1â€º â€¹ka=1â€º by auto
            have "Form (2*1-1) {x,y}"
              using "1" Form.intros(2) True zs by fastforce
            then show "Form l U"
              by (simp add: â€¹U = {x,y}â€º â€¹l = 1â€º)
            show "list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N"
              using kka zs zs_N â€¹k=1â€º Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme by (fastforce simp add: â€¹U = {x,y}â€º)
          qed
        next
          case 2
          note True [simp] note 2 [simp]
          have [simp]: "{0<..<2} = {Suc 0}"
            by auto
          have enum_DF1_eq: "enum (DF (Suc 0) i) (Suc 0) = card (AF (Suc 0) i) + card (RF (Suc 0) i)"
            if "i < m" for i
            using card_AF_sum that by simp
          have card_RF: "card (RF (Suc 0) i) = enum (DF (Suc 0) i) (Suc 0) - enum (DF (Suc 0) i) 0" if "i < m" for i
            using that by (auto simp: RF_def card_QF del_def)
          have list_of_AF_RF: "list_of (AF (Suc 0) q âˆª RF (Suc 0) q) = list_of (AF (Suc 0) q) @ list_of (RF (Suc 0) q)"
            using RF_def â€¹q < mâ€º less_QF_step by (fastforce intro!: sorted_list_of_set_Un)

          define zs where "zs = card (AF 1 p) # (card (AF 1 p) + card (RF 1 p))
                         # list_of (AF 1 p)
                  @ (card (AF 1 q) + card (RF 1 q)) # list_of (AF 1 q) @ list_of (RF 1 q) @ list_of (RF 1 p)"
          have zs: "Form_Body ka k x y zs"
          proof (intro that exI conjI Form_Body.intros [OF â€¹length x < length yâ€º])
            have "x = list_of (RF 0 p âˆª RF (Suc 0) p)"
              by (simp add: x eval_nat_numeral lessThan_Suc RF_0 Un_commute)
            also have "â€¦ = list_of (RF 0 p) @ list_of (RF (Suc 0) p)"
              using RF_def True â€¹p < mâ€º less_QF_step
              by (subst sorted_list_of_set_Un) (fastforce+)
            finally show "x = concat ([list_of (AF 1 p),list_of (RF 1 p)])"
              by (simp add: RF_0)
            show "y = concat [list_of (RF 1 q âˆª AF 1 q)]"
              by (simp add: y eval_nat_numeral lessThan_Suc RF_0)
            show "zs = concat [[card (AF 1 p), card (AF 1 p) + card (RF 1 p)], list_of (AF 1 p),
                              [card (AF 1 q) + card (RF 1 q)], list_of (RF 1 q âˆª AF 1 q)] @ interact [list_of (RF 1 p)] []"
              using list_of_AF_RF by (simp add: zs_def Un_commute)
            show "strict_sorted zs"
            proof (simp add: â€¹p<mâ€º â€¹q<mâ€º â€¹p<qâ€º zs_def strict_sorted_append_iff, intro conjI strip)
              show "0 < card (RF (Suc 0) p)"
                using â€¹p<mâ€º by (simp add: card_RF card_DF finite_DF)
              show "card (AF (Suc 0) p) < card (AF (Suc 0) q) + card (RF (Suc 0) q)"
                using â€¹p<qâ€º â€¹q<mâ€º by (simp add: Inf_DF_less card_AF trans_less_add1)
              show "card (AF (Suc 0) p) < x"
                if "x âˆˆ AF (Suc 0) p âˆª (AF (Suc 0) q âˆª (RF (Suc 0) q âˆª RF (Suc 0) p))" for x
                using that
                apply (simp add: card_AF)
                by (metis AF_ne DF_AF DF_ne less_RF_RF less_RF_Suc less_RF_k Inf_nat_def1 One_nat_def RF_0 RF_non_Nil True finite_RF lessI less_setsD less_sets_trans sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
              show "card (AF (Suc 0) p) + card (RF (Suc 0) p) < card (AF (Suc 0) q) + card (RF (Suc 0) q)"
                using â€¹p < qâ€º â€¹p < mâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º by (metis enum_DF1_eq enum_DF_less_iff le_refl)
              show "card (AF (Suc 0) p) + card (RF (Suc 0) p) < x"
                if "x âˆˆ AF (Suc 0) p âˆª (AF (Suc 0) q âˆª (RF (Suc 0) q âˆª RF (Suc 0) p))" for x
                using that â€¹p < mâ€º
                apply (simp add: flip: enum_DF1_eq)
                by (metis AF_ne DF_AF less_RF_RF less_RF_Suc less_RF_k One_nat_def RF_0 RF_non_Nil Suc_mono True â€¹0 < kâ€º card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF less_setsD less_sets_trans sorted_list_of_set_empty)
              have "list_of (AF (Suc 0) p) < list_of {enum (DF (Suc 0) q) (Suc 0)}"
              proof (rule less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set)
                show "less_sets (AF (Suc 0) p) {enum (DF (Suc 0) q) (Suc 0)}"
                  by (metis (no_types, lifting) AF_DF DF_ne Inf_nat_def1 â€¹q < mâ€º card_AF enum_DF1_eq less_setsD less_sets_singleton2 pq(1) trans_less_add1)
              qed auto
              then show "list_of (AF (Suc 0) p) < (card (AF (Suc 0) q) + card (RF (Suc 0) q)) # list_of (AF (Suc 0) q) @ list_of (RF (Suc 0) q) @ list_of (RF (Suc 0) p)"
                using â€¹q < mâ€º by (simp add: less_list_def enum_DF1_eq)
              show "card (AF (Suc 0) q) + card (RF (Suc 0) q) < x"
                if "x âˆˆ AF (Suc 0) q âˆª (RF (Suc 0) q âˆª RF (Suc 0) p)" for x
                using that â€¹q < mâ€º
                apply (simp flip: enum_DF1_eq)
                by (metis AF_ne DF_AF less_RF_Suc less_RF_k One_nat_def RF_0 RF_non_Nil True card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF finite_RF lessI less_setsD less_sets_trans sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
              have "list_of (AF (Suc 0) q) < list_of (RF (Suc 0) q)"
              proof (rule less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set)
                show "less_sets (AF (Suc 0) q) (RF (Suc 0) q)"
                  by (metis less_RF_Suc One_nat_def RF_0 True â€¹0 < kâ€º)
              qed auto
              then show "list_of (AF (Suc 0) q) < list_of (RF (Suc 0) q) @ list_of (RF (Suc 0) p)"
                using RF_non_Nil by (auto simp: less_list_def)
              show "list_of (RF (Suc 0) q) < list_of (RF (Suc 0) p)"
              proof (rule less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set)
                show "less_sets (RF (Suc 0) q) (RF (Suc 0) p)"
                  by (metis less_RF_k One_nat_def True)
              qed auto
            qed
            show "[list_of (AF 1 p), list_of (RF 1 p)] âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
              using RF_non_Nil â€¹0 < kâ€º by (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps zs_def AF_ne)
            show "[card (AF 1 q) + card (RF 1 q)] = acc_lengths 0 [list_of (RF 1 q âˆª AF 1 q)]"
              using list_of_AF_RF
              by (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps zs_def AF_ne sup_commute)
          qed (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps zs_def AF_ne)
          have zs_N: "list.set zs âŠ† N"
            using â€¹p < mâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º DF_in_N  enum_DF1_eq [symmetric]
            by (auto simp: zs_def card_AF AF_subset_N RF_subset_N Inf_DF_N)
          show ?thesis
          proof
            have "Form (2*1) {x,y}"
              by (metis "2" Form.simps Suc_1 True zero_less_one zs)
            with kka show "Form l U"
              by (simp add: â€¹U = {x,y}â€º)
            show "list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N"
              using kka zs zs_N â€¹k=1â€º Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme by (fastforce simp add: â€¹U = {x, y}â€º)
          qed
        qed
      next
        case False
        then have "k â‰¥ 2" "ka â‰¥ 2"
          using kka â€¹k>0â€º by auto
        then have k_minus_1 [simp]: "Suc (k - Suc (Suc 0)) = k - Suc 0"
          by auto

        define PP where "PP â‰¡ map (?R p) (list_of {0<..<ka})"
        define QQ where "QQ â‰¡ map (?R q) (list_of {0<..<k-1}) @ ([list_of (RF (k-1) q âˆª RF (ka-1) q)])"
        let ?INT = "interact PP QQ"
        â€•â€¹No separate sets A and B as in the text, but instead we treat both cases as onceâ€º
        have [simp]: "length PP = ka - 1"
          by (simp add: PP_def)
        have [simp]: "length QQ = k - 1"
          using â€¹k â‰¥ 2â€º by (simp add: QQ_def)

        have PP_n: "PP ! n = list_of (RF (Suc n) p)"
          if "n < ka-1" for n
          using that kka by (auto simp: PP_def nth_sorted_list_of_set_greaterThanLessThan)

        have QQ_n: "QQ ! n = (if n < k - Suc (Suc 0) then list_of (RF (Suc n) q)
                              else list_of (RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆª RF (ka - Suc 0) q))"
          if "n < k-1" for n
          using that kka by (auto simp: QQ_def nth_append nth_sorted_list_of_set_greaterThanLessThan)

        have QQ_n_same: "QQ ! n = list_of (RF (Suc n) q)"
          if "n < k - Suc 0" "k=ka" for n
          using that kka Suc_diff_Suc
          by (fastforce simp add: QQ_def nth_append nth_sorted_list_of_set_greaterThanLessThan)

        have split_nat_interval: "{0<..<n} = insert (n - Suc 0) {0<..<n - Suc 0}" if "n â‰¥ 2" for n
          using that by auto
        have split_list_interval: "list_of{0<..<n} = list_of{0<..<n - Suc 0} @ [n - Suc 0]" if "n â‰¥ 2" for n
        proof (intro sorted_list_of_set_unique [THEN iffD1] conjI)
          have "list_of {0<..<n - Suc 0} < [n - Suc 0]"
            by (auto intro: less_sets_imp_list_less)
          then show "strict_sorted (list_of {0<..<n - Suc 0} @ [n - Suc 0])"
            by (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff)
        qed (use â€¹n â‰¥ 2â€º in auto)

        have list_of_RF_Un: "list_of (RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆª RF k q) = list_of (RF (k - Suc 0) q) @ list_of (RF k q)"
          by (metis less_RF_Suc Suc_pred â€¹0 < kâ€º diff_Suc_less finite_RF sorted_list_of_set_Un)

        have card_AF_sum_QQ: "card (AF k q) + sum_list (map length QQ) = (âˆ‘j<ka. card (RF j q))"
        proof (cases "ka = Suc k")
          case True
          have "RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆ© RF k q = {}"
            using less_RF_Suc [of "k - Suc 0"] â€¹k > 0â€º by (auto simp: less_sets_def)
          then have "card (RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆª RF k q) = card (RF (k - Suc 0) q) + card (RF k q)"
            by (simp add: card_Un_disjoint)
          then show ?thesis
            using â€¹kâ‰¥2â€º â€¹q < mâ€º
            apply (simp add: QQ_def True flip: RF_0)
            apply (simp add: lessThan_k split_nat_interval sum_sorted_list_of_set_map)
            done
        next
          case False
          with kka have "ka=k" by linarith
          with â€¹kâ‰¥2â€º show ?thesis by (simp add: QQ_def lessThan_k split_nat_interval sum_sorted_list_of_set_map flip: RF_0)
        qed

        define LENS where "LENS â‰¡ Î»i. acc_lengths 0 (list_of (AF k i) # map (?R i) (list_of {0<..<ka}))"
        have LENS_subset_N: "list.set (LENS i) âŠ† N" if "i < m" for i
        proof -
          have eq: "(list_of (AF k i) # map (?R i) (list_of {0<..<ka})) = map (?R i) (list_of {..<ka})"
            using RF_0 â€¹0 < kaâ€º sorted_list_of_set_k by auto
          let ?f = "rec_nat [card (AF k i)] (Î»n r. r @ [(âˆ‘jâ‰¤Suc n. card (RF j i))])"
          have f: "acc_lengths 0 (map (?R i) (list_of {..v})) = ?f v" for v
            by (induction v) (auto simp: RF_0 acc_lengths.simps acc_lengths_append sum_sorted_list_of_set_map)
          have 3: "list.set (?f v) âŠ† N" if "v â‰¤ k" for v
            using that
          proof (induction v)
            case 0
            have "card (AF k i) âˆˆ N"
              by (metis DF_N DF_ne Inf_nat_def1 Int_subset_iff card_AF subsetD)
            with 0 show ?case by simp
          next
            case (Suc v)
            then have "enum (DF k i) (Suc v) âˆˆ N"
              by (metis DF_N Int_subset_iff card_DF finite_enumerate_in_set finite_DF in_mono le_imp_less_Suc)
            with Suc â€¹i < mâ€º show ?case
              by (simp del: sum.atMost_Suc)
          qed
          show ?thesis
            unfolding LENS_def
            by (metis "3" Suc_pred â€¹0 < kaâ€º â€¹ka - Suc 0 â‰¤ kâ€º eq f lessThan_Suc_atMost)
        qed
        define LENS_QQ where "LENS_QQ â‰¡ acc_lengths 0 (list_of (AF k q) # QQ)"
        have LENS_QQ_subset: "list.set LENS_QQ âŠ† list.set (LENS q)"
        proof (cases "ka = Suc k")
          case True
          with â€¹k â‰¥ 2â€º show ?thesis
            unfolding QQ_def LENS_QQ_def LENS_def
            by (auto simp: list_of_RF_Un split_list_interval acc_lengths.simps acc_lengths_append)
        next
          case False
          then have "ka=k"
            using kka by linarith
          with â€¹k â‰¥ 2â€º show ?thesis
            by (simp add: QQ_def LENS_QQ_def LENS_def split_list_interval)
        qed
        have ss_INT: "strict_sorted ?INT"
        proof (rule strict_sorted_interact_I)
          fix n
          assume "n < length QQ"
          then have n: "n < k-1"
            by simp
          have "n = k - Suc (Suc 0)" if "Â¬ n < k - Suc (Suc 0)"
            using n that by linarith
          with â€¹p<qâ€º n show "PP ! n < QQ ! n"
            using â€¹0 < kâ€º â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º â€¹p<qâ€º n
            by (auto simp: PP_n QQ_n less_RF_same less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set less_sets_Un2 less_RF_RF less_RF_k_ka)
        next
          fix n
          have V: "âŸ¦Suc n < ka - Suc 0âŸ§ âŸ¹ list_of (RF (Suc n) q) < list_of (RF (Suc (Suc n)) p)" for n
            by (smt One_nat_def RF_def Suc_leI â€¹ka - Suc 0 â‰¤ kâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º diff_Suc_1 finite_RF less_QF_step less_le_trans less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set nat_neq_iff zero_less_Suc)
          have "less_sets (RF (k -  Suc 0) q) (RF k p)"
            by (metis less_RF_Suc less_RF_k RF_non_Nil Suc_pred â€¹0 < kâ€º finite_RF lessI less_sets_trans sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
          with kka have "less_sets (RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆª RF (ka - Suc 0) q) (RF k p)"
            by (metis less_RF_k One_nat_def less_sets_Un1 antisym_conv2 diff_Suc_1 le_less_Suc_eq)
          then have VI: "list_of (RF (k - Suc 0) q âˆª RF (ka - Suc 0) q) < list_of (RF k p)"
            by (rule less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set) auto
          assume "Suc n < length PP"
          with â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º VI
          show "QQ ! n < PP ! Suc n"
            apply (auto simp: PP_n QQ_n less_RF_same less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set less_sets_Un1 less_sets_Un2 less_RF_RF less_RF_k_ka V)
            by (metis One_nat_def Suc_less_eq Suc_pred â€¹0 < kâ€º diff_Suc_1 k_minus_1 ka_k_or_Suc less_SucE)
        next
          show "PP âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
            using RF_non_Nil kka
            by (clarsimp simp: PP_def) (metis RF_non_Nil less_le_trans)
          show "QQ âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
            using RF_non_Nil kka
            by (clarsimp simp: QQ_def) (metis RF_non_Nil Suc_pred â€¹0 < kâ€º less_SucI)
        qed (use kka PP_def QQ_def in auto)
        then have ss_QQ: "strict_sorted (concat QQ)"
          using strict_sorted_interact_imp_concat by blast

        obtain zs where zs: "Form_Body ka k x y zs" and zs_N: "list.set zs âŠ† N"
        proof (intro that exI conjI Form_Body.intros [OF â€¹length x < length yâ€º])
          show "x = concat (list_of (AF k p) # PP)"
            using â€¹ka > 0â€º by (simp add: PP_def RF_0 xc sorted_list_of_set_k)
          let ?YR = "(map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»j. RF j q)) (list_of {0<..<ka}))"
          have "concat ?YR = concat QQ"
          proof (rule strict_sorted_equal [OF ss_QQ])
            show "strict_sorted (concat ?YR)"
            proof (rule strict_sorted_concat_I, simp_all)
              fix n
              assume "Suc n < ka - Suc 0"
              then show "list_of (RF (list_of {0<..<ka} ! n) q) < list_of (RF (list_of {0<..<ka} ! Suc n) q)"
                by (metis less_RF_Suc Suc_lessD â€¹ka - Suc 0 â‰¤ kâ€º add.left_neutral finite_RF less_le_trans less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set nth_sorted_list_of_set_greaterThanLessThan)
            next
              show "?YR âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
                using RF_non_Nil â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º by (auto simp: mem_lists_non_Nil)
            qed auto
            show "list.set (concat ?YR) = list.set (concat QQ)"
              using ka_k_or_Suc
            proof
              assume "ka = k"
              then show "list.set (concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»j. RF j q)) (list_of {0<..<ka}))) = list.set (concat QQ)"
                using â€¹kâ‰¥2â€º by simp (simp add: split_nat_interval QQ_def)
            next
              assume "ka = Suc k"
              then show "list.set (concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»j. RF j q)) (list_of {0<..<ka}))) = list.set (concat QQ)"
                using â€¹kâ‰¥2â€º by simp (auto simp: QQ_def split_nat_interval)
            qed
          qed
          then show "y = concat (list_of (AF k q) # QQ)"
            using â€¹ka > 0â€º by (simp add: RF_0 yc sorted_list_of_set_k)
          show "list_of (AF k p) # PP âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "list_of (AF k q) # QQ âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
            using  RF_non_Nil kka by (auto simp: AF_ne PP_def QQ_def eq_commute [of "[]"])
          show "list.set ((LENS p @ list_of (AF k p) @ LENS_QQ @ list_of (AF k q) @ ?INT)) âŠ† N"
            using AF_subset_N RF_subset_N LENS_subset_N â€¹p < mâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º LENS_QQ_subset
            by (auto simp: subset_iff PP_def QQ_def)
          show "length (list_of (AF k p) # PP) = ka" "length (list_of (AF k q) # QQ) = k"
            using â€¹0 < kaâ€º â€¹0 < kâ€º by auto
          show "LENS p = acc_lengths 0 (list_of (AF k p) # PP)"
            by (auto simp: LENS_def PP_def)
          show "strict_sorted (LENS p @ list_of (AF k p) @ LENS_QQ @ list_of (AF k q) @ ?INT)"
            unfolding strict_sorted_append_iff
          proof (intro conjI ss_INT)
            show "LENS p < list_of (AF k p) @ LENS_QQ @ list_of (AF k q) @ ?INT"
              using AF_non_Nil [of k p] â€¹k â‰¤ kaâ€º â€¹ka â‰¤ Suc kâ€º â€¹p < mâ€º card_AF_sum enum_DF_AF
              by (simp add: enum_DF_AF less_list_def card_AF_sum LENS_def sum_sorted_list_of_set_map)
            show "strict_sorted (LENS p)"
              unfolding LENS_def
              by (rule strict_sorted_acc_lengths) (use RF_non_Nil AF_non_Nil kka in â€¹auto simp: in_lists_conv_setâ€º)
            show "strict_sorted LENS_QQ"
              unfolding LENS_QQ_def QQ_def
              by (rule strict_sorted_acc_lengths) (use RF_non_Nil AF_non_Nil kka in â€¹auto simp: in_lists_conv_setâ€º)
            have last_AF_DF: "last (list_of (AF k p)) < â¨… (DF k q)"
              using AF_DF [OF â€¹p < qâ€º, of k] AF_non_Nil [of k p] DF_ne [of k q]
              by (metis Inf_nat_def1 finite_AF last_in_set less_sets_def set_sorted_list_of_set)
            then show "list_of (AF k p) < LENS_QQ @ list_of (AF k q) @ ?INT"
              by (simp add: less_list_def card_AF LENS_QQ_def)
            show "LENS_QQ < list_of (AF k q) @ ?INT"
              using AF_non_Nil [of k q] â€¹q < mâ€º card_AF_sum enum_DF_AF card_AF_sum_QQ
              by (auto simp: less_list_def AF_ne hd_append card_AF_sum LENS_QQ_def)
            show "list_of (AF k q) < ?INT"
            proof -
              have "less_sets (AF k q) (RF (Suc 0) p)"
                using â€¹0 < kâ€º â€¹p < mâ€º â€¹q < mâ€º by (simp add: RF_def less_QF flip: QF_0)
              then have "last (list_of (AF k q)) < hd (list_of (RF (Suc 0) p))"
              proof (rule less_setsD)
                show "last (list_of (AF k q)) âˆˆ AF k q"
                  using AF_non_Nil finite_AF last_in_set set_sorted_list_of_set by blast
                show "hd (list_of (RF (Suc 0) p)) âˆˆ RF (Suc 0) p"
                  by (metis RF_non_Nil Suc_mono â€¹0 < kâ€º finite_RF hd_in_set set_sorted_list_of_set)
              qed
              with â€¹k > 0â€º â€¹ka â‰¥ 2â€º RF_non_Nil show ?thesis
                by (simp add: hd_interact less_list_def sorted_list_of_set_greaterThanLessThan PP_def QQ_def)
            qed
          qed auto
        qed (auto simp: LENS_QQ_def)
        show ?thesis
        proof (cases "ka = k")
          case True
          then have "l = 2*k - 1"
            by (simp add: kka(3) mult_2)
          then show ?thesis
            by (metis Form.intros(2) Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme True â€¹0 < kâ€º â€¹U = {x, y}â€º kka zs zs_N)
        next
          case False
          then have "l = 2*k"
            using kka by linarith
          then show ?thesis
            by (metis False Form.intros(3) Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme â€¹0 < kâ€º â€¹U = {x, y}â€º antisym kka le_SucE zs zs_N)
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed
qed


subsection â€¹Larson's Lemma 3.8â€º

subsubsection â€¹Primitives needed for the inductive construction of @{term b}â€º

definition IJ where "IJ â‰¡ Î»k. Sigma {..k} (Î»j::nat. {..<j})"

lemma IJ_iff: "u âˆˆ IJ k âŸ· (âˆƒj i. u = (j,i) âˆ§ i<j âˆ§ jâ‰¤k)"
  by (auto simp: IJ_def)

lemma finite_IJ: "finite (IJ k)"
  by (auto simp: IJ_def)

fun prev where
  "prev 0 0 = None"
| "prev (Suc 0) 0 = None"
| "prev (Suc j) 0 = Some (j, j - Suc 0)"
| "prev j (Suc i) = Some (j,i)"

lemma prev_eq_None_iff: "prev j i = None âŸ· j â‰¤ Suc 0 âˆ§ i = 0"
  by (auto simp: le_Suc_eq elim: prev.elims)

lemma prev_pair_less:
  "prev j i = Some ji' âŸ¹ (ji', (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less"
  by (auto simp: pair_lessI1 elim: prev.elims)

lemma prev_Some_less: "âŸ¦prev j i = Some (j',i'); i â‰¤ jâŸ§ âŸ¹ i' < j'"
  by (auto elim: prev.elims)

lemma prev_maximal:
  "âŸ¦prev j i = Some (j',i'); (ji'', (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less; ji'' âˆˆ IJ kâŸ§
   âŸ¹ (ji'', (j',i')) âˆˆ pair_less âˆ¨ ji'' = (j',i')"
  by (force simp: IJ_def pair_less_def elim: prev.elims)

lemma pair_less_prev:
  assumes "(u, (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less" "u âˆˆ IJ k"
  shows "prev j i = Some u âˆ¨ (âˆƒx. (u, x) âˆˆ pair_less âˆ§ prev j i = Some x)"
proof (cases "prev j i")
  case None
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases u)
    case (Pair j' i')
    then show ?thesis
    using assms None by (simp add: prev_eq_None_iff pair_less_def IJ_def)
  qed
next
  case (Some a)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis assms prev_maximal prod.exhaust_sel)
qed



subsubsection â€¹Special primitives for the ordertype proofâ€º

definition USigma :: "'a set set â‡’ ('a set â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ 'a set set"
  where "USigma ğ’œ B â‰¡ â‹ƒXâˆˆğ’œ. â‹ƒyâˆˆB X. {insert y X}"

definition usplit
  where "usplit f A â‰¡ f (A - {Max A}) (Max A)"

lemma USigma_empty [simp]: "USigma {} B = {}"
  by (auto simp: USigma_def)

lemma USigma_iff:
  assumes "â‹€I j. I âˆˆ â„ âŸ¹ less_sets I (J I) âˆ§ finite I"
  shows "x âˆˆ USigma â„ J âŸ· usplit (Î»I j. Iâˆˆâ„ âˆ§ jâˆˆJ I âˆ§ x = insert j I) x"
proof -
  have [simp]: "â‹€I j. âŸ¦I âˆˆ â„; j âˆˆ J IâŸ§ âŸ¹ Max (insert j I) = j"
    by (meson Max_insert2 assms less_imp_le less_sets_def)
  show ?thesis
  proof -
    have "I - {j} âˆˆ â„" if "I âˆˆ â„" "j âˆˆ J I" for I j
      using that by (metis Diff_empty Diff_insert0 assms less_irrefl less_sets_def)
    moreover have "j âˆˆ J (I - {j})" if "I âˆˆ â„" "j âˆˆ J I" for I j
      using that by (metis Diff_empty Diff_insert0 assms less_irrefl less_setsD)
    moreover have "âˆƒIâˆˆâ„. âˆƒjâˆˆJ I. x = insert j I"
      if "x - {Max x} âˆˆ â„" and "Max x âˆˆ J (x - {Max x})" "x â‰  {}"
      using that by (metis Max_in assms infinite_remove insert_Diff)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      by (auto simp: USigma_def usplit_def)
  qed
qed


lemma ordertype_append_image_IJ:
  assumes lenB [simp]: "â‹€i j. i âˆˆ â„ âŸ¹ j âˆˆ J i âŸ¹ length (B j) = c"
    and AB: "â‹€i j. i âˆˆ â„ âŸ¹ j âˆˆ J i âŸ¹ A i < B j"
    and IJ: "â‹€i. i âˆˆ â„ âŸ¹ less_sets i (J i) âˆ§ finite i"
    and Î²: "â‹€i. i âˆˆ â„ âŸ¹ ordertype (B ` J i) (lenlex less_than) = Î²"
    and A: "inj_on A â„"
  shows "ordertype (usplit (Î»i j. A i @ B j) ` USigma â„ J) (lenlex less_than)
       = Î² * ordertype (A ` â„) (lenlex less_than)"
    (is "ordertype ?AB ?R = _ * ?Î±")
proof (cases "â„ = {}")
next
  case False
  have "Ord Î²"
    using Î² False wf_Ord_ordertype by fastforce
  show ?thesis
  proof (subst ordertype_eq_iff)
    define split where "split â‰¡ Î»l::nat list. (take (length l - c) l, (drop (length l - c) l))"
    have oB: "ordermap (B ` J i) ?R (B j) âŠ Î²" if â€¹i âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹j âˆˆ J iâ€º for i j
      using Î² less_TC_iff that by fastforce
    then show "Ord (Î² * ?Î±)"
      by (intro â€¹Ord Î²â€º wf_Ord_ordertype Ord_mult; simp)
    define f where "f â‰¡ Î»u. let (x,y) = split u in let i = inv_into â„ A x in
                        Î² * ordermap (A`â„) ?R x + ordermap (B`J i) ?R y"
    have inv_into_IA [simp]: "inv_into â„ A (A i) = i" if "i âˆˆ â„" for i
      by (simp add: A that)
    show "âˆƒf. bij_betw f ?AB (elts (Î² * ?Î±)) âˆ§ (âˆ€xâˆˆ?AB. âˆ€yâˆˆ?AB. (f x < f y) = ((x, y) âˆˆ ?R))"
      unfolding bij_betw_def
    proof (intro exI conjI strip)
      show "inj_on f ?AB"
      proof (clarsimp simp: f_def inj_on_def split_def USigma_iff IJ usplit_def)
        fix x y
        assume Â§: "Î² * ordermap (A ` â„) ?R (A (x - {Max x})) + ordermap (B ` J (x - {Max x})) ?R (B (Max x))
                 = Î² * ordermap (A ` â„) ?R (A (y - {Max y})) + ordermap (B ` J (y - {Max y})) ?R (B (Max y))"
          and x: "x - {Max x} âˆˆ â„"
          and y: "y - {Max y} âˆˆ â„"
          and mx: "Max x âˆˆ J (x - {Max x})"
          and "x = insert (Max x) x"
          and my: "Max y âˆˆ J (y - {Max y})"
        have "ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (x - {Max x})) = ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (y - {Max y}))"
          and B_eq: "ordermap (B ` J (x - {Max x})) ?R (B (Max x)) = ordermap (B ` J (y - {Max y})) ?R (B (Max y))"
          using mult_cancellation_lemma [OF Â§] oB mx my x y by blast+
        then have "A (x - {Max x}) = A (y - {Max y})"
          using x y by auto
        then have "x - {Max x} = y - {Max y}"
          by (metis x y inv_into_IA)
        then show "A (x - {Max x}) = A (y - {Max y}) âˆ§ B (Max x) = B (Max y)"
          using B_eq mx my by auto
      qed
      show "f ` ?AB = elts (Î² * ?Î±)"
      proof
        show "f ` ?AB âŠ† elts (Î² * ?Î±)"
          using â€¹Ord Î²â€º
          apply (clarsimp simp add: f_def split_def USigma_iff IJ usplit_def)
          by (metis Ord_mem_iff_less_TC TC_small add_mult_less image_eqI oB ordermap_in_ordertype trans_llt wf_Ord_ordertype wf_llt)
        show "elts (Î² * ?Î±) âŠ† f ` ?AB"
        proof (clarsimp simp: f_def split_def image_iff USigma_iff IJ usplit_def Bex_def elim!: elts_multE split: prod.split)
          fix Î³ Î´
          assume Î´: "Î´ âˆˆ elts Î²" and Î³: "Î³ âˆˆ elts ?Î±"
          have "Î³ âˆˆ ordermap (A ` â„) (lenlex less_than) ` A ` â„"
            by (meson Î³ ordermap_surj subset_iff)
          then obtain i where "i âˆˆ â„" and yv: "Î³ = ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A i)"
            by blast
          have "Î´ âˆˆ ordermap (B ` J i) (lenlex less_than) ` B ` J i"
            by (metis (no_types) Î² Î´ â€¹i âˆˆ â„â€º in_mono ordermap_surj)
          then obtain j where "j âˆˆ J i" and xu: "Î´ = ordermap (B`J i) ?R (B j)"
            by blast
          then have mji: "Max (insert j i) = j"
            by (meson IJ Max_insert2 â€¹i âˆˆ â„â€º less_imp_le less_sets_def)
          have [simp]: "i - {j} = i"
            using IJ â€¹i âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹j âˆˆ J iâ€º less_setsD by fastforce
          show
            "âˆƒl. (âˆƒK. K - {Max K} âˆˆ â„ âˆ§ Max K âˆˆ J (K - {Max K}) âˆ§
                          K = insert (Max K) K âˆ§
                          l = A (K - {Max K}) @ B (Max K)) âˆ§ Î² * Î³ + Î´ =
                    Î² *
                    ordermap (A ` â„) ?R (take (length l - c) l) +
                    ordermap (B ` J (inv_into â„ A (take (length l - c) l)))
                     ?R (drop (length l - c) l)"
          proof (intro conjI exI)
          let ?ji = "insert j i"
            show "A i @ B j = A (?ji - {Max ?ji}) @ B (Max ?ji)"
              by (auto simp: mji)
          qed (use â€¹i âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹j âˆˆ J iâ€º mji xu yv in auto)
        qed
      qed
    next
      fix p q
      assume "p âˆˆ ?AB" and "q âˆˆ ?AB"
      then obtain x y where peq: "p = A (x - {Max x}) @ B (Max x)"
                      and qeq: "q = A (y - {Max y}) @ B (Max y)"
                      and x: "x - {Max x} âˆˆ â„"
                      and y: "y - {Max y} âˆˆ â„"
                      and mx: "Max x âˆˆ J (x - {Max x})"
                      and my: "Max y âˆˆ J (y - {Max y})"
        by (auto simp: USigma_iff IJ usplit_def)
      let ?mx = "x - {Max x}"
      let ?my = "y - {Max y}"
      show "(f p < f q) âŸ· ((p, q) âˆˆ ?R)"
      proof
        assume "f p < f q"
        then
        consider "ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (x - {Max x})) < ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (y - {Max y}))"
          | "ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (x - {Max x})) = ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A (y - {Max y}))"
            "ordermap (B`J (x - {Max x})) ?R (B (Max x)) < ordermap (B`J (y - {Max y})) ?R (B (Max y))"
          using x y mx my
          by (auto dest: mult_cancellation_less simp: f_def split_def peq qeq oB)
        then have "(A ?mx @ B (Max x), A ?my @ B (Max y)) âˆˆ ?R"
        proof cases
          case 1
          then have "(A ?mx, A ?my) âˆˆ ?R"
            using x y
            by (force simp: Ord_mem_iff_lt intro: converse_ordermap_mono)
          then show ?thesis
            using x y mx my lenB lenlex_append1 by blast
        next
          case 2
          then have "A ?mx = A ?my"
            using â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º by auto
          then have eq: "?mx = ?my"
            by (metis â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º inv_into_IA)
          then have "(B (Max x), B (Max y)) âˆˆ ?R"
