            using mx my  2
            by (force simp: Ord_mem_iff_lt intro: converse_ordermap_mono)
          with 2 show ?thesis
            by (simp add: eq irrefl_less_than)
        qed
        then show "(p,q) âˆˆ ?R"
          by (simp add: peq qeq f_def split_def sorted_list_of_set_Un AB)
      next
        assume pqR: "(p,q) âˆˆ ?R"
        then have Â§: "(A ?mx @ B (Max x), A ?my @ B (Max y)) âˆˆ ?R"
          using peq qeq by blast
        then consider "(A ?mx, A ?my) âˆˆ ?R" | "A ?mx = A ?my âˆ§ (B (Max x), B (Max y)) âˆˆ ?R"
        proof (cases "(A ?mx, A ?my) âˆˆ ?R")
          case False
          have False if "(A ?my, A ?mx) âˆˆ ?R"
            by (metis â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º "Â§" â€¹(Max y) âˆˆ J ?myâ€º â€¹(Max x) âˆˆ J ?mxâ€º lenB lenlex_append1 omega_sum_1_less order.asym that)
          then have "A ?mx = A ?my"
            by (meson False UNIV_I total_llt total_on_def)
          then show ?thesis
            using "Â§" irrefl_less_than that(2) by auto
        qed (use that in blast)
        then have "Î² * ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A ?mx) + ordermap (B`J ?mx) ?R (B (Max x))
               < Î² * ordermap (A`â„) ?R (A ?my) + ordermap (B`J ?my) ?R (B (Max y))"
        proof cases
          case 1
          show ?thesis
          proof (rule add_mult_less_add_mult)
            show "ordermap (A`â„) (lenlex less_than) (A ?mx) < ordermap (A`â„) (lenlex less_than) (A ?my)"
              by (simp add: "1" â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º ordermap_mono_less)
            show "Ord (ordertype (A`â„) ?R)"
              using wf_Ord_ordertype by blast+
            show "ordermap (B ` J ?mx) ?R (B (Max x)) âˆˆ elts Î²"
              using Ord_less_TC_mem â€¹Ord Î²â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹(Max x) âˆˆ J ?mxâ€º oB by blast
            show "ordermap (B ` J ?my) ?R (B (Max y)) âˆˆ elts Î²"
              using Ord_less_TC_mem â€¹Ord Î²â€º â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹(Max y) âˆˆ J ?myâ€º oB by blast
          qed (use â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹Ord Î²â€º in auto)
        next
          case 2
          with â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º show ?thesis
            using â€¹(Max y) âˆˆ J ?myâ€º â€¹(Max x) âˆˆ J ?mxâ€º ordermap_mono_less
            by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) Kirby.add_less_cancel_left TC_small image_iff inv_into_IA trans_llt wf_llt y)
        qed
        then show "f p < f q"
          using â€¹?my âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹?mx âˆˆ â„â€º â€¹(Max y) âˆˆ J ?myâ€º â€¹(Max x) âˆˆ J ?mxâ€º
          by (auto simp: peq qeq f_def split_def AB)
      qed
    qed
  qed auto
qed auto


subsubsection â€¹The final part of 3.8, where two sequences are mergedâ€º

inductive merge :: "[nat list list,nat list list,nat list list,nat list list] â‡’ bool"
  where NullNull: "merge [] [] [] []"
      | Null: "as â‰  [] âŸ¹ merge as [] [concat as] []"
      | App: "âŸ¦as1 â‰  []; bs1 â‰  [];
               concat as1 < concat bs1; concat bs1 < concat as2; merge as2 bs2 as bsâŸ§
              âŸ¹ merge (as1@as2) (bs1@bs2) (concat as1 # as) (concat bs1 # bs)"

inductive_simps Null1 [simp]: "merge [] bs us vs"
inductive_simps Null2 [simp]: "merge as [] us vs"

lemma merge_single:
  "âŸ¦concat as < concat bs; concat as â‰  []; concat bs â‰  []âŸ§ âŸ¹ merge as bs [concat as] [concat bs]"
  using merge.App [of as bs "[]" "[]"]
  by (fastforce simp add: less_list_def)

lemma merge_length1_nonempty:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs" "as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "us âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  using assms by induction (auto simp: mem_lists_non_Nil)

lemma merge_length2_nonempty:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs" "bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "vs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  using assms by induction (auto simp: mem_lists_non_Nil)

lemma merge_length1_gt_0:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs" "as â‰  []"
  shows "length us > 0"
  using assms by induction auto

lemma merge_length_le:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "length vs â‰¤ length us"
  using assms by induction auto

lemma merge_length_le_Suc:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "length us â‰¤ Suc (length vs)"
  using assms by induction auto

lemma merge_length_less2:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "length vs â‰¤ length as"
  using assms
proof induction
case (App as1 bs1 as2 bs2 as bs)
  then show ?case
    by simp (metis One_nat_def Suc_eq_plus1 Suc_leI add.commute add_mono length_greater_0_conv)
qed auto

lemma merge_preserves:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "concat as = concat us âˆ§ concat bs = concat vs"
  using assms by induction auto

lemma merge_interact:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs" "strict_sorted (concat as)" "strict_sorted (concat bs)"
           "bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "strict_sorted (interact us vs)"
  using assms
proof induction
  case (App as1 bs1 as2 bs2 as bs)
  then have "concat bs1 < concat bs" "concat bs1 < concat as" and xx: "concat bs1 â‰  []"
    using merge_preserves strict_sorted_append_iff by fastforce+
  then have "concat bs1 < interact as bs"
    using App
    apply (simp add: less_list_def del: concat_eq_Nil_conv)
    by (metis (full_types) Un_iff â€¹concat bs1 < concat asâ€º â€¹concat bs1 < concat bsâ€º last_in_set list.set_sel(1) set_interact sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_interact_imp_concat strict_sorted_sorted_wrt xx)
  with App show ?case
    apply (simp add: strict_sorted_append_iff del: concat_eq_Nil_conv)
    by (metis hd_append2 less_list_def xx)
qed auto


lemma acc_lengths_merge1:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "list.set (acc_lengths k us) âŠ† list.set (acc_lengths k as)"
  using assms
proof (induction arbitrary: k)
  case (App as1 bs1 as2 bs2 as bs)
  then show ?case
    apply (simp add: acc_lengths_append acc_lengths.simps strict_sorted_append_iff length_concat_acc_lengths)
    by (simp add: le_supI2 length_concat)
qed (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps length_concat_acc_lengths)

lemma acc_lengths_merge2:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "list.set (acc_lengths k vs) âŠ† list.set (acc_lengths k bs)"
  using assms
proof (induction arbitrary: k)
  case (App as1 bs1 as2 bs2 as bs)
  then show ?case
    apply (simp add: acc_lengths_append acc_lengths.simps strict_sorted_append_iff length_concat_acc_lengths)
    by (simp add: le_supI2 length_concat)
qed (auto simp: acc_lengths.simps length_concat_acc_lengths)

lemma length_hd_le_concat:
  assumes "as â‰  []" shows "length (hd as) â‰¤ length (concat as)"
  by (metis (no_types) add.commute assms concat.simps(2) le_add2 length_append list.exhaust_sel)

lemma length_hd_merge2:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs"
  shows "length (hd bs) â‰¤ length (hd vs)"
  using assms by induction (auto simp: length_hd_le_concat)

lemma merge_less_sets_hd:
  assumes "merge as bs us vs" "strict_sorted (concat as)" "strict_sorted (concat bs)" "bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "less_sets (list.set (hd us)) (list.set (concat vs))"
  using assms
proof induction
  case (App as1 bs1 as2 bs2 as bs)
  then have Â§: "less_sets (list.set (concat bs1)) (list.set (concat bs2))"
    by (force simp: dest: strict_sorted_imp_less_sets)+
  have *: "less_sets (list.set (concat as1)) (list.set (concat bs1))"
    using App by (metis concat_append strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_imp_less_sets)
  then have "less_sets (list.set (concat as1)) (list.set (concat bs))"
    using App Â§ less_sets_trans merge_preserves
    by (metis List.set_empty append_in_lists_conv le_zero_eq length_concat_ge length_greater_0_conv list.size(3))
  with * App.hyps show ?case
    by (fastforce simp add: less_sets_UN1 less_sets_UN2 less_sets_Un2)
qed auto

lemma set_takeWhile:
  assumes "strict_sorted (concat as)" "as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
  shows "list.set (takeWhile (Î»x. x < y) as) = {x âˆˆ list.set as. x < y}"
  using assms
proof (induction as)
  case (Cons a as)
  have *: "a < y"
    if a: "a < concat as" "strict_sorted a" "strict_sorted (concat as)" "x < y" "x â‰  []" "x âˆˆ list.set as"
    for x
  proof -
    have "last x âˆˆ list.set (concat as)"
      using set_concat that(5) that(6) by fastforce
    then have "last a < hd (concat as)"
      using Cons.prems that by (auto simp: less_list_def)
    also have "â€¦ â‰¤ hd y" if "y â‰  []"
      using that a
      by (meson â€¹last x âˆˆ list.set (concat as)â€º dual_order.strict_trans less_list_def not_le sorted_hd_le strict_sorted_imp_sorted)
    finally show ?thesis
      by (simp add: less_list_def)
  qed
  then show ?case
    using Cons by (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff)
qed auto

proposition merge_exists:
  assumes "strict_sorted (concat as)" "strict_sorted (concat bs)"
          "as âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "bs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
          "hd as < hd bs" "as â‰  []" "bs â‰  []"
  and disj: "â‹€a b. âŸ¦a âˆˆ list.set as; b âˆˆ list.set bsâŸ§ âŸ¹ a<b âˆ¨ b<a"
shows "âˆƒus vs. merge as bs us vs"
  using assms
proof (induction "length as + length bs" arbitrary: as bs rule: less_induct)
  case (less as bs)
  obtain as1 as2 bs1 bs2
    where A: "as1 â‰  []" "bs1 â‰  []" "concat as1 < concat bs1" "concat bs1 < concat as2"
      and B: "as = as1@as2" "bs = bs1@bs2" and C: "bs2 = [] âˆ¨ (as2 â‰  [] âˆ§ hd as2 < hd bs2)"
  proof
    define as1 where "as1 â‰¡ takeWhile (Î»x. x < hd bs) as"
    define as2 where "as2 â‰¡ dropWhile (Î»x. x < hd bs) as"
    define bs1 where "bs1 â‰¡ if as2=[] then bs else takeWhile (Î»x. x < hd as2) bs"
    define bs2 where "bs2 â‰¡ if as2=[] then [] else dropWhile (Î»x. x < hd as2) bs"

    have as1: "as1 = takeWhile (Î»x. last x < hd (hd bs)) as"
      using less.prems by (auto simp: as1_def less_list_def cong: takeWhile_cong)
    have as2: "as2 = dropWhile (Î»x. last x < hd (hd bs)) as"
      using less.prems by (auto simp: as2_def less_list_def cong: dropWhile_cong)

    have hd_as2: "as2 â‰  [] âŸ¹ Â¬ hd as2 < hd bs"
      using as2_def hd_dropWhile by metis
    have hd_bs2: "bs2 â‰  [] âŸ¹ Â¬ hd bs2 < hd as2"
      using bs2_def hd_dropWhile by metis
    show "as1 â‰  []"
      by (simp add: as1_def less.prems takeWhile_eq_Nil_iff)
    show "bs1 â‰  []"
      by (metis as2 bs1_def hd_as2 hd_in_set less.prems(7) less.prems(8) set_dropWhileD takeWhile_eq_Nil_iff)
    show "bs2 = [] âˆ¨ (as2 â‰  [] âˆ§ hd as2 < hd bs2)"
      by (metis as2_def bs2_def hd_bs2 less.prems(8) list.set_sel(1) set_dropWhileD)
    have AB: "less_sets (list.set A) (list.set B)"
      if "A âˆˆ list.set as1" "B âˆˆ list.set bs" for A B
    proof -
      have "A âˆˆ list.set as"
        using that by (metis as1 set_takeWhileD)
      then have "sorted A"
        by (metis concat.simps(2) concat_append less.prems(1) sorted_append split_list_last strict_sorted_imp_sorted)
      moreover have "sorted (hd bs)"
        by (metis concat.simps(2) hd_Cons_tl less.prems(2) less.prems(7) strict_sorted_append_iff strict_sorted_imp_sorted)
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using that
       apply (clarsimp simp add: as1_def less.prems set_takeWhile less_list_iff_less_sets less_sets_def)
        by (smt UN_I dual_order.strict_trans2 hd_concat less.prems(2) less.prems(4) less.prems(7) list.set_sel(1) mem_lists_non_Nil not_le set_concat sorted_hd_le strict_sorted_imp_sorted)
    qed
    show "as = as1@as2"
      by (simp add: as1_def as2_def)
    show "bs = bs1@bs2"
      by (simp add: bs1_def bs2_def)
    have "less_sets (list.set (concat as1)) (list.set (concat bs1))"
      using AB set_takeWhileD by (fastforce simp add: as1_def bs1_def less_sets_UN1 less_sets_UN2)
    then show "concat as1 < concat bs1"
      by (rule less_sets_imp_list_less)
    have "less_sets (list.set (concat bs1)) (list.set (concat as2))" if "as2 â‰  []"
    proof (clarsimp simp add: bs1_def less_sets_UN1 less_sets_UN2 set_takeWhile less.prems)
      fix A B
      assume "A âˆˆ list.set as2" "B âˆˆ list.set bs" "B < hd as2"
      with that show "less_sets (list.set B) (list.set A)"
        using hd_as2 less.prems(1,2)
        apply (clarsimp simp add: less_sets_def less_list_def)
        apply (auto simp: as2_def)
        apply (simp flip: as2_def)
        by (metis UN_I â€¹as = as1 @ as2â€º concat.simps(2) concat_append dual_order.strict_trans2 hd_concat in_set_conv_decomp_last not_le set_concat sorted_hd_le sorted_le_last sorted_sorted_wrt sorted_wrt_append strict_sorted_imp_sorted that)
    qed
    then show "concat bs1 < concat as2"
      by (simp add: bs1_def less_sets_imp_list_less)
  qed
  obtain cs ds where "merge as2 bs2 cs ds"
  proof (cases "as2 = [] âˆ¨ bs2 = []")
    case True
    then show thesis
      using that C NullNull Null by metis
  next
    have â€ : "length as2 + length bs2 < length as + length bs"
      by (simp add: A B)
    case False
    moreover have "strict_sorted (concat as2)" "strict_sorted (concat bs2)"
      "as2 âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "bs2 âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
      "â‹€a b. âŸ¦a âˆˆ list.set as2; b âˆˆ list.set bs2âŸ§ âŸ¹ a < b âˆ¨ b < a"
      using B less.prems strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using C less.hyps [OF â€ ] False that by force
  qed
  then obtain cs where "merge (as1 @ as2) (bs1 @ bs2) (concat as1 # cs) (concat bs1 # ds)"
    using A merge.App by blast
  then show ?case
    using B by blast
qed

subsubsection â€¹Actual proof of lemma 3.8â€º

text â€¹Lemma 3.8 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
proposition lemma_3_8:
  assumes "infinite N"
  obtains X where "X âŠ† WW" "ordertype X (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
            "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹
                   âˆƒl. Form l u âˆ§ (l > 0 âŸ¶ [enum N l] < inter_scheme l u âˆ§ List.set (inter_scheme l u) âŠ† N)"
proof -
  let ?LL = "lenlex less_than"
  define bf where "bf â‰¡ Î»M q. wfrec pair_less (Î»f (j,i).
                                  let R = (case prev j i of None â‡’ M | Some u â‡’ snd (f u))
                                  in grab R (q j i))"

  have bf_rec: "bf M q (j,i) =
                 (let R = (case prev j i of None â‡’ M | Some u â‡’ snd (bf M q u))
                  in  grab R (q j i))" for M q j i
    by (subst (1) bf_def) (simp add: Let_def wfrec bf_def cut_apply prev_pair_less cong: conj_cong split: option.split)

  have infinite_bf [simp]: "infinite (snd (bf M q u)) = infinite M" for M q u
    using wf_pair_less
  proof (induction u rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case (less u)
    then show ?case
    proof (cases u)
      case (Pair j i)
      with less.IH prev_pair_less show ?thesis
        by (auto simp: bf_rec [of M q j i] split: option.split)
    qed
  qed

  have bf_less_sets: "less_sets (fst (bf M q ij)) (snd (bf M q ij))" if "infinite M" for M q ij
    using wf_pair_less
  proof (induction ij rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case (less u)
    then show ?case
    proof (cases u)
      case (Pair j i)
      with less_sets_grab show ?thesis
        by (simp add: bf_rec [of M q j i] less.IH prev_pair_less that split: option.split)
    qed
  qed

  have bf_subset: "fst (bf M q u) âŠ† M âˆ§ snd (bf M q u) âŠ† M" for M q u
    using wf_pair_less
  proof (induction u rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case (less u)
    show ?case
    proof (cases u)
      case (Pair j i)
      then show ?thesis
      apply (simp add: bf_rec [of M q j i] that split: option.split)
        using fst_grab_subset less.IH prev_pair_less snd_grab_subset by blast
    qed
  qed

  have card_fst_bf: "finite (fst (bf M q (j,i))) âˆ§ card (fst (bf M q (j,i))) = q j i" if "infinite M" for M q j i
    by (simp add: that bf_rec [of M q j i] split: option.split)

  have bf_cong: "bf M q u = bf M q' u"
    if "snd u â‰¤ fst u" and eq: "â‹€y x. âŸ¦xâ‰¤y; yâ‰¤fst uâŸ§ âŸ¹ q' y x = q y x" for M q q' u
    using wf_pair_less that
  proof (induction u rule: wf_induct_rule)
    case (less u)
    show ?case
    proof (cases u)
      case (Pair j i)
      with less.prems show ?thesis
      proof (clarsimp simp add: bf_rec [of M _ j i]  split: option.split)
        fix j' i'
        assume *: "prev j i = Some (j',i')"
        then have **: "((j', i'), u) âˆˆ pair_less"
          by (simp add: Pair prev_pair_less)
        moreover have "i' < j'"
          using Pair less.prems by (simp add: prev_Some_less [OF *])
        moreover have "â‹€x y. âŸ¦x â‰¤ y; y â‰¤ j'âŸ§ âŸ¹ q' y x = q y x"
          using ** less.prems by (auto simp: pair_less_def Pair)
        ultimately show "grab (snd (bf M q (j',i'))) (q j i) = grab (snd (bf M q' (j',i'))) (q j i)"
          using less.IH by auto
      qed
    qed
  qed

  define ediff where "ediff â‰¡ Î»D:: nat â‡’ nat set. Î»j i. enum (D j) (Suc i) - enum (D j) i"
  define F where "F â‰¡ Î»l (dl,a0::nat set,b0::nat Ã— nat â‡’ nat set,M).
          let (d,Md) = grab (nxt M (enum N (Suc (2 * Suc l)))) (Suc l) in
          let (a,Ma) = grab Md (Min d) in
          let Gb = bf Ma (ediff (dl(l := d))) in
          let dl' = dl(l := d) in
          (dl', a, fst âˆ˜ Gb, snd (Gb(l, l-1)))"
  define DF where "DF â‰¡ rec_nat (Î»iâˆˆ{..<0}. {}, {}, Î»p. {}, N) F"
  have DF_simps: "DF 0 = (Î»iâˆˆ{..<0}. {}, {}, Î»p. {}, N)"
                 "DF (Suc l) = F l (DF l)" for l
    by (auto simp: DF_def)
  note cut_apply [simp]

  have inf [rule_format]: "âˆ€dl al bl L. DF l = (dl,al,bl,L) âŸ¶ infinite L" for l
    by (induction l) (auto simp: DF_simps F_def Let_def grab_eqD infinite_nxtN assms split: prod.split)

  define Î¨ where
    "Î¨ â‰¡ Î»(dl, a, b :: nat Ã— nat â‡’ nat set, M::nat set). Î»l::nat.
           less_sets (dl l) a âˆ§ finite a âˆ§ dl l â‰  {} âˆ§ a â‰  {} âˆ§
           (âˆ€jâ‰¤l. card (dl j) = Suc j) âˆ§ less_sets a (â‹ƒ(range b)) âˆ§ range b âŠ† Collect finite âˆ§
           a âŠ† N âˆ§ â‹ƒ(range b) âŠ† N âˆ§ infinite M âˆ§ less_sets (b(l,l-1)) M âˆ§
           M âŠ† N"
  have Î¨_DF: "Î¨ (DF (Suc l)) l" for l
  proof (induction l)
    case 0
    show ?case
      using assms
      apply (clarsimp simp add: bf_rec F_def DF_simps Î¨_def split: prod.split)
      apply (drule grab_eqD, blast dest: grab_eqD infinite_nxtN)+
      apply (auto simp: less_sets_UN2 less_sets_grab card_fst_bf elim!: less_sets_weaken2)
      apply (metis Min_in card_eq_0_iff greaterThan_iff le_inf_iff less_nat_zero_code n_not_Suc_n nxt_def subsetD)
      using nxt_subset snd_grab_subset bf_subset by blast+
  next
    case (Suc l)
    then show ?case
      using assms
      unfolding Let_def DF_simps(2)[of "Suc l"] F_def Î¨_def
      apply (clarsimp simp add: bf_rec DF_simps split: prod.split)
      apply (drule grab_eqD, metis grab_eqD infinite_nxtN)+
      apply (safe, simp_all add: less_sets_UN2 less_sets_grab card_fst_bf)
             apply (meson less_sets_weaken2)
            apply (metis (no_types, hide_lams) IntE Min_in card.empty greaterThan_iff leD not_less_eq_eq nxt_def subsetD zero_less_Suc)
           apply (meson bf_subset less_sets_weaken2)
          apply (meson nxt_subset subset_eq)
         apply (meson bf_subset nxt_subset subset_eq)
        using bf_rec infinite_bf apply force
       using bf_less_sets bf_rec apply force
      by (metis bf_rec bf_subset nxt_subset subsetD)
  qed

  define d where "d â‰¡ Î»k. let (dk,ak,bk,M) = DF(Suc k) in dk k"
  define a where "a â‰¡ Î»k. let (dk,ak,bk,M) = DF(Suc k) in ak"
  define b where "b â‰¡ Î»k. let (dk,ak,bk,M) = DF(Suc k) in bk"
  define M where "M â‰¡ Î»k. let (dk,ak,bk,M) = DF k in M"

  have infinite_M [simp]: "infinite (M k)" for k
    by (auto simp: M_def inf split: prod.split)

  have M_Suc_subset: "M (Suc k) âŠ† M k" for k
    apply (clarsimp simp add: Let_def M_def F_def DF_simps split: prod.split)
    apply (drule grab_eqD, blast dest: infinite_nxtN local.inf)+
    using bf_subset nxt_subset by blast

  have Inf_M_Suc_ge: "Inf (M k) â‰¤ Inf (M (Suc k))" for k
    by (simp add: M_Suc_subset cInf_superset_mono infinite_imp_nonempty)

  have Inf_M_telescoping: "{Inf (M k)..} âŠ† {Inf (M k')..}" if "k'â‰¤k" for k k'
    using that
    by (induction "k-k'")(auto simp: Inf_M_Suc_ge M_Suc_subset cInf_superset_mono infinite_imp_nonempty lift_Suc_antimono_le)

  have d_eq: "d k = fst (grab (nxt (M k) (enum N (Suc (2 * Suc k)))) (Suc k))" for k
    by (simp add: d_def M_def Let_def DF_simps F_def split: prod.split)
  then have finite_d [simp]: "finite (d k)" for k
    by simp
  then have d_ne [simp]: "d k â‰  {}" for k
    by (metis card.empty card_grab d_eq infinite_M infinite_nxtN nat.distinct(1))
  have a_eq: "âˆƒM. a k = fst (grab M (Min (d k))) âˆ§ infinite M" for k
    apply (simp add: a_def d_def M_def Let_def DF_simps F_def split: prod.split)
    by (metis fst_conv grab_eqD infinite_nxtN local.inf)
  then have card_a: "card (a k) = Inf (d k)" for k
    by (metis cInf_eq_Min card_grab d_ne finite_d)

  have d_eq_dl: "d k = dl k" if "(dl,a,b,P) = DF l" "k < l" for k l dl a b P
    using that
    by (induction l arbitrary: dl a b P) (simp_all add: d_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split_asm prod.split)

  have card_d [simp]: "card (d k) = Suc k" for k
    by (auto simp: d_eq infinite_nxtN)

  have d_ne [simp]: "d j â‰  {}" and a_ne [simp]: "a j â‰  {}"
    and finite_d [simp]: "finite (d j)" and finite_a [simp]: "finite (a j)" for j
    using Î¨_DF [of "j"] by (auto simp: Î¨_def a_def d_def split: prod.split_asm)

  have da: "less_sets (d k) (a k)" for k
    using Î¨_DF [of "k"] by (simp add: Î¨_def a_def d_def split: prod.split_asm)

  have ab_same: "less_sets (a k) (â‹ƒ(range(b k)))" for k
    using Î¨_DF [of "k"]
    by (simp add: Î¨_def a_def b_def M_def split: prod.split_asm)

  have snd_bf_subset: "snd (bf M r (j,i)) âŠ† snd (bf M r (j',i'))"
    if ji: "((j',i'), (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less" "(j',i') âˆˆ IJ k"
    for M r k j i j' i'
    using wf_pair_less ji
  proof (induction rule: wf_induct_rule [where a= "(j,i)"])
    case (less u)
    show ?case
    proof (cases u)
      case (Pair j i)
      then consider "prev j i = Some (j', i')" | x where "((j', i'), x) âˆˆ pair_less" "prev j i = Some x"
        using less.prems pair_less_prev by blast
      then show ?thesis
      proof cases
        case 1
        then show ?thesis
          by (simp add: Pair bf_rec snd_grab_subset)
      next
        case 2
        then have "snd (bf M r x) âŠ† snd (bf M r (j', i'))"
          by (simp add: Pair less.IH prev_pair_less that(2))
        moreover have "snd (bf M r u) âŠ† snd (bf M r x)"
          by (simp add: 2 Pair bf_rec snd_grab_subset)
        ultimately show ?thesis
          by auto
      qed
    qed
  qed

  have less_bf: "less_sets (fst (bf M r (j',i'))) (fst (bf M r (j,i)))"
    if ji: "((j',i'), (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less" "(j',i') âˆˆ IJ k" and "infinite M"
    for M r k j i j' i'
  proof -
    consider "prev j i = Some (j', i')" | j'' i'' where "((j', i'), (j'',i'')) âˆˆ pair_less" "prev j i = Some (j'',i'')"
      by (metis pair_less_prev ji prod.exhaust_sel)
    then show ?thesis
    proof cases
      case 1
      then show ?thesis
        using bf_less_sets bf_rec infinite_bf less_sets_fst_grab â€¹infinite Mâ€º by auto
    next
      case 2
      then have "less_sets (fst (bf M r (j',i'))) (snd (bf M r (j'',i'')))"
        by (meson bf_less_sets snd_bf_subset less_sets_weaken2 that)
      with 2 show ?thesis
        using bf_rec infinite_bf less_sets_fst_grab â€¹infinite Mâ€º by auto
    qed
  qed

  have aM: "less_sets (a k) (M (Suc k))" for k
    apply (clarsimp simp add: a_def M_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    by (meson bf_subset grab_eqD infinite_nxtN less_sets_weaken2 local.inf)
  then have "less_sets (a k) (a (Suc k))" for k
    by (metis IntE card_d card.empty d_eq da fst_grab_subset less_sets_trans less_sets_weaken2 nat.distinct(1) nxt_def subsetI)
  then have aa: "less_sets (a j) (a k)" if "j<k" for k j
    by (meson UNIV_I a_ne less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets strict_mono_sets_def that)
  then have ab: "less_sets (a k') (b k (j,i))" if "k'â‰¤k" for k k' j i
    by (metis a_ne ab_same le_less less_sets_UN2 less_sets_trans rangeI that)
  have db: "less_sets (d j) (b k (j,i))" if "jâ‰¤k" for k j i
    by (meson a_ne ab da less_sets_trans that)

  have bMkk: "less_sets (b k (k,k-1)) (M (Suc k))" for k
    using Î¨_DF [of k]
    by (simp add: Î¨_def b_def d_def M_def split: prod.split_asm)

  have b: "âˆƒP âŠ† M k. infinite P âˆ§ (âˆ€j i. iâ‰¤j âŸ¶ jâ‰¤k âŸ¶ b k (j,i) = fst (bf P (ediff d) (j,i)))" for k
  proof (clarsimp simp: b_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    fix a a' d' dl bb P M' M''
    assume gr: "grab M'' (Min d') = (a', M')" "grab (nxt P (enum N (Suc (Suc (Suc (2 * k)))))) (Suc k) = (d', M'')"
      and DF: "DF k = (dl, a, bb, P)"
    have deq: "d j = (if j = k then d' else dl j)" if "jâ‰¤k" for j
    proof (cases "j < k")
      case True
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis DF d_eq_dl less_not_refl)
    next
      case False
      then show ?thesis
        using that DF gr
        by (auto simp: d_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    qed
    have "M' âŠ† P"
      by (metis gr in_mono nxt_subset snd_conv snd_grab_subset subsetI)
    also have "P âŠ† M k"
      using DF by (simp add: M_def)
    finally have "M' âŠ† M k" .
    moreover have "infinite M'"
      using DF by (metis (mono_tags) finite_grab_iff gr infinite_nxtN local.inf snd_conv)
    moreover
    have "ediff (dl(k := d')) j i = ediff d j i" if "jâ‰¤k" for j i
      by (simp add: deq that ediff_def)
    then have "bf M' (ediff (dl(k := d'))) (j,i)
             = bf M' (ediff d) (j,i)" if "i â‰¤ j" "jâ‰¤k" for j i
      using bf_cong that by fastforce
    ultimately show "âˆƒPâŠ†M k. infinite P âˆ§
                           (âˆ€j i. i â‰¤ j âŸ¶ j â‰¤ k
                                        âŸ¶ fst (bf M' (ediff (dl(k := d'))) (j,i))
                         = fst (bf P (ediff d) (j,i)))"
      by auto
  qed

  have card_b: "card (b k (j,i)) = enum (d j) (Suc i) - enum (d j) i" if "jâ‰¤k" for k j i
    â€•â€¹there's a short proof of this from the previous result but it would need @{term"iâ‰¤j"}â€º
  proof (clarsimp simp: b_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    fix dl
      and a a' d':: "nat set"
      and bb M M' M''
    assume gr: "grab M'' (Min d') = (a', M')" "grab (nxt M (enum N (Suc (Suc (Suc (2 * k)))))) (Suc k) = (d',M'')"
      and DF: "DF k = (dl, a, bb, M)"
    have "d j = (if j = k then d' else dl j)"
    proof (cases "j < k")
      case True
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis DF d_eq_dl less_not_refl)
    next
      case False
      then show ?thesis
        using that DF gr by (auto simp: d_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    qed
    then show "card (fst (bf M' (ediff (dl(k := d'))) (j,i)))
             = enum (d j) (Suc i) - enum (d j) i"
      using DF gr card_fst_bf grab_eqD infinite_nxtN local.inf ediff_def by auto
  qed

  have card_b_pos: "card (b k (j,i)) > 0" if "i < j" "jâ‰¤k" for k j i
    by (simp add: card_b that finite_enumerate_step)
  have b_ne [simp]: "b k (j,i) â‰  {}" if "i < j" "jâ‰¤k" for k j i
    using card_b_pos [OF that] less_imp_neq by fastforce+

  have card_b_finite [simp]: "finite (b k u)" for k u
    using Î¨_DF [of k] by (fastforce simp add: Î¨_def b_def)

  have bM: "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (M (Suc k))" if "i<j" "jâ‰¤k" for i j k
  proof -
    obtain M' where "M' âŠ† M k" "infinite M'"
      and bk: "â‹€j i. iâ‰¤j âŸ¹ jâ‰¤k âŸ¹ b k (j,i) = fst (bf M' (ediff d) (j,i))"
      using b by (metis (no_types, lifting))
    show ?thesis
    proof (cases "j=k âˆ§ i = k-1")
      case False
      show ?thesis
      proof (rule less_sets_trans [OF _ bMkk])
        show "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (b k (k, k - 1))"
          using that â€¹infinite M'â€º False
            by (force simp: bk pair_less_def IJ_def intro: less_bf)
        show "b k (k, k - 1) â‰  {}"
          using b_ne that by auto
      qed
    qed (use bMkk in auto)
  qed

  have b_InfM: "â‹ƒ (range (b k)) âŠ† {â¨…(M k)..}" for k
  proof (clarsimp simp add: Î¨_def b_def M_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split)
    fix r dl :: "nat â‡’ nat set"
      and a b and d' a' M'' M' P :: "nat set"
      and x j' i' :: nat
    assume gr: "grab M'' (Min d') = (a', M')"
               "grab (nxt P (enum N (Suc (Suc (Suc (2 * k)))))) (Suc k) = (d', M'')"
      and DF: "DF k = (dl, a, b, P)"
      and x: "x âˆˆ fst (bf M' (ediff (dl(k := d'))) (j', i'))"
    have "infinite P"
      using DF local.inf by blast
    then have "M' âŠ† P"
      by (meson gr grab_eqD infinite_nxtN nxt_subset order.trans)
    with bf_subset show "â¨… P â‰¤ (x::nat)"
      using Inf_nat_def x le_less_linear not_less_Least by fastforce
  qed

  have b_Inf_M_Suc: "less_sets (b k (j,i)) {Inf(M (Suc k))}" if "i<j" "jâ‰¤k" for k j i
    using bMkk [of k] that
    by (metis Inf_nat_def1 bM finite.emptyI infinite_M less_setsD less_sets_singleton2)

  have bb_same: "less_sets (b k (j',i')) (b k (j,i))"
    if "((j',i'), (j,i)) âˆˆ pair_less" "(j',i') âˆˆ IJ k" for k j i j' i'
    using that
    unfolding b_def DF_simps F_def Let_def
    by (auto simp: less_bf grab_eqD infinite_nxtN local.inf split: prod.split)

  have bb: "less_sets (b k' (j',i')) (b k (j,i))"
    if j: "i' < j'" "j'â‰¤k'" and k: "k'<k" for i i' j j' k' k
  proof (rule atLeast_less_sets)
    show "less_sets (b k' (j', i')) {Inf(M (Suc k'))}"
      using Suc_lessD b_Inf_M_Suc nat_less_le j by blast
    have "b k (j,i) âŠ† {â¨…(M k)..}"
      by (rule order_trans [OF _ b_InfM]) auto
    also have "â€¦  âŠ† {Inf(M (Suc k'))..}"
      using Inf_M_telescoping k by auto
    finally show "b k (j,i) âŠ† {Inf(M (Suc k'))..}" .
  qed

  have M_subset_N: "M k âŠ† N" for k
  proof (cases k)
    case (Suc k')
    with Î¨_DF [of k'] show ?thesis
      by (auto simp: M_def Let_def Î¨_def split: prod.split)
  qed (auto simp: M_def DF_simps)
  have a_subset_N: "a k âŠ† N" for k
    using Î¨_DF [of k] by (simp add: a_def Î¨_def split: prod.split prod.split_asm)
  have d_subset_N: "d k âŠ† N" for k
    using M_subset_N [of k] d_eq fst_grab_subset nxt_subset by blast
  have b_subset_N: "b k (j,i) âŠ† N" for k j i
    using Î¨_DF [of k] by (force simp: b_def Î¨_def)

  define ğ’¦:: "[nat,nat] â‡’ nat set set"
    where "ğ’¦ â‰¡ Î»j0 j. nsets {j0<..} j"

  have ğ’¦_finite: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j âŸ¹ finite K" for K j0 j
    by (simp add: ğ’¦_def nsets_def)
  have ğ’¦_card: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j âŸ¹ card K = j" for K j0 j
    by (simp add: ğ’¦_def nsets_def)
  have ğ’¦_enum: "j0 < enum K i" if "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j" "i < card K" for K j0 j i
    using that by (auto simp: ğ’¦_def nsets_def finite_enumerate_in_set subset_eq)
  have ğ’¦_0 [simp]: "ğ’¦ k 0 = {{}}" for k
    by (auto simp: ğ’¦_def)

  have ğ’¦_Suc: "ğ’¦ j0 (Suc j) = USigma (ğ’¦ j0 j) (Î»K. {Max (insert j0 K)<..})" (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
    for j j0
  proof
    show "ğ’¦ j0 (Suc j) âŠ† USigma (ğ’¦ j0 j) (Î»K. {Max (insert j0 K)<..})"
      unfolding ğ’¦_def nsets_def USigma_def
    proof clarsimp
      fix K
      assume K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K = Suc j"
      then obtain i where "Max (insert j0 (K - {Max K})) < i" "K = insert i (K - {Max K})"
        apply (simp add: subset_iff)
        by (metis Diff_iff Max.coboundedI Max_in card_0_eq insert_Diff insert_iff le_neq_implies_less nat.distinct(1))
      then  show "âˆƒLâŠ†{j0<..}. finite L âˆ§ card L = j âˆ§
                 (âˆƒiâˆˆ{Max (insert j0 L)<..}. K = insert i L)"
        using K
        by (metis Max_in card_Diff_singleton_if card_gt_0_iff diff_Suc_1 finite_Diff greaterThan_iff insert_subset zero_less_Suc)
    qed
    show "?rhs âŠ† ğ’¦ j0 (Suc j)"
      by (force simp:  ğ’¦_def nsets_def USigma_def)
  qed

  define BB where "BB â‰¡ Î»j0 j K. list_of (a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒi<j. b (enum K i) (j0,i)))"
  define XX where "XX â‰¡ Î»j. BB j j ` ğ’¦ j j"

  have less_list_of:  "BB j i K < list_of (b l (j,i))"
    if K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j i" "âˆ€jâˆˆK. j < l" and "i â‰¤ j" "j â‰¤ l" for j i K l
    unfolding BB_def
  proof (rule less_sets_imp_sorted_list_of_set)
    have "â‹€i. i < card K âŸ¹ less_sets (b (enum K i) (j,i)) (b l (j, card K))"
      using that by (metis ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum ğ’¦_finite bb finite_enumerate_in_set nat_less_le less_le_trans)
    then show "less_sets (a j âˆª (â‹ƒi<i. b (enum K i) (j,i))) (b l (j,i))"
      using that
      unfolding ğ’¦_def nsets_def
      by (auto simp: less_sets_Un1 less_sets_UN1 ab finite_enumerate_in_set subset_eq)
  qed auto
  have BB_Suc: "BB j0 (Suc j) K = usplit (Î»L k. BB j0 j L @ list_of (b k (j0, j))) K"
    if j: "j â‰¤ j0" and K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 (Suc j)" for j0 j K
    â€•â€¹towards the ordertype proofâ€º
  proof -
    have Kj: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" and [simp]: "finite K" and cardK: "card K = Suc j"
      using K by (auto simp: ğ’¦_def nsets_def)
    have KMK: "K - {Max K} âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j"
      using that by (simp add: ğ’¦_Suc USigma_iff ğ’¦_finite less_sets_def usplit_def)
    have "j0 < Max K"
      by (metis Kj Max_in cardK card_gt_0_iff greaterThan_iff subsetD zero_less_Suc)
    have MaxK: "Max K = enum K j"
    proof (rule Max_eqI)
      show "enum K j âˆˆ K"
        by (simp add: cardK finite_enumerate_in_set)
      show "k â‰¤ enum K j" if "k âˆˆ K" for k
        using that K
        by (metis â€¹finite Kâ€º cardK enum_obtain_index_finite finite_enumerate_mono leI less_Suc_eq less_asym)
    qed auto
    have ene: "i<j âŸ¹ enum (K - {enum K j}) i = enum K i" for i
      using finite_enumerate_Diff_singleton [OF â€¹finite Kâ€º] by (simp add: cardK)
    have "BB j0 (Suc j) K = list_of ((a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒx<j. b (enum K x) (j0, x))) âˆª b (enum K j) (j0, j))"
      by (simp add: BB_def lessThan_Suc Un_ac)
    also have "â€¦ = list_of ((a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒi<j. b (enum K i) (j0, i)))) @ list_of (b (enum K j) (j0, j))"
    proof (rule sorted_list_of_set_Un)
      have "less_sets (b (enum K i) (j0, i)) (b (enum K j) (j0, j))" if "i<j" for i
      proof (rule bb)
        show "i < j0"
          using j that by linarith
        show "j0 â‰¤ enum K i"
          using that K by (metis ğ’¦_enum cardK less_SucI less_imp_le_nat)
        show "enum K i < enum K j"
          by (simp add: cardK finite_enumerate_mono that)
      qed
      moreover have "less_sets (a j0) (b (enum K j) (j0, j))"
        using MaxK â€¹j0 < Max Kâ€º ab by auto
      ultimately show "less_sets (a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒx<j. b (enum K x) (j0, x))) (b (enum K j) (j0, j))"
        by (simp add: less_sets_Un1 less_sets_UN1)
    qed (auto simp: finite_UnI)
    also have "â€¦ = BB j0 j (K - {Max K}) @ list_of (b (Max K) (j0, j))"
      by (simp add: BB_def MaxK ene)
    also have "â€¦ = usplit (Î»L k. BB j0 j L @ list_of (b k (j0, j))) K"
      by (simp add: usplit_def)
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed

  have enum_d_0: "enum (d j) 0 = Inf (d j)" for j
    using enum_0_eq_Inf_finite by auto

  have Inf_b_less: "â¨…(b k' (j',i')) < â¨…(b k (j,i))"
    if j: "i' < j'" "i < j" "j'â‰¤k'" "jâ‰¤k" and k: "k'<k" for i i' j j' k' k
    using bb [of i' j' k' k j i] that b_ne [of i' j' k'] b_ne [of i j k]
    by (simp add: less_sets_def Inf_nat_def1)

  have b_ge_k: "â¨… (b k (k, k-1)) â‰¥ k-1" if "k>0" for k
    using that
  proof (induction k)
    case (Suc k)
    show ?case
    proof (cases "k=0")
      case False
      have "â¨… (b k (k, k - Suc 0)) < â¨… (b (Suc k) (Suc k, k))"
        using False Inf_b_less by auto
      with False Suc show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed auto
  qed auto

  have b_ge: "â¨… (b k (j,i)) â‰¥ k-1" if k: "k>0" "k â‰¥ j" and "j > i" for k j i
    using k
  proof (induction k)
    case (Suc k)
    show ?case
    proof (cases "j â‰¤ k")
      case True
      have "â¨… (b k (j,i)) < â¨… (b (Suc k) (j,i))"
        using â€¹j > iâ€º Suc True by (force intro: Inf_b_less)
      then show ?thesis
        using Suc.IH True by linarith
    next
      case False
      then have "j = Suc k"
        using Suc.prems(2) by linarith
      with â€¹i < jâ€º have "i < Suc k"
        by fastforce
      moreover have "Â¬ â¨… (b (Suc k) (j,i)) < â¨… (b (Suc k) (j,i))"
        by fastforce
      ultimately have "Â¬ Suc (â¨… (b (Suc k) (j,i))) < Suc k"
        by (metis Inf_b_less â€¹j = Suc kâ€º b_ge_k diff_Suc_1 leD le_refl lessI zero_less_Suc)
      then show ?thesis
        by simp
    qed
  qed auto

  have hd_b: "hd (list_of (b k (j,i))) = â¨… (b k (j,i))"
    if "i < j" "j â‰¤ k" for k j i
    using that by (simp add: hd_list_of cInf_eq_Min)

  have b_disjoint_less: "b (enum K i) (j0, i) âˆ© b (enum K i') (j0, i') = {}"
    if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" "i' < j" "i < i'" "j â‰¤ j0" for i i' j j0 K
  proof (intro bb less_sets_imp_disjnt [unfolded disjnt_def])
    show "i < j0"
      using that by linarith
    then show "j0 â‰¤ enum K i"
      by (meson K finite_enumerate_in_set greaterThan_iff less_imp_le_nat less_le_trans subsetD)
    show "enum K i < enum K i'"
      using K â€¹j â‰¤ j0â€º that by auto
  qed

  have b_disjoint: "b (enum K i) (j0, i) âˆ© b (enum K i') (j0, i') = {}"
    if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" "i < j" "i' < j" "i â‰  i'" "j â‰¤ j0" for i i' j j0 K
    using that b_disjoint_less inf_commute neq_iff by metis

  have otÏ‰: "ordertype ((Î»k. list_of (b k (j,i))) ` {Max (insert j K)<..}) ?LL = Ï‰"
             (is "?lhs = _")
    if K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j i" "j > i" for j i K
  proof -
    have Sucj: "Suc (Max (insert j K)) â‰¥ j"
      using ğ’¦_finite that(1) le_Suc_eq by auto
    let ?N = "{Inf(b k (j,i))| k. Max (insert j K) < k}"
    have infN: "infinite ?N"
    proof (clarsimp simp add: infinite_nat_iff_unbounded_le)
      fix m
      show "âˆƒnâ‰¥m. âˆƒk. n = â¨… (b k (j,i)) âˆ§ Max (insert j K) < k"
        using b_ge [of _ j i] â€¹j > iâ€º Sucj
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) diff_Suc_1 le_SucI le_trans less_Suc_eq_le nat_le_linear zero_less_Suc)
    qed
    have [simp]: "Max (insert j K) < k âŸ· j < k âˆ§ (âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k)" for k
      using that by (auto simp: ğ’¦_finite)
    have "?lhs = ordertype ?N less_than"
    proof (intro ordertype_eqI strip)
      have "list_of (b k (j,i)) = list_of (b k' (j,i))"
        if "j â‰¤ k" "j â‰¤ k'"  "hd (list_of (b k (j,i))) = hd (list_of (b k' (j,i)))"
        for k k'
        by (metis Inf_b_less â€¹i < jâ€º hd_b nat_less_le not_le that)
      moreover have "âˆƒk' j' i'. hd (list_of (b k (j,i))) = â¨… (b k' (j', i')) âˆ§ i' < j' âˆ§ j' â‰¤ k'"
        if "j â‰¤ k" for k
        using that â€¹i < jâ€º hd_b less_imp_le_nat by blast
      moreover have "âˆƒk'. hd (list_of (b k (j,i))) = â¨… (b k' (j,i)) âˆ§ j < k' âˆ§ (âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k')"
         if "j < k" "âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k" for k
        using that K hd_b less_imp_le_nat by blast
      moreover have "â¨… (b k (j,i)) âˆˆ hd ` (Î»k. list_of (b k (j,i))) ` {Max (insert j K)<..}"
        if "j < k" "âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k" for k
        using that K by (auto simp: hd_b image_iff)
      ultimately
      show "bij_betw hd ((Î»k. list_of (b k (j,i))) ` {Max (insert j K)<..}) {â¨… (b k (j,i)) |k. Max (insert j K) < k}"
        by (auto simp: bij_betw_def inj_on_def)
    next
      fix ms ns
      assume "ms âˆˆ (Î»k. list_of (b k (j,i))) ` {Max (insert j K)<..}"
        and "ns âˆˆ (Î»k. list_of (b k (j,i))) ` {Max (insert j K)<..}"
      with that obtain k k' where
        ms: "ms = list_of (b k (j,i))" and ns: "ns = list_of (b k' (j,i))"
        and "j < k" "j < k'" and lt_k: "âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k" and lt_k': "âˆ€aâˆˆK. a < k'"
        by (auto simp: ğ’¦_finite)
      then have len_eq [simp]: "length ns = length ms"
        by (simp add: card_b)
      have nz: "length ns â‰  0"
        using b_ne â€¹i < jâ€º â€¹j < k'â€º ns by auto
      show "(hd ms, hd ns) âˆˆ less_than âŸ· (ms, ns) âˆˆ ?LL"
      proof
        assume "(hd ms, hd ns) âˆˆ less_than"
        then show "(ms, ns) âˆˆ ?LL"
          using that nz
          by (fastforce simp add: lenlex_def ğ’¦_finite card_b intro: hd_lex)
      next
        assume Â§: "(ms, ns) âˆˆ ?LL"
        then have "(list_of (b k' (j,i)), list_of (b k (j,i))) âˆ‰ ?LL"
          using less_asym ms ns omega_sum_1_less by blast
        then show "(hd ms, hd ns) âˆˆ less_than"
          using â€¹j < kâ€º â€¹j < k'â€º Inf_b_less [of i j i j] ms ns
          by (metis Cons_lenlex_iff Â§ len_eq b_ne card_b_finite diff_Suc_1 hd_Cons_tl hd_b length_Cons less_or_eq_imp_le less_than_iff linorder_neqE_nat sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff that(2))
      qed
    qed auto
    also have "â€¦ = Ï‰"
      using infN ordertype_nat_Ï‰ by blast
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed

  have otÏ‰j: "ordertype (BB j0 j ` ğ’¦ j0 j) ?LL = Ï‰â†‘j" if "j â‰¤ j0" for j j0
    using that
  proof (induction j)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      by (auto simp: XX_def)
  next
    case (Suc j)
    then have ih: "ordertype (BB j0 j ` ğ’¦ j0 j) ?LL = Ï‰ â†‘ j"
      by simp
    have "j â‰¤ j0"
      by (simp add: Suc.prems Suc_leD)
    have inj_BB: "inj_on (BB j0 j) ([{j0<..}]â‡—jâ‡–)"
    proof (clarsimp simp: inj_on_def BB_def nsets_def subset_iff sorted_list_of_set_Un less_sets_UN2)
      fix X Y
      assume X [rule_format]: "âˆ€t. t âˆˆ X âŸ¶ j0 < t"
        and Y [rule_format]: "âˆ€t. t âˆˆ Y âŸ¶ j0 < t"
        and "finite X"
        and jeq: "j = card X"
        and "finite Y"
        and "card Y = card X"
        and eq: "list_of (a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒi<card X. b (enum X i) (j0,i)))
               = list_of (a j0 âˆª (â‹ƒi<card X. b (enum Y i) (j0,i)))"
      have enumX: "â‹€n. âŸ¦n < card XâŸ§ âŸ¹ j0 â‰¤ enum X n"
        using X â€¹finite Xâ€º finite_enumerate_in_set less_imp_le_nat by blast
      have enumY: "â‹€n. âŸ¦n < card XâŸ§ âŸ¹ j0 â‰¤ enum Y n"
        by (simp add: Y â€¹card Y = card Xâ€º â€¹finite Yâ€º finite_enumerate_in_set less_imp_le_nat)
      have smX: "strict_mono_sets {..<card X} (Î»i. b (enum X i) (j0, i))"
        and smY: "strict_mono_sets {..<card X} (Î»i. b (enum Y i) (j0, i))"
        using Suc.prems â€¹card Y = card Xâ€º â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹finite Yâ€º bb enumX enumY jeq
        by (auto simp: strict_mono_sets_def)

      have len_eq: "length ms = length ns"
        if "(ms, ns) âˆˆ list.set (zip (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum X i) (j0,i))) (list_of {..<n}))
                                     (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum Y i) (j0,i))) (list_of {..<n})))"
          "n â‰¤ card X"
        for ms ns n
        using that
      by (induction n rule: nat.induct) (auto simp: card_b enumX enumY)
      have "concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum X i) (j0, i))) (list_of {..<card X}))
          = concat (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum Y i) (j0, i))) (list_of {..<card X}))"
        using eq
        by (simp add: sorted_list_of_set_Un less_sets_UN2 sorted_list_of_set_UN_lessThan ab enumX enumY smX smY)
      then have map_eq: "map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum X i) (j0, i))) (list_of {..<card X})
                       = map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum Y i) (j0, i))) (list_of {..<card X})"
        by (rule concat_injective) (auto simp: len_eq split: prod.split)
      have "enum X i = enum Y i" if "i < card X" for i
      proof -
        have "Inf (b (enum X i) (j0,i)) = Inf (b (enum Y i) (j0,i))"
          using iffD1 [OF map_eq_conv, OF map_eq] Suc.prems that
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) card_b_finite comp_apply finite_lessThan lessThan_iff set_sorted_list_of_set)
        moreover have "Inf (b (enum X i) (j0,i)) âˆˆ (b (enum X i) (j0,i))"
          "Inf (b (enum Y i) (j0,i)) âˆˆ (b (enum Y i) (j0,i))" "i < j0"
          using Inf_nat_def1 Suc.prems b_ne enumX enumY jeq that by auto
        ultimately show ?thesis
          by (metis Inf_b_less enumX enumY leI nat_less_le that)
      qed
      then show "X = Y"
        by (simp add: â€¹card Y = card Xâ€º â€¹finite Xâ€º â€¹finite Yâ€º finite_enum_ext)
    qed
    have BB_Suc': "BB j0 (Suc j) X = usplit (Î»L k. BB j0 j L @ list_of (b k (j0, j))) X"
      if "X âˆˆ USigma (ğ’¦ j0 j) (Î»K. {Max (insert j0 K)<..})" for X
      using that
      by (simp add: USigma_iff ğ’¦_finite less_sets_def usplit_def ğ’¦_Suc BB_Suc â€¹j â‰¤ j0â€º)
    have "ordertype (BB j0 (Suc j) ` ğ’¦ j0 (Suc j)) ?LL
        = ordertype
           (usplit (Î»L k. BB j0 j L @ list_of (b k (j0, j))) ` USigma (ğ’¦ j0 j) (Î»K. {Max (insert j0 K)<..})) ?LL"
      by (simp add: BB_Suc' ğ’¦_Suc)
    also have "â€¦ = Ï‰ * ordertype (BB j0 j ` ğ’¦ j0 j) ?LL"
    proof (rule ordertype_append_image_IJ)
      fix L k
      assume "L âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j" and "k âˆˆ {Max (insert j0 L)<..}"
      then have "j0 < k" and L: "â‹€a. a âˆˆ L âŸ¹ a < k"
        by (simp_all add: ğ’¦_finite)
      then show "BB j0 j L < list_of (b k (j0, j))"
        by (simp add: â€¹L âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 jâ€º â€¹j â‰¤ j0â€º ğ’¦_finite less_list_of)
    next
      show "inj_on (BB j0 j) (ğ’¦ j0 j)"
        by (simp add: ğ’¦_def inj_BB)
    next
      fix L
      assume L: "L âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j"
      then show "less_sets L {Max (insert j0 L)<..} âˆ§ finite L"
        by (metis ğ’¦_finite atLeast_Suc_greaterThan finite_insert less_sets_Suc_Max less_sets_weaken1 subset_insertI)
      show "ordertype ((Î»i. list_of (b i (j0, j))) ` {Max (insert j0 L)<..}) ?LL = Ï‰"
        using L Suc.prems Suc_le_lessD otÏ‰ by blast
    qed (auto simp: ğ’¦_finite card_b)
    also have "â€¦ = Ï‰ â†‘ ord_of_nat (Suc j)"
      by (metis ih One_nat_def Ord_Ï‰ Ord_ord_of_nat oexp_1_right oexp_add one_V_def ord_of_nat.simps(1) ord_of_nat.simps(2) ord_of_nat_add plus_1_eq_Suc)
    finally show ?case .
  qed

  define seqs where "seqs â‰¡ Î»j0 j K. list_of (a j0) # (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum K i) (j0,i))) (list_of {..<j}))"

  have length_seqs [simp]: "length (seqs j0 j K) = Suc j" for j0 j K
    by (simp add: seqs_def)

  have BB_eq_concat_seqs: "BB j0 j K = concat (seqs j0 j K)"
          and seqs_ne: "seqs j0 j K âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
      if K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j" and "j â‰¤ j0" for K j j0
  proof -
    have j0: "â‹€i. i < card K âŸ¹ j0 â‰¤ enum K i" and le_j0: "card K â‰¤ j0"
      using finite_enumerate_in_set that unfolding ğ’¦_def nsets_def by fastforce+
    show "BB j0 j K = concat (seqs j0 j K)"
      using that unfolding BB_def ğ’¦_def nsets_def seqs_def
      by (fastforce simp: j0 ab bb less_sets_UN2 sorted_list_of_set_Un
          strict_mono_sets_def sorted_list_of_set_UN_lessThan)
    have "b (enum K i) (j0, i) â‰  {}" if "i < card K" for i
      using j0 le_j0 less_le_trans that by simp
    moreover have "card K = j"
      using K ğ’¦_card by blast
    ultimately show "seqs j0 j K âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
      by (clarsimp simp: seqs_def) (metis card_b_finite sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
  qed

  have BB_decomp: "âˆƒcs. BB j0 j K = concat cs âˆ§ cs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
    if K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j0 j" and "j â‰¤ j0" for K j j0
    using BB_eq_concat_seqs seqs_ne K that(2) by blast

  have a_subset_M: "a k âŠ† M k" for k
    apply (clarsimp simp: a_def M_def DF_simps F_def Let_def split: prod.split_asm)
    by (metis (no_types) fst_conv fst_grab_subset nxt_subset snd_conv snd_grab_subset subsetD)
  have ba_Suc: "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (a (Suc k))" if "i < j" "j â‰¤ k" for i j k
    by (meson a_subset_M bM less_sets_weaken2 nat_less_le that(1) that(2))
  have ba: "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (a r)" if "i < j" "j â‰¤ k" "k < r" for i j k r
    by (metis Suc_lessI a_ne aa ba_Suc less_sets_trans that)

  have disjnt_ba: "disjnt (b k (j,i)) (a r)" if "i < j" "j â‰¤ k" for i j k r
  proof (cases "k < r")
    case True
    then show ?thesis
      by (simp add: ba less_sets_imp_disjnt that)
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis
    proof -
      have "less_sets (a r) (b k (j,i))"
        by (metis False a_ne aa ab_same less_linear less_sets_UN2 less_sets_trans rangeI)
      then show ?thesis
        using disjnt_sym less_sets_imp_disjnt by blast
    qed
  qed

  have bb_disjnt: "disjnt (b k (j,i)) (b l (r,q))"
    if "q < r" "i < j" "j â‰¤ k" "r â‰¤ l" "j < r" for i j q r k l
  proof (cases "k=l")
    case True
    with that show ?thesis
      by (force simp: pair_less_def IJ_def intro: bb_same less_sets_imp_disjnt)
  next
    case False
    with that show ?thesis
      by (metis bb less_sets_imp_disjnt disjnt_sym nat_neq_iff)
  qed

  have sum_card_b: "(âˆ‘i<j. card (b (enum K i) (j0, i))) = enum (d j0) j - enum (d j0) 0"
    if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" and "j â‰¤ j0" for j0 j K
    using â€¹j â‰¤ j0â€º
  proof (induction j)
    case 0
    then show ?case
      by auto
  next
    case (Suc j)
    have dis: "disjnt (b (enum K j) (j0, j)) (â‹ƒi<j. b (enum K i) (j0, i))"
    proof (clarsimp simp add: b_disjoint)
      fix i
      assume "i < j"
      show "disjnt (b (enum K j) (j0, j)) (b (enum K i) (j0,i))"
        by (meson Suc.prems â€¹i < jâ€º b_disjoint_less disjnt_def disjnt_sym less_Suc_eq that)
    qed
    have j0_less: "j0 < enum K j"
      by (meson Suc.prems Suc_le_lessD finite_enumerate_in_set greaterThan_iff less_le_trans subsetD K)
    have "(âˆ‘i<Suc j. card (b (enum K i) (j0, i)))
          = card (b (enum K j) (j0, j)) + (âˆ‘i<j. card (b (enum K i) (j0, i)))"
      by (simp add: lessThan_Suc card_Un_disjnt [OF _ _ dis])
    also have "â€¦ = card (b (enum K j) (j0, j)) + enum (d j0) j - enum (d j0) 0"
      using â€¹Suc j â‰¤ j0â€º by (simp add: Suc.IH split: nat_diff_split)
    also have "â€¦ = enum (d j0) (Suc j) - enum (d j0) 0"
      using j0_less
      apply (simp add: card_b split: nat_diff_split)
      by (metis Suc.prems card_d finite_d finite_enumerate_step le_imp_less_Suc less_asym)
    finally show ?case .
  qed

  have card_UN_b: "card (â‹ƒi<j. b (enum K i) (j0, i)) = enum (d j0) j - enum (d j0) 0"
    if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" and "j â‰¤ j0" for j0 j K
    using that by (simp add: card_UN_disjoint sum_card_b b_disjoint)

  have len_BB: "length (BB j j K) = enum (d j) j"
    if K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j j" and "j â‰¤ j" for j K
  proof -
    have dis_ab: "â‹€i. i < j âŸ¹ disjnt (a j) (b (enum K i) (j,i))"
      using K ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum ab less_sets_imp_disjnt nat_less_le by blast
    show ?thesis
      using K unfolding BB_def ğ’¦_def nsets_def
      by (simp add: card_UN_b card_Un_disjnt dis_ab card_a cInf_le_finite finite_enumerate_in_set enum_0_eq_Inf_finite)
  qed

  have "less_sets (d k) (d (Suc k))" for k
    by (metis aM a_ne d_eq da less_sets_fst_grab less_sets_trans less_sets_weaken2 nxt_subset)
  then have dd: "less_sets (d k') (d k)" if "k' < k" for k' k
    by (meson UNIV_I d_ne less_sets_imp_strict_mono_sets strict_mono_sets_def that)

  show thesis
  proof
    show "(â‹ƒ (range XX)) âŠ† WW"
      by (auto simp: XX_def BB_def WW_def)
    show "ordertype (â‹ƒ (range XX)) (?LL) = Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰"
      using otÏ‰j by (simp add: XX_def ordertype_Ï‰Ï‰)
  next
    fix U
    assume U: "U âˆˆ [â‹ƒ (range XX)]â‡—2â‡–"
    then obtain x y where Ueq: "U = {x,y}" and len_xy: "length x â‰¤ length y"
      by (auto simp: lenlex_nsets_2_eq lenlex_length)

    show "âˆƒl. Form l U âˆ§ (0 < l âŸ¶ [enum N l] < inter_scheme l U âˆ§ list.set (inter_scheme l U) âŠ† N)"
    proof (cases "length x = length y")
      case True
      then show ?thesis
        using Form.intros(1) U Ueq by fastforce
    next
      case False
      then have xy: "length x < length y"
        using len_xy by auto
      obtain j r K L where K: "K âˆˆ ğ’¦ j j" and xeq: "x = BB j j K"
        and ne: "BB j j K â‰  BB r r L"
        and L: "L âˆˆ ğ’¦ r r" and yeq: "y = BB r r L"
        using U by (auto simp: Ueq XX_def)
      then have "length x = enum (d j) j" "length y = enum (d r) r"
        by (auto simp: len_BB)
      then have "j < r"
        using xy dd
        by (metis card_d finite_enumerate_in_set finite_d lessI less_asym less_setsD linorder_neqE_nat)
      then have aj_ar: "less_sets (a j) (a r)"
        using aa by auto
      have Ksub: "K âŠ† {j<..}" and "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j"
        using K by (auto simp: ğ’¦_def nsets_def)
      have Lsub: "L âŠ† {r<..}" and "finite L" "card L â‰¥ r"
        using L by (auto simp: ğ’¦_def nsets_def)
      have enumK: "enum K i > j" if "i < j" for i
        using K ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum that by blast
      have enumL: "enum L i > r" if "i < r" for i
        using L ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum that by blast
      have "list.set (acc_lengths w (seqs j0 j K)) âŠ† (+) w ` d j0"
        if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" and "j â‰¤ j0" for j0 j K w
        using â€¹j â‰¤ j0â€º
      proof (induction j arbitrary: w)
        case 0
        then show ?case
          by (simp add: seqs_def acc_lengths.simps Inf_nat_def1 card_a)
      next
        case (Suc j)
        let ?db = "â¨… (d j0) + ((âˆ‘i<j. card (b (enum K i) (j0,i))) + card (b (enum K j) (j0,j)))"
        have "j0 < enum K j"
          by (meson Suc.prems Suc_le_lessD finite_enumerate_in_set greaterThan_iff le_trans subsetD K)
        then have "?db = enum (d j0) (Suc j)"
          using Suc.prems
          apply (simp add: sum_card_b card_b that enum_d_0 split: nat_diff_split)
          by (simp add: cInf_le_finite finite_enumerate_in_set leD)
        then have "?db âˆˆ d j0"
          using Suc.prems finite_enumerate_in_set by (auto simp: finite_enumerate_in_set)
        moreover have "list.set (acc_lengths w (seqs j0 j K)) âŠ† (+) w ` d j0"
          by (simp add: Suc Suc_leD)
        then have "list.set (acc_lengths (w + â¨… (d j0))
                             (map (list_of âˆ˜ (Î»i. b (enum K i) (j0,i))) (list_of {..<j})))
                   âŠ† (+) w ` d j0"
          by (simp add: seqs_def acc_lengths.simps card_a subset_insertI)
        ultimately show ?case
          by (simp add: seqs_def acc_lengths.simps acc_lengths_append image_iff Inf_nat_def1
                        sum_sorted_list_of_set_map card_a)
      qed
      then have acc_lengths_subset_d: "list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs j0 j K)) âŠ† d j0"
        if K: "K âŠ† {j0<..}" "finite K" "card K â‰¥ j0" and "j â‰¤ j0" for j0 j K
        by (metis image_add_0 that)

      have "strict_sorted x" "strict_sorted y"
        by (auto simp: xeq yeq BB_def)
      have disjnt_xy: "disjnt (list.set x) (list.set y)"
      proof -
        have "disjnt (a j) (a r)"
          using â€¹j < râ€º aa less_sets_imp_disjnt by blast
        moreover have "disjnt (b (enum K i) (j,i)) (a r)" if "i < j" for i
          by (simp add: disjnt_ba enumK less_imp_le_nat that)
        moreover have "disjnt (a j) (b (enum L q) (r,q))" if "q < r" for q
          by (meson disjnt_ba disjnt_sym enumL less_imp_le_nat that)
        moreover have "disjnt (b (enum K i) (j,i)) (b (enum L q) (r,q))" if "i < j" "q < r" for i q
        by (meson â€¹j < râ€º bb_disjnt enumK enumL less_imp_le that)
      ultimately show ?thesis
          by (simp add: xeq yeq BB_def)
      qed
      have "âˆƒus vs. merge (seqs j j K) (seqs r r L) us vs"
      proof (rule merge_exists)
        show "strict_sorted (concat (seqs j j K))"
          using BB_eq_concat_seqs K â€¹strict_sorted xâ€º xeq by auto
        show "strict_sorted (concat (seqs r r L))"
          using BB_eq_concat_seqs L â€¹strict_sorted yâ€º yeq by auto
        show "seqs j j K âˆˆ lists (- {[]})" "seqs r r L âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
          by (auto simp: K L seqs_ne)
        show "hd (seqs j j K) < hd (seqs r r L)"
          by (simp add: aj_ar less_sets_imp_list_less seqs_def)
        show "seqs j j K â‰  []" "seqs r r L â‰  []"
          using seqs_def by blast+
        have less_bb: "less_sets (b (enum K i) (j,i)) (b (enum L p) (r, p))"
          if neg: "Â¬ less_sets (b (enum L p) (r, p)) (b (enum K i) (j,i))" and "i < j" "p < r"
          for i p
        proof (cases "enum K i" "enum L p" rule: linorder_cases)
          case less
          then show ?thesis
            by (simp add: bb enumK less_imp_le_nat â€¹i < jâ€º)
        next
          case equal
          then show ?thesis
            using â€¹j < râ€º enumK â€¹i < jâ€º by (force simp: IJ_iff pair_less_def intro: bb_same)
        next
          case greater
          then show ?thesis
            using bb enumL less_imp_le_nat neg â€¹p < râ€º by blast
        qed
        show "u < v âˆ¨ v < u"
          if "u âˆˆ list.set (seqs j j K)" and "v âˆˆ list.set (seqs r r L)" for u v
          using that enumK enumL
          apply (auto simp: seqs_def aj_ar intro!: less_bb less_sets_imp_list_less)
          apply (meson ab ba less_imp_le_nat not_le)+
          done
      qed
      then obtain uus vvs where merge: "merge (seqs j j K) (seqs r r L) uus vvs"
        by metis
      then have "uus â‰  []"
        using merge_length1_gt_0 by (auto simp: seqs_def)
      then obtain u1 us where us: "u1#us = uus"
        by (metis neq_Nil_conv)
      define ku where "ku â‰¡ length (u1#us)"
      define ps where "ps â‰¡ acc_lengths 0 (u1#us)"
      have us_ne: "u1#us âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
        using merge_length1_nonempty seqs_ne us merge us K by auto
      have xu_eq: "x = concat (u1#us)"
        using BB_eq_concat_seqs K merge merge_preserves us xeq by auto
      then have "strict_sorted u1"
        using â€¹strict_sorted xâ€º strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
      have u_sub: "list.set ps âŠ† list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs j j K))"
        using acc_lengths_merge1 merge ps_def us by blast
      have "vvs â‰  []"
        using merge BB_eq_concat_seqs L merge_preserves xy yeq by auto
      then obtain v1 vs where vs: "v1#vs = vvs"
        by (metis neq_Nil_conv)
      define kv where "kv â‰¡ length (v1#vs)"
      define qs where "qs â‰¡ acc_lengths 0 (v1#vs)"
      have vs_ne: "v1#vs âˆˆ lists (- {[]})"
        using L merge merge_length2_nonempty seqs_ne vs by auto
      have yv_eq: "y = concat (v1#vs)"
        using BB_eq_concat_seqs L merge merge_preserves vs yeq by auto
      then have "strict_sorted v1"
        using â€¹strict_sorted yâ€º strict_sorted_append_iff by auto
      have v_sub: "list.set qs âŠ† list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs r r L))"
        using acc_lengths_merge2 merge qs_def vs by blast

      have ss_concat_jj: "strict_sorted (concat (seqs j j K))"
        using BB_eq_concat_seqs K â€¹strict_sorted xâ€º xeq by auto
      then obtain k: "0 < kv" "kv â‰¤ ku" "ku â‰¤ Suc kv" "kv â‰¤ Suc j"
        using us vs merge_length_le merge_length_le_Suc merge_length_less2 merge
        unfolding ku_def kv_def by fastforce

      define zs where "zs â‰¡ concat [ps,u1,qs,v1] @ interact us vs"
      have ss: "strict_sorted zs"
      proof -
        have ssp: "strict_sorted ps"
          unfolding ps_def by (meson strict_sorted_acc_lengths us_ne)
        have ssq: "strict_sorted qs"
          unfolding qs_def by (meson strict_sorted_acc_lengths vs_ne)

        have "less_sets (d j) (list.set x)"
          using da [of j] db [of j]  K ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum nat_less_le
          by (auto simp: xeq BB_def less_sets_Un2 less_sets_UN2)
        then have ac_x: "acc_lengths 0 (seqs j j K) < x"
          by (meson Ksub â€¹finite Kâ€º â€¹j â‰¤ card Kâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d dual_order.refl less_sets_imp_list_less less_sets_weaken1)
        then have "ps < u1"
          by (metis K Ksub UnI1 ğ’¦_card â€¹finite Kâ€º â€¹j â‰¤ card Kâ€º â€¹less_sets (d j) (list.set x)â€º acc_lengths_subset_d concat.simps(2) empty_iff empty_set hd_append2 less_list_def less_sets_imp_list_less less_sets_weaken1 list.set_sel(1) set_append u_sub xu_eq)

        have "less_sets (d r) (list.set y)"
          using da [of r] db [of r]  L ğ’¦_card ğ’¦_enum nat_less_le
          by (auto simp: yeq BB_def less_sets_Un2 less_sets_UN2)
        then have "acc_lengths 0 (seqs r r L) < y"
          by (meson Lsub â€¹finite Lâ€º â€¹r â‰¤ card Lâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d dual_order.refl less_sets_imp_list_less less_sets_weaken1)
        then have "qs < v1"
          by (metis L Lsub UnI1 ğ’¦_card â€¹finite Lâ€º â€¹r â‰¤ card Lâ€º â€¹less_sets (d r) (list.set y)â€º acc_lengths_subset_d concat.simps(2) empty_iff empty_set hd_append2 less_list_def less_sets_imp_list_less less_sets_weaken1 list.set_sel(1) set_append v_sub yv_eq)

        have carda_v1: "card (a r) â‰¤ length v1"
          using length_hd_merge2 [OF merge] unfolding vs [symmetric] by (simp add: seqs_def)
        have ab_enumK: "â‹€i. i < j âŸ¹ less_sets (a j) (b (enum K i) (j,i))"
          by (meson ab enumK le_trans less_imp_le_nat)

        have ab_enumL: "â‹€q. q < r âŸ¹ less_sets (a j) (b (enum L q) (r,q))"
          by (meson â€¹j < râ€º ab enumL le_trans less_imp_le_nat)
        then have ay: "less_sets (a j) (list.set y)"
          by (auto simp: yeq BB_def less_sets_Un2 less_sets_UN2 aj_ar)

        have disjnt_hd_last_K_y: "disjnt {hd l..last l} (list.set y)"
          if l: "l âˆˆ list.set (seqs j j K)" for l
        proof (clarsimp simp add: yeq BB_def disjnt_iff Ball_def, intro conjI strip)
          fix u
          assume u: "u â‰¤ last l" and "hd l â‰¤ u"
          with l consider "u â‰¤ last (list_of (a j))" "hd (list_of (a j)) â‰¤ u"
            | i where "i<j" "u â‰¤ last (list_of (b (enum K i) (j,i)))" "hd (list_of (b (enum K i) (j,i))) â‰¤ u"
            by (force simp: seqs_def)
          note l_cases = this
          then show "u âˆ‰ a r"
          proof cases
            case 1
            then show ?thesis
              by (metis a_ne aj_ar finite_a last_in_set leD less_setsD set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
          next
            case 2
            then show ?thesis
              by (metis enumK ab ba Inf_nat_def1 b_ne card_b_finite hd_b last_in_set less_asym less_setsD not_le set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
          qed
          fix q
          assume "q < r"
          show "u âˆ‰ b (enum L q) (r,q)" using l_cases
          proof cases
            case 1
            then show ?thesis
              by (metis â€¹q < râ€º a_ne ab_enumL finite_a last_in_set leD less_setsD set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
          next
            case 2
            show ?thesis
            proof (cases "enum K i = enum L q")
              case True
              then show ?thesis
                using 2 bb_same [of concl: "enum L q" j i r q] â€¹j < râ€º
                apply (simp add: IJ_def pair_less_def less_sets_def)
                by (metis enumK b_ne card_b_finite last_in_set leD less_imp_le_nat set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
            next
              case False
              with 2 bb enumK enumL show ?thesis
                unfolding less_sets_def
                by (metis â€¹q < râ€º b_ne card_b_finite last_in_set leD less_imp_le_nat list.set_sel(1) nat_neq_iff set_sorted_list_of_set sorted_list_of_set_eq_Nil_iff)
            qed
          qed
        qed

        have u1_y: "less_sets (list.set u1) (list.set y)"
          using vs yv_eq L â€¹strict_sorted yâ€º merge merge_less_sets_hd merge_preserves seqs_ne ss_concat_jj us by fastforce
        have u1_subset_seqs: "list.set u1 âŠ† list.set (concat (seqs j j K))"
          using merge_preserves [OF merge] us by auto

        have "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (d (Suc k))" if "jâ‰¤k" "i<j" for k j i
          by (metis bM d_eq less_sets_fst_grab less_sets_weaken2 nxt_subset that)
        then have bd: "less_sets (b k (j,i)) (d k')" if "jâ‰¤k" "i<j" "k < k'" for k k' j i
          by (metis Suc_lessI d_ne dd less_sets_trans that)

        have "less_sets (a k) (d (Suc k))" for k
          by (metis aM d_eq less_sets_fst_grab less_sets_weaken2 nxt_subset)
        then have ad: "less_sets (a k) (d k')" if "k<k'" for k k'
          by (metis Suc_lessI d_ne dd less_sets_trans that)

        have "u1 < y"
          by (simp add: u1_y less_sets_imp_list_less)
        have "n < Inf (d r)" if n: "n âˆˆ list.set u1" for n
        proof -
          obtain l where l: "l âˆˆ list.set (seqs j j K)" and n: "n âˆˆ list.set l"
            using n u1_subset_seqs by auto
          then consider "l = list_of (a j)" | i where "l = list_of (b (enum K i) (j,i))" "i < j"
            by (force simp: seqs_def)
          then show ?thesis
          proof cases
            case 1
            then show ?thesis
              by (metis Inf_nat_def1 â€¹j < râ€º ad d_ne finite_a less_setsD n set_sorted_list_of_set)
          next
            case 2
            then have "Min (b (enum K i) (j,i)) â‰¤ n"
              using n by (simp add: less_list_def disjnt_iff less_sets_def)
            also have f8: "n < hd y"
              using less_setsD that u1_y
              by (metis gr_implies_not0 list.set_sel(1) list.size(3) xy)
            finally have "l < y"
              using 2 disjnt_hd_last_K_y [OF l] u1_y
              apply (simp add: less_list_def disjnt_iff)
              by (metis card_b_finite hd_list_of leI less_imp_le_nat list.set_sel(1))
            moreover have "last (list_of (b (enum K i) (j,i))) < hd (list_of (a r))"
              using â€¹l < yâ€º L n by (auto simp:  2yeq BB_eq_concat_seqs seqs_def less_list_def)
            then have "enum K i < r"
              by (metis "2"(1) a_ne ab card_b_finite empty_iff finite.emptyI finite_a last_in_set leI less_asym less_setsD list.set_sel(1) n set_sorted_list_of_set)
            moreover have "j â‰¤ enum K i"
              by (simp add: "2"(2) enumK less_imp_le_nat)
            ultimately show ?thesis
              using 2 n bd [of j "enum K i" i r] Inf_nat_def1 less_setsD by force
          qed
        qed
        then have "last u1 < Inf (d r)"
          using â€¹uus â‰  []â€º us_ne by auto
        also have "â€¦ â‰¤ length v1"
          using card_a carda_v1 by auto
        finally have "last u1 < length v1" .
        then have "u1 < qs"
          by (simp add: qs_def acc_lengths.simps less_list_def)

        have "strict_sorted (interact (u1#us) (v1#vs))"
          using L â€¹strict_sorted xâ€º â€¹strict_sorted yâ€º merge merge_interact merge_preserves seqs_ne us vs xu_eq yv_eq by auto
        then have "strict_sorted (interact us vs)" "v1 < interact us vs"
          by (auto simp: strict_sorted_append_iff)
        moreover have "ps < u1 @ qs @ v1 @ interact us vs"
          using â€¹ps < u1â€º us_ne unfolding less_list_def by auto
        moreover have "u1 < qs @ v1 @ interact us vs"
          by (metis â€¹u1 < qsâ€º â€¹vvs â‰  []â€º acc_lengths_eq_Nil_iff hd_append less_list_def qs_def vs)
        moreover have "qs < v1 @ interact us vs"
          using â€¹qs < v1â€º us_ne â€¹last u1 < length v1â€º vs_ne by (auto simp: less_list_def)
        ultimately show ?thesis
          by (simp add: zs_def strict_sorted_append_iff ssp ssq â€¹strict_sorted u1â€º â€¹strict_sorted v1â€º)
      qed
      have ps_subset_d: "list.set ps âŠ† d j"
          using K Ksub ğ’¦_card â€¹finite Kâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d u_sub by blast
      have ps_less_u1: "ps < u1"
      proof -
        have "hd u1 = hd x"
          using us_ne by (auto simp: xu_eq)
        then have "hd u1 âˆˆ a j"
          by (simp add: xeq BB_eq_concat_seqs K seqs_def hd_append hd_list_of)
        then have "less_sets (list.set ps) {hd u1}"
          by (metis da ps_subset_d less_sets_def singletonD subset_iff)
        then show ?thesis
          by (metis less_hd_imp_less list.set(2) empty_set less_sets_imp_list_less)
      qed
      have qs_subset_d: "list.set qs âŠ† d r"
        using L Lsub ğ’¦_card â€¹finite Lâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d v_sub by blast
      have qs_less_v1: "qs < v1"
      proof -
        have "hd v1 = hd y"
          using vs_ne by (auto simp: yv_eq)
        then have "hd v1 âˆˆ a r"
          by (simp add: yeq BB_eq_concat_seqs L seqs_def hd_append hd_list_of)
        then have "less_sets (list.set qs) {hd v1}"
          by (metis da qs_subset_d less_sets_def singletonD subset_iff)
        then show ?thesis
          by (metis less_hd_imp_less list.set(2) empty_set less_sets_imp_list_less)
      qed
      have FB: "Form_Body ku kv x y zs"
        unfolding Form_Body.simps
        using ku_def kv_def ps_def qs_def ss us_ne vs_ne xu_eq xy yv_eq zs_def by blast
      then have "zs = (inter_scheme ((ku+kv) - Suc 0) {x,y})"
        by (simp add: Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme k)
      obtain l where "l â‰¤ 2 * (Suc j)" and l: "Form l U" and zs_eq_interact: "zs = inter_scheme l {x,y}"
      proof
        show "ku+kv-1 â‰¤ 2 * (Suc j)"
          using k by auto
        show "Form (ku+kv-1) U"
        proof (cases "ku=kv")
          case True
          then show ?thesis
            using FB Form.simps Ueq â€¹0 < kvâ€º by (auto simp: mult_2)
        next
          case False
          then have "ku = Suc kv"
            using k by auto
          then show ?thesis
            using FB Form.simps Ueq â€¹0 < kvâ€º by auto
        qed
        show "zs = inter_scheme (ku + kv - 1) {x, y}"
          using Form_Body_imp_inter_scheme by (simp add: FB k)
      qed
      then have "enum N l â‰¤ enum N (Suc (2 * Suc j))"
        by (simp add: assms less_imp_le_nat)
      also have "â€¦ < Min (d j)"
        by (metis Min_in card_0_eq card_d d_eq finite_d fst_grab_subset greaterThan_iff in_mono le_inf_iff nxt_def old.nat.distinct(2))
      finally have ls: "less_sets {enum N l} (d j)"
        by simp
      have "l > 0"
        by (metis l False Form_0_cases_raw Set.doubleton_eq_iff Ueq gr0I)
      show ?thesis
        unfolding Ueq
      proof (intro exI conjI impI)
        have zs_subset: "list.set zs âŠ† list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs j j K)) âˆª list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs r r L)) âˆª list.set x âˆª list.set y"
          using u_sub v_sub by (auto simp: zs_def xu_eq yv_eq)
        also have "â€¦ âŠ† N"
        proof (simp, intro conjI)
          show "list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs j j K)) âŠ† N"
            using d_subset_N Ksub â€¹finite Kâ€º â€¹j â‰¤ card Kâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d by blast
          show "list.set (acc_lengths 0 (seqs r r L)) âŠ† N"
            using d_subset_N Lsub â€¹finite Lâ€º â€¹r â‰¤ card Lâ€º acc_lengths_subset_d by blast
          show "list.set x âŠ† N" "list.set y âŠ† N"
            by (simp_all add: xeq yeq BB_def a_subset_N UN_least b_subset_N)
        qed
        finally show "list.set (inter_scheme l {x, y}) âŠ† N"
          using zs_eq_interact by blast
        have "[enum N l] < ps"
          using ps_subset_d ls
          by (metis empty_set less_sets_imp_list_less less_sets_weaken2 list.simps(15))
        then show "[enum N l] < inter_scheme l {x, y}"
          by (simp add: zs_def less_list_def ps_def flip: zs_eq_interact)
      qed (use Ueq l in blast)
    qed
  qed
qed




subsection â€¹The main partition theorem for @{term "Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"}â€º

definition iso_ll where "iso_ll A B â‰¡ iso (lenlex less_than âˆ© (AÃ—A)) (lenlex less_than âˆ© (BÃ—B))"

corollary ordertype_eq_ordertype_iso_ll:
  assumes "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) A) = A" "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) B) = B"
  shows "(ordertype A (lenlex less_than) = ordertype B (lenlex less_than))
         âŸ· (âˆƒf. iso_ll A B f)"
proof -
  have "total_on A (lenlex less_than) âˆ§ total_on B (lenlex less_than)"
    by (meson UNIV_I total_lenlex total_on_def total_on_less_than)
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: assms wf_lenlex lenlex_transI iso_ll_def ordertype_eq_ordertype_iso_Restr)
qed

theorem partition_Ï‰Ï‰_aux:
  assumes "Î± âˆˆ elts Ï‰"
  shows "partn_lst (lenlex less_than) WW [Ï‰â†‘Ï‰,Î±] 2" (is "partn_lst ?R WW [Ï‰â†‘Ï‰,Î±] 2")
proof (cases "Î± â‰¤ 1")
  case True
  then show ?thesis
    using strict_sorted_into_WW unfolding WW_def by (auto intro!: partn_lst_triv1[where i=1])
next
  case False
  obtain m where m: "Î± = ord_of_nat m"
    using assms elts_Ï‰ by auto
  then have "m>1"
    using False by auto
  show ?thesis
    unfolding partn_lst_def
  proof clarsimp
    fix f
    assume f: "f âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
    let ?P0 = "âˆƒX âŠ† WW. ordertype X ?R = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰ âˆ§ f ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
    let ?P1 = "âˆƒM âŠ† WW. ordertype M ?R = Î± âˆ§ f ` [M]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {1}"
    have â€ : "?P0 âˆ¨ ?P1"
    proof (rule disjCI)
      assume not1: "Â¬ ?P1"
      have "âˆƒW'. ordertype W' ?R = Ï‰â†‘n âˆ§ f ` [W']â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0} âˆ§ W' âŠ† WW_seg (n*m)" for n::nat
      proof -
        have fnm: "f âˆˆ [WW_seg (n*m)]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
          using f WW_seg_subset_WW [of "n*m"] by (meson in_mono nsets_Pi_contra)
        have *: "partn_lst ?R (WW_seg (n*m)) [Ï‰â†‘n, ord_of_nat m] 2"
          using ordertype_WW_seg [of "n*m"]
          by (simp add: partn_lst_VWF_imp_partn_lst [OF Theorem_3_2])
        show ?thesis
          using partn_lst_E [OF * fnm, simplified]
          by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) One_nat_def Suc_1 WW_seg_subset_WW order.trans less_2_cases m not1 nth_Cons' nth_Cons_Suc)
      qed
      then obtain W':: "nat â‡’ nat list set"
          where otW': "â‹€n. ordertype (W' n) ?R = Ï‰â†‘n"
          and f_W': "â‹€n. f ` [W' n]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
          and seg_W': "â‹€n. W' n âŠ† WW_seg (n*m)"
        by metis
      define WW' where "WW' â‰¡ (â‹ƒn. W' n)"
      have "WW' âŠ† WW"
        using seg_W' WW_seg_subset_WW by (force simp: WW'_def)
      with f have f': "f âˆˆ [WW']â‡—2â‡– â†’ {..<Suc (Suc 0)}"
        using nsets_mono by fastforce
      have ot': "ordertype WW' ?R = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
      proof (rule antisym)
        have "ordertype WW' ?R â‰¤ ordertype WW ?R"
          by (simp add: â€¹WW' âŠ† WWâ€º lenlex_transI ordertype_mono wf_lenlex)
        with ordertype_WW
        show "ordertype WW' ?R â‰¤ Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰"
          by simp
        have "Ï‰ â†‘ n â‰¤ ordertype (â‹ƒ (range W')) ?R" for n::nat
          by (metis TC_small UNIV_I UN_I otW' lenlex_transI ordertype_mono subsetI trans_less_than wf_lenlex wf_less_than)
        then show "Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰ â‰¤ ordertype WW' ?R"
          by (auto simp: elts_Ï‰ oexp_Limit ZFC_in_HOL.SUP_le_iff WW'_def)
      qed
      have FR_WW: "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) WW) = WW"
        by (simp add: Limit_omega_oexp Limit_ordertype_imp_Field_Restr ordertype_WW)
      have FR_WW': "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) WW') = WW'"
        by (simp add: Limit_omega_oexp Limit_ordertype_imp_Field_Restr ot')
      have FR_W: "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) (WW_seg n)) = WW_seg n" if "n>0" for n
        by (simp add: Limit_omega_oexp ordertype_WW_seg that Limit_ordertype_imp_Field_Restr)
      have FR_W': "Field (Restr (lenlex less_than) (W' n)) = W' n" if "n>0" for n
        by (simp add: Limit_omega_oexp otW' that Limit_ordertype_imp_Field_Restr)
      have "âˆƒh. iso_ll (WW_seg n) (W' n) h" if "n>0" for n
      proof (subst ordertype_eq_ordertype_iso_ll [symmetric])
        show "ordertype (WW_seg n) (lenlex less_than) = ordertype (W' n) (lenlex less_than)"
          by (simp add: ordertype_WW_seg otW')
      qed (auto simp: FR_W FR_W' that)
      then obtain h_seg where h_seg: "â‹€n. n > 0 âŸ¹ iso_ll (WW_seg n) (W' n) (h_seg n)"
        by metis
      define h where "h â‰¡ Î»l. if l=[] then [] else h_seg (length l) l"

      have bij_h_seg: "â‹€n. n > 0 âŸ¹ bij_betw (h_seg n) (WW_seg n) (W' n)"
        using h_seg by (simp add: iso_ll_def iso_iff2 FR_W FR_W')
      have len_h_seg: "length (h_seg (length l) l) = length l * m"
        if "length l > 0" "l âˆˆ WW" for l
        using bij_betwE [OF bij_h_seg] seg_W' that by (simp add: WW_seg_def subset_iff)
      have hlen: "length (h x) = length (h y) âŸ· length x = length y" if "x âˆˆ WW" "y âˆˆ WW" for x y
        using that â€¹1 < mâ€º h_def len_h_seg by force

      have h: "iso_ll WW WW' h"
        unfolding iso_ll_def iso_iff2 FR_WW FR_WW'
      proof (intro conjI strip)
        have W'_ne: "W' n â‰  {}" for n
          using otW' [of n] by auto
        then have "[] âˆˆ WW'"
          using seg_W' [of 0] by (auto simp: WW'_def WW_seg_def)
        let ?g = "Î»l. if l=[] then l else inv_into (WW_seg (length l div m)) (h_seg (length l div m)) l"
        have h_seg_iff: "â‹€n a b. âŸ¦a âˆˆ WW_seg n; b âˆˆ WW_seg n; n>0âŸ§ âŸ¹
                          (a, b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than âŸ·
                          (h_seg n a, h_seg n b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than âˆ§ h_seg n a âˆˆ W' n âˆ§ h_seg n b âˆˆ W' n"
          using h_seg by (auto simp: iso_ll_def iso_iff2 FR_W FR_W')

        show "bij_betw h WW WW'"
          unfolding bij_betw_iff_bijections
        proof (intro exI conjI ballI)
          fix l
          assume "l âˆˆ WW"
          then have l: "l âˆˆ WW_seg (length l)"
            by (simp add: WW_seg_def)
          have "h l âˆˆ W' (length l)"
          proof (cases "l=[]")
            case True
            with seg_W' [of 0] W'_ne show ?thesis
              by (auto simp: WW_seg_def h_def)
          next
            case False
            then show ?thesis
              using bij_betwE bij_h_seg h_def l by fastforce
          qed
          show "h l âˆˆ WW'"
            using WW'_def â€¹h l âˆˆ W' (length l)â€º by blast
          show "?g (h l) = l"
          proof (cases "l=[]")
            case False
            then have "length l > 0"
              by auto
            then have "h_seg (length l) l â‰  []"
              using â€¹1 < mâ€º â€¹l âˆˆ WWâ€º len_h_seg by fastforce
            with â€¹1 < mâ€º show ?thesis
              apply (simp add: h_def len_h_seg â€¹l âˆˆ WWâ€º)
              by (meson â€¹0 < length lâ€º bij_betw_inv_into_left bij_h_seg l)
          qed (auto simp: h_def)
        next
          fix l
          assume "l âˆˆ WW'"
          then have l: "l âˆˆ W' (length l div m)"
            using WW_seg_def â€¹1 < mâ€º seg_W' by (fastforce simp: WW'_def)
          show "?g l âˆˆ WW"
          proof (cases "l=[]")
            case False
            then have "l âˆ‰ W' 0"
              using WW_seg_def seg_W' by fastforce
            with l have "inv_into (WW_seg (length l div m)) (h_seg (length l div m)) l âˆˆ WW_seg (length l div m)"
              by (metis Nat.neq0_conv bij_betwE bij_betw_inv_into bij_h_seg)
            then show ?thesis
              using False WW_seg_subset_WW by auto
          qed (auto simp: WW_def)

          show "h (?g l) = l"
          proof (cases "l=[]")
            case False
            then have "0 < length l div m"
              using WW_seg_def l seg_W' by fastforce
            then have "inv_into (WW_seg (length l div m)) (h_seg (length l div m)) l âˆˆ WW_seg (length l div m)"
              by (metis bij_betw_imp_surj_on bij_h_seg inv_into_into l)
            then show ?thesis
              using bij_h_seg [of "length l div m"] WW_seg_def â€¹0 < length l div mâ€º bij_betw_inv_into_right l
              by (fastforce simp add: h_def)
          qed (auto simp: h_def)
        qed
        fix a b
        assume "a âˆˆ WW" "b âˆˆ WW"
        show "(a, b) âˆˆ Restr (lenlex less_than) WW âŸ· (h a, h b) âˆˆ Restr (lenlex less_than) WW'"
          (is "?lhs = ?rhs")
        proof
          assume L: ?lhs
          then consider "length a < length b" | "length a = length b" "(a, b) âˆˆ lex less_than"
            by (auto simp: lenlex_conv)
          then show ?rhs
          proof cases
            case 1
            then have "length (h a) < length (h b)"
              using â€¹1 < mâ€º â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º h_def len_h_seg by auto
            then have "(h a, h b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
              by (auto simp: lenlex_conv)
            then show ?thesis
              using â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betwE by fastforce
          next
            case 2
            then have ab: "a âˆˆ WW_seg (length a)" "b âˆˆ WW_seg (length a)"
              using â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º by (auto simp: WW_seg_def)
            have "length (h a) = length (h b)"
              using 2 â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º h_def len_h_seg by force
            moreover have "(a, b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
              using L by blast
            then have "(h_seg (length a) a, h_seg (length a) b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
              using 2 ab h_seg_iff by blast
            ultimately show ?thesis
              using 2 â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betwE h_def by fastforce
          qed
        next
          assume R: ?rhs
          then have R': "(h a, h b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
            by blast
          then consider "length a < length b"
            | "length a = length b" "(h a, h b) âˆˆ lex less_than"
            using  â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹m > 1â€º
            by (auto simp: lenlex_conv h_def len_h_seg split: if_split_asm)
          then show ?lhs
          proof cases
            case 1
            then have "(a, b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
              using omega_sum_less_iff by auto
            then show ?thesis
              by (simp add: â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º)
          next
            case 2
            then have ab: "a âˆˆ WW_seg (length a)" "b âˆˆ WW_seg (length a)"
              using â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º by (auto simp: WW_seg_def)
            then have "(a, b) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
              using bij_betwE [OF bij_h_seg] â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º R' 2
