              by (simp add: h_def h_seg_iff split: if_split_asm)
            then show ?thesis
              using â€¹a âˆˆ WWâ€º â€¹b âˆˆ WWâ€º by blast
          qed
        qed
      qed

      let ?fh = "f âˆ˜ image h"
      have "bij_betw h WW WW'"
        using h unfolding iso_ll_def iso_iff2 by (fastforce simp: FR_WW FR_WW')
      moreover have "{..<Suc (Suc 0)} = {0,1}"
        by auto
      ultimately have fh: "?fh âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡– â†’ {0,1}"
        unfolding Pi_iff using bij_betwE f' bij_betw_nsets by (metis PiE comp_apply)

      have "f{x,y} = 0" if "x âˆˆ WW'" "y âˆˆ WW'" "length x = length y" "x â‰  y" for x y
      proof -
        obtain p q where "x âˆˆ W' p" and "y âˆˆ W' q"
          using WW'_def â€¹x âˆˆ WW'â€º â€¹y âˆˆ WW'â€º by blast
        then obtain n where "{x,y} âˆˆ [W' n]â‡—2â‡–"
          using seg_W' â€¹1 < mâ€º â€¹length x = length yâ€º â€¹x â‰  yâ€º
          by (auto simp: WW'_def WW_seg_def subset_iff)
        then show "f{x,y} = 0"
          using f_W' by blast
      qed
      then have fh_eq_0_eqlen: "?fh{x,y} = 0" if "x âˆˆ WW" "y âˆˆ WW" "length x = length y" "x â‰  y" for x y
        using  â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º  that hlen
        by (simp add: bij_betw_iff_bijections) metis
      have m_f_0: "âˆƒxâˆˆ[M]â‡—2â‡–. f x = 0" if "M âŠ† WW" "card M = m" for M
      proof -
        have "finite M"
          using False m that by auto
        with not1 [simplified, rule_format, of M] f
        show ?thesis
          using that â€¹1 < mâ€º
          apply (simp add: Pi_iff image_subset_iff finite_ordertype_eq_card m)
          by (metis less_2_cases nsets_mono numeral_2_eq_2 subset_iff)
      qed
      have m_fh_0: "âˆƒxâˆˆ[M]â‡—2â‡–. ?fh x = 0" if "M âŠ† WW" "card M = m" for M
      proof -
        have "h ` M âŠ† WW"
          using â€¹WW' âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betwE that(1) by fastforce
        moreover have "card (h ` M) = m"
          by (metis â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betw_def bij_betw_subset card_image that)
        ultimately have "âˆƒx âˆˆ [h ` M]â‡—2â‡–. f x = 0"
          by (metis m_f_0)
        then obtain Y where "f (h ` Y) = 0" "finite Y" "card Y = 2" "Y âŠ† M"
          apply (simp add: nsets_def subset_image_iff)
          by (metis â€¹M âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betw_def card_image card.infinite inj_on_subset zero_neq_numeral)
        then show ?thesis
          by (auto simp: nsets_def)
      qed

      obtain N j where "infinite N"
        and N: "â‹€k u. âŸ¦k > 0; u âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–; Form k u; [enum N k] < inter_scheme k u; List.set (inter_scheme k u) âŠ† NâŸ§ âŸ¹ ?fh u = j k"
        using lemma_3_6 [OF fh] by blast

      have infN': "infinite (enum N ` {k<..})" for k
        by (simp add: â€¹infinite Nâ€º enum_works finite_image_iff infinite_Ioi strict_mono_imp_inj_on)
      have j_0: "j k = 0" if "k>0" for k
      proof -
        obtain M where M: "M âˆˆ [WW]â‡—mâ‡–"
                 and MF: "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ Form k u"
                 and Mi: "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹ List.set (inter_scheme k u) âŠ† enum N ` {k<..}"
          using lemma_3_7 [OF infN' â€¹k > 0â€º] by metis
        obtain u where u: "u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡–" "?fh u = 0"
          using m_fh_0 [of M] M [unfolded nsets_def] by force
        moreover
        have Â§: "Form k u" "List.set (inter_scheme k u) âŠ† enum N ` {k<..}"
          by (simp_all add: MF Mi â€¹u âˆˆ [M]â‡—2â‡–â€º)
        moreover have "u âˆˆ [WW]â‡—2â‡–"
          using M u by (auto simp: nsets_def)
        moreover have "enum N ` {k<..} âŠ† N"
          using â€¹infinite Nâ€º range_enum by auto
        moreover
        have "[enum N k] < inter_scheme k u"
          using inter_scheme [of k u]  strict_mono_enum [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º] Â§
          apply (auto simp: less_list_def subset_image_iff subset_eq Bex_def image_iff)
          by (metis hd_in_set strict_mono_def)
        ultimately show ?thesis
          using N that by auto
      qed
      obtain X where "X âŠ† WW" and otX: "ordertype X (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰â†‘Ï‰"
            and X: "â‹€u. u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡– âŸ¹
                   âˆƒl. Form l u âˆ§ (l > 0 âŸ¶ [enum N l] < inter_scheme l u âˆ§ List.set (inter_scheme l u) âŠ† N)"
        using lemma_3_8 [OF â€¹infinite Nâ€º] ot' by blast
      have 0: "?fh ` [X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
      proof clarsimp
        fix u
        assume u: "u âˆˆ [X]â‡—2â‡–"
        obtain l where "Form l u" and l: "l > 0 âŸ¶ [enum N l] < inter_scheme l u âˆ§ List.set (inter_scheme l u) âŠ† N"
          using u X by blast
        have "?fh u = 0"
        proof (cases "l > 0")
          case False
          then have "l = 0"
            by blast
          then show ?thesis
            by (metis Form_0_cases_raw â€¹Form l uâ€º â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º doubleton_in_nsets_2 fh_eq_0_eqlen subset_iff u)
        next
          case True
          then obtain "[enum N l] < inter_scheme l u" "List.set (inter_scheme l u) âŠ† N" "j l = 0"
            using Nat.neq0_conv j_0 l by blast
          with True show ?thesis
            using â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º N inter_scheme â€¹Form l uâ€º doubleton_in_nsets_2 u by (auto simp: nsets_def)
        qed
        then show "f (h ` u) = 0"
          by auto
      qed
      show ?P0
      proof (intro exI conjI)
        show "h ` X âŠ† WW"
          using â€¹WW' âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betw_imp_surj_on by fastforce
        show "ordertype (h ` X) (lenlex less_than) = Ï‰ â†‘ Ï‰"
        proof (subst ordertype_inc_eq)
          show "(h x, h y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than"
            if "x âˆˆ X" "y âˆˆ X" "(x, y) âˆˆ lenlex less_than" for x y
            using that h â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º by (auto simp: FR_WW FR_WW' iso_iff2 iso_ll_def)
        qed (use otX in auto)
        show "f ` [h ` X]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {0}"
        proof (clarsimp simp: image_subset_iff nsets_def)
          fix Y
          assume "Y âŠ† h ` X" and "finite Y" and "card Y = 2"
          have "inv_into WW h ` Y âŠ† X"
            using â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹Y âŠ† h ` Xâ€º â€¹bij_betw h WW WW'â€º bij_betw_inv_into_LEFT by blast
          moreover have "finite (inv_into WW h ` Y)"
            using â€¹finite Yâ€º by blast
          moreover have "card (inv_into WW h ` Y) = 2"
            by (metis â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹Y âŠ† h ` Xâ€º â€¹card Y = 2â€º card_image inj_on_inv_into subset_image_iff subset_trans)
          ultimately have "f (h ` inv_into WW h ` Y) = 0"
            using 0 by (auto simp: image_subset_iff nsets_def)
          then show "f Y = 0"
            by (metis â€¹X âŠ† WWâ€º â€¹Y âŠ† h ` Xâ€º image_inv_into_cancel image_mono order_trans)
        qed
      qed
    qed
    then show "âˆƒi<Suc (Suc 0). âˆƒHâŠ†WW. ordertype H ?R = [Ï‰â†‘Ï‰, Î±] ! i âˆ§ f ` [H]â‡—2â‡– âŠ† {i}"
      by (metis One_nat_def lessI nth_Cons_0 nth_Cons_Suc zero_less_Suc)
  qed
qed

text â€¹Theorem 3.1 of Jean A. Larson, ibid.â€º
theorem partition_Ï‰Ï‰: "Î± âˆˆ elts Ï‰ âŸ¹ partn_lst_VWF (Ï‰â†‘Ï‰) [Ï‰â†‘Ï‰,Î±] 2"
  using partn_lst_imp_partn_lst_VWF_eq [OF partition_Ï‰Ï‰_aux] ordertype_WW by auto

end
